Reviews.Title: “This place sucks do not stay here please”
Reviews.Author: medecember82
Reviews.Content: Where do I start ? Over all check in process was horrible I came at 4:30 pm . my room wasn't ready till 5:30 so they told me to go to the water park. supposed to be heated the water was cold!! I tried the pool it was the same way and dirty the bottom of the pool was falling apart and my daughter cut her foot on a piece of it. when I finally got my room it was still dirty only one towel in the room and it smelled musty . I was also informed by a employee that they host a gay orgy and a swingers orgy and found stains in the room that looked like it. I you value your time and money do not stay here please

Reviews.Title: “One of the most revolting hotels in Florida”
Reviews.Author: nickrobson
Reviews.Content: Not fit for children, dirty and unhygienic - a completely unpleasant experience in an area that doesn't have one half-decent hotel. Someone could make a fortune by opening a good clean 3-star hotel in this area.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: Ray H
Reviews.Content: I was a little concerned after reading some negative reviews so I was really surprised when I got there. My room was clean and new, the staff was helpful and the water park was great. It's no 5 star hotel but great price and alot of fun. My 2 year old son had a ball in the kiddy pool area. The food at the outside bar is basic and decent. Nothing gourmet just pizza, burgers, wings and other stuff. The prices were also reasonable. There are alot of places to eat in the area also. If you want a cheap place to stay where you can have fun with the kids then I recommend this hotel. I like the fact that the pool and water park are both gated so when your 2 year old takes off running you don't have to worrry about him escaping the area....LOL. Disney is 14 miles away so this is a great place to stay if you want to visit the parks too. We stayed at the Animal kingdom one night and the pool was soooo far from our room. Actually everything was far. We even had to take a shuttle to eat. Nice but not convenient. This hotel was relaxing and very convenient. I recommend it. Not sure why there are so many haters complaining but my overall experience was good and will go back again.

Reviews.Title: “checked in, then checked back out”
Reviews.Author: michellemcmillon
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research, decided on this hotel for a short 3 day getaway with hubby and kids. 1. When we checked in, the room we were given did not match the picture shown next to the description displayed. (This was the queen bed, bunk beds, kitchen with micro and coffee maker. But it was all contained in one room, not two separate rooms as shown.) 2. The room smelled mildewy. 3. The extra charges to use the waterpark everyday were not made clear on internet site. In addition to daily waterpark charge, there was also an extra charge to rent a tube on lazy river. When I told them my disappointments, they happily allowed us to check out and removed the charge.

Reviews.Title: “Wish I used the waterpark”
Reviews.Author: DuracellTampa
Reviews.Content: The clarion waterpark is not a bad property, you can tell the rooms have been renovated, just the outside needs a facelift. The poolside bar is nice, I wish it stayed open longer, maybe it does on the weekend. The reviews that it's a dump is a bit extreme. If you go in expecting a resort like Sandals or Beaches then this is not the spot for you then again if that's what you're looking for then you should pay more to stay in a resort like that but for the price you pay it's a decent property. My one gripe is that you get charged for use of the waterpark regardless if you use it or not. We were too busy to get to use the waterpark area and were still charged for it.

Reviews.Title: “Waterpark a plus”
Reviews.Author: engsand
Reviews.Content: I was visiting family and decided to stay at the Clarion for one night for the water park. I called the hotel the day of check in to see if I can check in earlier. The front desk was very courteous and advised me that they had rooms ready and I would be welcome to check in. This was at 12 noon. Also, you can arrive early and use the water park even if your room is not ready. I was also told you can use the water park after check out, so basically you can use the water park for 2 days! The hotel is a motel style hotel, but the rooms were clean and pleasant enough. The water park is not huge, but sufficient for my 8 year old son, he had a great time. I love the lazy river. For the price of a motel room, you have access to a nice water park. Great value.

Reviews.Title: “Desceptive practices, Nasty place”
Reviews.Author: Carlpathos101
Reviews.Content: If you like undershirts,gold teeth,tattoos,dirty rooms,fat nasty women and deceptive practices this "resort" is for you.( by the way this place is far,far from being a resort)..the rooms are dirty,the A/C is loud, the remote control of the TV doesnt work and your a thousand miles from everything...When you arrive they immediately hit you with a "resort" fee of 15 dollars a day,that they don't tell you about until you get there.I tried to get a logical explaination and they plead the fifth...The water park is an extra fee of 8 dollars per person per day..thats another thing they dont tell you when you book a room..these people practise big time deceptive baiting..Dont fall for their scam...you are better off staying at a Disney value resort which are cheaper,closer to the parks,rooms are immaculate and much,much,MUCH better surroundings.I have stayed at over 20 different hotels and resorts in the Kissimmee, Orlando area and this place is by far the worst place ever...........stay clear of this place

Reviews.Title: “DUMP!!! Completely filthy”
Reviews.Author: Marsha D
Reviews.Content: We reserved a room on Expedia at the Clarion Resort and Waterpark. When we arrived there we found it to be disgusting looking. This place was terribly dirty on the exterior and can't even imagine what the inside of the rooms looked like if the lobby looked that bad. The pool area was a mess. By the activities and comments by other guests going on, I did not feel safe being there with my children. I attempted to cancel the room and the supervisor refused to refund my payment. In any event, I did not think this was a good or safe situation to put my kids in, so left and rented another room at a nearby hotel that was extremely clean, helpful and courteous......all things the Clarion Hotel was. STAY AWAY!!!!! ESPECIALLY IF YOU HAVE CHILDREN. DO NOT LET THE WEBSITE APPEARANCE FOOL YOU. IT'S DISGUSTING!!

Reviews.Title: “Bugs!”
Reviews.Author: PamjDV
Reviews.Content: I was not here personally but my Mother & 2 Daughters were. After a 27 hr ride from Michigan to there hitting several traffic jams along the way for Spring Break as they walked into the room at 11pm at night - they found the room had cockroaches!! They walked out of the room and cancelled their 5 night stay they had planned, my Mom managed to find a hotel for them to stay Friday night but had to waste most of yesterday ( their first official vacation day to enjoy!) trying to find a hotel with a room available for 4 nights. What a huge disappointment for all of them. They were very excited about the water park at the hotel, exhausted after the long car ride to walk into the room were they just wanted to shower & get a good nights sleep only to be greeted by cockroaches!! Don't bother if there is one cockroach there are about a thousand more, thank goodness they were not to exhausted to not notice them as soon as they walked in!

Reviews.Title: “Never again”
Reviews.Author: Stephanie C
Reviews.Content: This hotel was the WORST I have ever seen. We took our 6 year old for his first time to Disney etc! This hotel was in the WORST possible area, grounds dirty and un pleasant. We arrive after fully booking EVERYTHING months prior to be asked our first day for over $100.00 in RESORT FEES. I refused. The room itself was dirty - no linens on the bunk beds for my son - and came across crumbs in bed. The staff are NOT Friendly and not helpful. Breakfast buffet was awful. The pools were not great - stuff floating. NEVER AGAIN. Stephanie Croston

Reviews.Title: “So much fun!”
Reviews.Author: scrappingmama
Reviews.Content: The waterpark area was so much fun. The kids had a blast going down the slides and floating down the lazy river. The room was clean, comfortable and affordable. It was close to family and attractions.

Reviews.Title: “A very relaxing place for family or a romantic getaway.”
Reviews.Author: Teria76
Reviews.Content: Great location for eating, shopping, and a night out. We loved our stay at the resort!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant”
Reviews.Author: Monicablnc
Reviews.Content: After researching for a week where to stay with my family of 5, I decided to stay here due to the waterpark. My purpose for the stay was for a 3 day conference I had to attend, and wanted my family to enjoy a min vacation. The price was awesome. The room was on the second floor facing waterpark. Room was very clean, however had to ask for more towels as they always seem to give very little. Waterpark was fun, they play good music throughout the day, which I even enjoyed! I would recommend if the price is bet 60-70. Well worth it cause resort fee was waived as part of the promotion thru bookit.com. its a 15 minute drive to the convention center,downtown disney, International drive where all the resteraunts are located and some activities such as(Ripleys believe it or not) close by. all in all....good place

Reviews.Title: “A fun place for the kids but not a luxury hotel”
Reviews.Author: RICHIERICH73
Reviews.Content: Liked the bunk bed setup for some rooms and, of course, the waterpark ($15 daily resort fee not part of booking cost - we knew this going in but it could catch some by surprise.) The hotel is decidedly average with renovations needed on hallways and stairwells in particular. Rooms were OK but not special. There was a stain on our carpet but room was clean otherwise. Did not have enough towels for a family of four - had to ask EVERY DAY! for more towels. At least the customer service was quick, very polite and understanding. Bedding needs general upgrading and it was not a comfy night sleep - kids didnt complain but bunk beds were lumpy. The location seems to away from the main Kissimmee tourist areas, some 20 miles from Disney and 10-15 miles from most of the "fun" activities and stores on Irlo Bronson Blvd. At least the Florida Turnpike is adjacent to the hotel. Overall, I'd stay at this hotel again even knowing the shortcomings but it clearly is not a hotel for anybodt expecting four-star luxury!

Reviews.Title: “Coming Again!”
Reviews.Author: marcy b
Reviews.Content: I stayed here last August..the few concerns I had were outweighed by the accomodations, the fun and the staff. Actually I only had one concern..which was manifested in two ways..when I checked in I was not asked for ID..which led to the other part of the concern..I left my key in the room when I went to the front desk to ask for another key they asked me which room and just gave a key..I could have told them any room..I could have been mistaken..any number of problems could have arisen from this. Now for the staff..they were so nice..I asked for extra blankets and toiletries and they were in my room when I got back to it. The room had the best blankets and pillows..I loved the tile floors..I didnt go in the business center or the kids room but I knew they were available. The park itself was great...my grandkids are 5 and 7 and I didnt have to worry about them being dumped in the water and drowning. I am making reservations again this summer...and I will continue to come back and tell friends and relatives about this place ( all my family lives in the Tampa/Zhills area ) but I seriously ask you to reexamine your policy on ID's and giving keys to the room..If I had been staying any longer I would have done something then about it! See you in August!

Reviews.Title: “Adequate lodging but friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: 00_ArtySmarty
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a 3 story, rectangular complex with an outdoor water park/pool features in the center. The rooms opened up/faced either the parking lots or the water park. I never found the elevators, though I was told they were there (alert to anyone who has trouble with stairs). The Good: -The room appeared clean and the carpet was new. -Bedding was comfortable. -The televisions worked and had good reception. -There was a new refrigerator, microwave, and coffee maker in the room, each of which functioned great. -The water pressure and temp. in the shower were good. -Close to the highway, gas, and fast food options. -Staff was friendly and helpful. -Free wireless internet. -Easy, free, well-lit parking. The Not-So-Good: -There were a few very tiny, non-biting, ant-type insects that crawled on the bedside table. These were NOT BEDBUGS, I know what those look like and these were NOT them. But still, they created an "ick" factor. -On 2 occasions we had to ask for extra towels, even though there were only 2 of us in the room. -Most of the food close to us was fast food, very few sit down restaurants nearby. -The breakfast, which is not included in the room price, was expensive and very basic. -The exterior looks very dated and a bit grimy, even though there were clearly some updating happening in the rooms. -There was some highway noise at night, but not enough to prevent me from sleeping. Note: We did not use the water park, though there were people using it while we were there and they looked like they were having fun. Overall, I found it to be adequate for the needs of my stay. Unsure if I would stay there again unless I was planning to use the water park.

Reviews.Title: “not as good as it looks”
Reviews.Author: carrie m
Reviews.Content: Ive stayed in this hotel 3 years at the same time of year in july and the rooms are never cleaned right.You never get coffee the sheets are never chaged, the counter was never wiped off. I thought it would change the folowing year , it didnt. The worst thing was MY DAUGHTER WAS CUT ALL UP FROM THE WATER SLIDE EVERY YEAR. THEY NEED TO FIX THEM, HER BACK GOT CUT FROM THEM. SAVE YOUR MONEY.

Reviews.Title: “I made a poor choice!!!”
Reviews.Author: W A
Reviews.Content: PROS: Ride beside Florida Turnpike 15 mins to Orlando Inernational Airport Waterslides and lazy river enjoyed by children Computer free to use but must print to the front desk Bar fridge with mini freezer and mini mircrowave in room Free parking CONS: Lots of noise from the Turnpike Constant sound of fire trucks and police sirens Far from Disney (20-25 minutes on toll free road) 20 minutes to Universal Studios on Turnpike, $1.25 toll each way Waterpark open limited hours 11am-5pm, and was dirty - pool NEVER cleaned, debris everywhere Pool towels old and rarely clean Nothing looked clean...from the pool decks, grounds, hallways, lobby Homeless people with their dogs frequenting the front of the property $15 per night resort fee is unreasonable for what limited amentities they offer You must request a room on third floor to avoid traffic of people walking by Do yourself a favour and stay at a Disney resort or closeby at a hotel near Universal Studios...the saying you get what you pay for is definitely true at the Clarion....$50 per night is an attractive price point but not worth the headache!!!

Reviews.Title: “looks can be deceiving”
Reviews.Author: Rose-marie L
Reviews.Content: went there in sept. 2011 for my mom's bday with family. it was raining all weekend and our carpet in the room was soaking wet. the carpet was already torn. kitchenette area was not set up. rooms are overpriced. very deceiving trust me.not nice at all.

Reviews.Title: “do not recommend!”
Reviews.Author: Rhinosaur
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for three nights because it was included in our trip package to Orlando. Just got back from this place. I was excited to stay here at first because all the pictures seemed nice and the location looked perfect. Boy, was I wrong. We were charged waterpark fee per night even though the internet reservation (from the packaged deal) did not say anything about it. We told the resort employee that we weren't going to use the waterpark, but he said we still had to pay for it no matter what. When we finally entered the room, I found a spider and an odd crawling insect on the bathroom floor, which instantly disgusted us from the start. You cannot open the curtains or windows as it shows the outside hallway where shady young folks (which were probably also staying at this resort) were hanging out until 2-3am. I wouldn't open them during daylight either because people can stare into your room. I had a terrible time sleeping because the bed had very, very thin covers (I understand Florida is warm but still!) and the mattress seriously hurt my back. I did not get a good nights sleep. When we went to the front desk to get more towels next morning, they said they didn't have anything on hand and that they would send someone to deliver them. Of course, this took forever. The location is very inconvenient if you are trying to go to major attractions in Orlando since you will end up hitting every toll booth. There is no continental breakfast. You have to pay to eat their breakfast buffet. Never coming back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice pool”
Reviews.Author: Shirleyp37
Reviews.Content: Hotel was quiet so we had free run of the pool and waterpark. Hotel was showing it's wear, needed some fresh paint and updates but overall a nice place. Breakfast buffet was ok, liked the waffle maker. Pool was nice and heated. Watermark was good for the kids but only open 11 to 5 . A car is needed as this hotel is not near any major attractions. Staff was overall friendly and helpful . Called the front desk about the loose sink tap and issues with the phone and they were dealt with. Asked for more towels from the cleaning lady she did bring some but initially said she was off duty soon and to call the front desk. A good base hotel to stay at after a day of activities and a good value.

Reviews.Title: “Just average”
Reviews.Author: TLM2005
Reviews.Content: We stayed here by accident. By that, I mean we purchased on Hotwire before we knew the name of the hotel or its exact loacation. I am not disappointed for the price we paid, but I would not ever pay a rack rate for this hotel. We checked in late and stayed for 2 nights. This is a fairly large property and we were very disappointed when we arrived at our assigned room and the key would not open the door. I hiked back to the front desk while my wife and children stood outside. I was given new keys and hiked back to the room. Again, they did not work. Again, I hiked back to the front desk (it was like a 5-7 minute walk each way) and the front desk clerk said she would call maintenence. I hiked back to the room. We waited about 20 minutes and the guy finally showed up and he could not open the room. He was very nice and called down on his radio to have a new room assigned. He took us straight over, carried our bags, and let us in. He said he would return with our new keys. Once inside we discovered that NONE of the lights in the room worked and the room sort of smelled of smoke. When he came back and told him, he agreed with us and moved us again. He was very, very nice, its just that this whole process was sort of a pain. About 90 minutes after first checking in we are finally in our assigned room. The rooms here are not new. However, for its age they are not bad at all. They are clean and actually larger than I thought they would be. This is not a first class hotel by any means, but its a decent family MOTEL and my girls did enjoy the water park for 2 days while I was in Kissimmee on business. Not sure I would pick this if I had other options, but I would certainly return if hotwire or priceline selected it for me. All in all average or a little above, nothing bad to say at all, expcet for the location. To me this is not really Kissimmee at all. Its way out of the way and actually closer to Saint Cloud.

Reviews.Title: “Great for families on a budget”
Reviews.Author: thegroovypad
Reviews.Content: We have had a very pleasant experience here. We are currently staying and our family of 6 have had a nice stay. I have worked with Angela, who is the manager here, and told her my concerns with a family member who has asthma and one that can't walk stairs. She put us on the first floor which has tile floors, perfect for our family. It is NOT the Hilton but I am not paying Hilton prices either. Being OCD I brought my Lysol wipes to wipe down everything and the wipes were still "white" when I finished, meaning it was clean. We have two rooms which have worked out wondefully for us to have the kids in one room(adjoining) and our own private room since we are staying for 8 nights. The rooms are serviced very nice every day with everything we need, everything works well. I called to extend our stay 2 nights and Angela was very kind to give us the same rate we paid on an "advance purchase special" for the next 2 nights. I have to say I was hesitant to stay here when I saw the reviews regarding bugs and dirty sheets, since I am a VERY particular person, but there have been no site of any bugs at all in our room the entire week and the sheets have been clean. The other OCD items people posted seem really lame to me. The resort fee is $15/day, thats posted on the site, we knew about that, at the rate we got for the room the $15 is no big deal. As far as people complaining about the beds and no kleenex, they need to REALLY get a life! This was our first vacation in a very long time and it was great for our family. The kids love the waterpark although I have to say I laugh every day when I see the life guards at the waterpark with their safety floats since the water never gets over 2 ft deep and there are no lifeguards at the pool which is over 8 ft deep. Of course, at a hotel I don't expect a life guard at all so it serves as a point of humor rather then bothersome. This hotel is a little older and some of the rooms were renovated 3 or 4 years ago so be sure and ask for one of those. As far as items being stolen as posted by another reviewer, we never leave the temptation there at ANY hotel(I had things stolen at a 5 star hotel before, thus we put everything in the car and lock it), don't know why anyone would. Beds were comfortable and I slept great every night, of course we were worn out after all the fun days we had. The only thing that I wish was different is the waterpark being open longer then 11 to 5, we like to swim in the evenings when the sun isn't so hot. But the pool is open until 10. We never ate in the restaurant and we bring our own coffee brand to use so I don't know what the coffee tastes like. Additionally, there is ALL kinds of shopping and restaurants within 15 min of the hotel. We took a right out of the parking lot and traveled to Disney this way(about 20 min) and passed several groceries, 2 Walmarts, a Target, LOTS of mid grade shopping(Bed Bath Beyond, Michals, Marshals, etc) and numerous restaurants. Our travel dates were Feb 11 thru the 19th, 2012

Reviews.Title: “Beware, Items stolen !!”
Reviews.Author: cine48
Reviews.Content: I had items stolen from my room, I didn't notice until I was packing my case to leave, I tried to speak to the staff but no one was available. So emailed once I arrived home, numerous times, with no reply. I also wanted to let the staff know a insulin pen (needle) was missing, in case it had rolled under a bed and not noticed by the staff and a child or anyone was injured. But once again I was completely ignored. Once home there was nothing I could do. The whole booking was a disaster, they checked us out of our room early due to their paperwork error, the bar staff were rude. The rooms were not clean, or the pool area. DO NOT EVEN CONSIDER THIS HOTEL YOU WILL REGRET IT.

Reviews.Title: “Staff was very attentive”
Reviews.Author: Stevo5757
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel a couple of weeks ago. I was driving a moving van and had already had a long day. From the moment I checked in, I felt very welcome. There was a line but both people at front desk greeted me. When I explained that I was moving, they were so helpful about getting me a room near the truck and on lower floor. I didn't have to ask. They gave me restaurant choices without me asking too. Enjoyed the burger and fries from bar at hotel. Bartender was very friendly. Next morning, the breakfast attendant was very accommodating. She made a fresh pot of coffee for me. The breakfast buffet was large and a good buy. Eggs were cold but really enjoyed the rest. My room was well furnished, clean and very comfortable. The water park looked great but was only open from 11 am - 5 pm. That was a little disappointing because I wasn't at hotel during those times. I enjoyed my night at the Clarion and will definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Family on a budget”
Reviews.Author: chzhead2004
Reviews.Content: Clean and what we needed. After reading reviews, didn't expect much but was pleasantly surprised . Cheaper property with clean rooms. Not the Ritz but it wasn't a cheapo hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A bad "choice" of a hotel”
Reviews.Author: Lynn B
Reviews.Content: Let’s begin with the neighborhood - ghetto. Adjacent hotels are abandoned with temporary chain link fence surrounding buildings that are missing doors, windows and air conditioners. The homeless people do not seem to mind, however. Homeless people were seen bathing and doing laundry in the ponds on this Clarion property. Vacant buildings and closed businesses abound. Both pizza restaurants listed in the hotel's information binder are out of business. The overall appearance of Clarion was bad. Walls are dirty with lots of marks; concrete walkways badly pitted; vending machines dirty and out of product all week. The room was worse - carpet and furniture stained and not just a little bit but a lot stained. Neither of the AC units in our two room suite worked properly and were so dirty the front grills appeared brown, not the off white a simple wipe revealed. Maid service - towels here today, gone tomorrow. Seems like it is to much trouble to carry new towels in after removing the ones we hung to dry. Every evening was a towel surprise. Then there was the day of NO maid service at all. Code violations, I saw several. The three that stand out most were the missing strikers to gain access to enclosed fire extinguishers, chained and padlocked emergency exits and the best of all was the ice maker (which ran but did not make ice) where a 15 amp machine was attached to a 5 amp computer power strip with 2 burned out plugs dangling in an outdoor breezeway. I guess as each plug burns out they move to the next. It was on the third of five; I wonder how much the fire marshal would fine them for this fire hazard. Internet access is not dependable. Many lights in parking lot and in walkways were not working. Bad neighborhood for a poorly lit parking lot. The waterpark itself was old, faded and rusted. Skip the $8 breakfast and go to the Rodeo Dinner where the food is fresh, hot and tastes good. Overall this place is a dump. Two redeeming qualities: it is close to the Silver Spur Arena and has easy access to the Florida Turnpike. I feel given the condition of the neighborhood and this Clarion property, Choice Hotels must be planning to close this location and unwilling to do minimum maintenance much less take proper care of the place. I’m sure sometime during the last century this was a nice hotel with its own waterpark, however those days have long passed. We contacted Choice Hotels about changing hotels; we were ignored. Choice Hotels totally dropped the ball on this one.

Reviews.Title: “not clarion resort but clarion roach”
Reviews.Author: Missy V
Reviews.Content: I want to warn all!! I got up at 1:00 am and turned on the lights roaches crawling on counter and in my suitcase ran under carpet and in walls!! I told the manger (day) and she told me it was not herproblem and she did not care and the night manager would call me because it happened at night. Never heard from her!! sounds and looks great on internet but that was not the truth!! Please save your money!! alos the toilet would not flush and had to come up and repair

Reviews.Title: “Terrible service and dirty”
Reviews.Author: Charming_Chon
Reviews.Content: Overall, location is close to highway, convenient to go to Orlando or Miami. The look from the outside seems like a rundown place. The chair, couch, and carpet are dirty and have stains. Housekeepers provided bad services and didn't complete basic jobs, for example, didn't bring the trash out every day, change the pillow cases and bed sheet every 3 days I guess??? Because the stain on the pillow case was there for a couple days! No towels in the bathroom. Do I have to call the front desk to get the towels everyday ?? I do not recommend this hotel at all.

Reviews.Title: “Good for the kids”
Reviews.Author: mpharos
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Clarion resort & waterpark during our visit to Florida during the Christmas of 2011. The hotel is far from Orlando but nearer to Disney. The area where the hotel is does not feel you warm as it is far from the downtown, I mean not like downtown Orlando for example where you feel you are really spending a vacation in a touristic city. The water park is not bad, but we had some times of rain when that had to close the park. The good thing is that you can use the park till 5 pm on your day of check out. Overall, is it good for the kids, but during the peak period it is more expensive and you pay more than $15/day hotel tax only. Also, they have a rule to check in at 4:00 pm, but we could check in at 2:00 pm even though the room was not occupied. Also, there is not breakfast offered and you'll have to buy your own for about $9/person.

Reviews.Title: “Dont stay”
Reviews.Author: triphaver123
Reviews.Content: Two hours away from Disney .Poor customer service,I have no idea how Disney calls this a good neighbor .The bipolar staff really needs to be evaluated and replaced.One of the staff members flipped out when I asked her where I could fin sticks for the pool table . Someone should also speak to the courtesy bus staff for their uncontentious behavior . As well as poor staff I cant count how many gang members were on the premises....wish there was security. Very Dirty room and cleaning staff is very incompetent .Also when we got back from Disney,the room wreaked of pot like the cleaning staff smoked it in our room . No new towels and front desk wont bring them up . I had to go down and get them myself every night . Water park is GARBAGE and closes at 5????how is this ethical when they Disney bus doesn't leave Disney till 9:45.The 100 dollars we payed for it was mandatory and we couldn't even use it .Stains ALL OVER the room . And if the manager there I seen reads this dude your rude . Don't hold yourself so high on your horse its only Clarion buddy....Far away from everything .No food places within 5 miles and staff lacks any knowledge of the area. Only good thing was the hot-tub in the room . TV was static and our room trash was never removed . Fitness center had an out of order bike and situp bench .No wights or TV. A/c in our room didn't work well either . Wont come back .....too far from civilization. Don't be fooled by the false advertising and photo shopped pictures on their website . Not a good value at all .

Reviews.Title: “Mixed feelings”
Reviews.Author: Michael W
Reviews.Content: The room we stayed in had been renovated, so it was decent, but you could tell the work was done cheaply/shoddily (things like the wire channel for the bedroom light had broken loose from the wall, the balcony still had the old room number sign up [apparently they had joined two old rooms lengthwise to make the suite], the veneer on the furniture was peeling off, the balcony door wouldn't close flush allowing a draft, etc). I was happy though to have a room to fit my wife and five children (double queen suite w/ bunkbeds and pull out sofa). It had a full size fridge, sink, and microwave in the kitchenette of which we made good use. It would have been nice to have brought along a toaster (or to have had one supplied in the room). The carpets were clean, the beds were comfortable, and there didn't seem to be any bug problems for the 4 nights we stayed. We stayed during the week after Christmas so I imagine there was a high occupancy. I say that before stating that the towel situation was horrible. Daily our towels were taken as expected, but daily we had to call the front desk for towels to be replaced. Three of the four days we had to wait 30 to 90 minutes to have towels brought up which normally I wouldn't care about, but after having spent the day at a theme park and it being after 10pm... The last day we were able to get towels within 10 minutes of calling, but it would have been best if the towels were just replaced as soon as the old ones were taken. The location wasn't great for the attractions, and as much as I hate to contribute to a toll road, it was a necessity. The water park was only open from 11am to 5pm, so you can really only use it if you have an unplanned afternoon during your stay and you stay for multiple nights. The pool hours were much more liberal - I think from 8am to 10pm. The staff was very courteous. Overall, we had a decent stay, but I am not sure that we would stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Do Not Stay Here - Bugs in Beds, Resort Fee for Nothing, etc.”
Reviews.Author: mcricher
Reviews.Content: Very bad experience here, very bad. Absolutely do not stay here if you are passing thru for one night, this place is not good. * We were on our way to Miami from Georgia....arrived at 6pm and checked out next day in the morning. * BUGS - At 9 pm when my children went to bed, my 10 year old said "ow, something bit me"....there were many small bugs in the bed. YIKES! Called the front desk to ask for a new room pronto.....took 15 minutes before someone got up to our room (the guy who came to our room was nice enough, but the front desk was non-chalant....makes me suspect that a Bug Infestation is something they deal with fairly often). She did not sound surprised. At first they said "ma'am, this is Florida, we have more bugs down here than the north". I said, "hey, I live in South Georgia, I know about bugs.....a bug running across the floor is one thing, I expect that, but multiple tiny biting bugs in a bed is something totally different". She then relented and agreed to find us a new room. * RESORT (???) FEE - they charge you $15 extra for a "resort fee" (they have a nice looking water slide, lazy river pool, etc.). But the "resort" pool closes at 5pm and opens at 11am the next morning (so for anyone just staying one night....your kids cannot even USE the pool) What a Rip Off! * BAD LOCATION - almost no choices around this location to eat at....only McDonalds....so if you want anything but fast food, you got a long drive to get there. Bugs, Extra Resort Fee....no real apologies, no discounts for the inconvenience. BAD!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good value for good service and amenities.”
Reviews.Author: Yogalian_ca
Reviews.Content: Grand kids loved it and they can't wait to get back. Very good value and the service was good as well.

Reviews.Title: “bad deal”
Reviews.Author: pras2012
Reviews.Content: i booked this hotel through priceline and i was not aware about 15.00 hidden cost and service is vey bad. don't book any hotel through piceline.com

Reviews.Title: “Clarion Resort & Waterpark”
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey P
Reviews.Content: Location is to far from the Theme Parks.......................

Reviews.Title: “Well Worn Motel with Ridiculous Resort Fee”
Reviews.Author: markbyrn24
Reviews.Content: Fortunately I was able to get a room at $20 per night but they three in a ridiculous $15 resort fee that tempered the deal. While there is a water park of sorts that somewhat justifies calling the place a resort, the property has seen better days.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, great service.”
Reviews.Author: guatemommy
Reviews.Content: This hotel far exceeded expectations after reading the many not-so-favorable reviews. The room was spacious, clean, recently remodeled and equipped with a 2nd sink, fridge and microwave. The water slides were great fun for our two kids and the kids activities entertained them all afternoon. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. It was a little noisy but didn't bother us at all at night. Would definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Dissapointing... Really not even close to a good stay!”
Reviews.Author: briella01
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel without reading the reviews of the hotel. When I saw the word resort and water park I thought the hotel would be nice. I mean usually resorts are well resorts! However, this hotel was one of the dirtiest hotels I have every stayed at. Yes, they do have some perks the waterpark is cute, and they allow pets. However, the room was disgusting. I am not even exaggerating. First off, they claimed to have a gym when I called and when I walked in to pay the front desk I even asked again if they had a gym and they said yes. Well they didn't say that the gym was out of order. Everything in the fitness room had an out of order sign on it. And as we were walking by everything we came across had out of order signs on it as we passed by. Plus there was no tv in the gym and it was really not good equipment to begin with. It wasn't even close to being state of the art. The room was terribly disgusting, with big stains on the floor. The lamp post was bent like someone had punched it in. The bathroom was small and dirty. The shower was simply terrible. Only was little stream of water came out of the shower faucet. They looked like they tried to decorate pretty, but it was still a throwback from the 70's. There was cobwebs in the corner of the room. The mattress was the only good thing about the whole place. It was soft and comfy. The room was also quiet, and the maids never banged on the door until we left. My husband didn't like the lighting in the parking lot. It was very creepy and there were sketchy people walking around. I asked for a first floor, and they gave us a top floor all the way on the end, and there was nobody there hardly other then the bums walking around. I also was charged a $15 resort fee on top of the room which we booked online. We weren't even using the park. They didn't have a bar open, and we still were charged a resort fee. Online they don't mention this fee. I was disappointed with this clarion. If I would have known this hotel was going to be so bad and didn't have a gym I would have stayed at the red roof two miles from where I needed to be for $20.00 or less. This was for sure the worst Clarion I have ever stayed at. I do stay at Choice hotels a lot as I am a choice card holder, but this hotel was the worst hotel I have stayed at in all of Florida. Save yourself a headache and don't bother with it.

Reviews.Title: “"A nasty old dirty Cockroach Motel"”
Reviews.Author: HollyRadar
Reviews.Content: "A nasty old dirty Cockroach Motel" Booked and paid for 2 rooms aghhhhhh!! Oh my GOD!! they could not pay us to say another night!. What a mistake I made, I looked for a location,location location thinking we could tolerate a 3 Star for one night!. Not much choice in St Cloud Florida. Warning! Do not drop a damp towel on the floor in the bathroom then disturb it again! you will find cockroaches scurrying around trying to find another hiding place....Dirty beige blankets with stains on them, dust nasty!!, white stains~~~ all over the black computer desk chair DNA everywhere!. We drove over 3 hours home and got in our shower and are shaking our luggage outside in the garden just in case anything jumps out. My husband said this was the filthiest hotel he ever slept in, for me it was second worst the worst was in Belgium in 1975 with rats running through the walls. When I reserved the room I did NOT look at the Tripadvisor reviews first! a big mistake. I did call the Hotel reception and talked with a very pleasant operator and asked " do you have recently re-furbished rooms?" YES she said, we have re-done 2-3 buildings OK than I want one of those I stated, only a very clean room please, she assured me that it would be!. liar....... We had my Granddaughters Play to attend at 2.pm Dinner at 6pm and the Philharmonic at 8pm so had little time, to examine, complain or inspect or find another hotel. Husband slept in room next to us with my Son in Law two doubles, lets say he is not happy with me today, I am humiliated to have subjected my relatives it this. This is not a resort!, no way the pool looks clean,but they charge extra for it daily and, they have a person on a megaphone blaring out supposed contests in the pool first thing in the am, so no sleeping in. By the way I saw about 15-20 cars in the un-kempt dary unsafe looking parking lot and about 3 people in the pool!...... In case the supposed manager answers this, I have read your previous comments and can only figure you must have recently arrived and lived in a Third world county because this MOTEL is indefensible in the United States of AMERICA. Clarion Hotels need to Bulldoze it NOW!.

Reviews.Title: “Worst, most dirty, hotel I've ever stayed in”
Reviews.Author: Jessleigh109
Reviews.Content: So the pictures were maybe taken 30 years ago, this hotel is much more dirty than they suggest. The waterpark was cute, however, if you enjoy sleeping in past 9am on Saturday or Sunday don't even think about it. They start blaring music for the waterpark at about 9 am. We had 9 rooms and 6 of those 9 we had problems with, from the maids smoking pot in our room, to roaches, to stains on the bedding, it was a disgusting mess. The staff is very rude and I do not recommend this place.

Reviews.Title: “LOVE IT!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Anet R
Reviews.Content: We had the most wonderful weekend on this hotel. We stayed the weekend of Sept. 30 for my daughter's birthday and we had a blast. The room was beautiful and clean. My daughter loved the bunkbed and the queen bed was very comfortable. The water park is really fun not only for kids but for adults as well. Staff members are all very nice and helpful. I really don't understand all the bad reviews because for us was a wonderful and family fun experience. We WILL come back soon!

Reviews.Title: “BEWARE!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Amber S
Reviews.Content: House Keeping visited our room while we out to breakfast and removed personal & confidential items! We contacted hotel management and they we EXTREAMLY unhelpful & rude! We have since contacted the Sherriff's Department and the corporate off to file a police report and complaint!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel has alot a roachs.”
Reviews.Author: Joliez
Reviews.Content: The room that they give me has 6 roaches then they change me to a suite with even more roaches.

Reviews.Title: “OMG! I wish there was a lower rating”
Reviews.Author: probles
Reviews.Content: This place was horribly disgusting. Do not stay here, it will ruin your vacation. We saw a roach in our hotel room. This place is worst than any motel room in Chicago. There is nothing near the area and you will pay over the roof on taxi cabs. The pools were full of ghetto people being obnoxious. The staff doesn't really care, and the furniture is stained as well as the curatins. I couldn't even walk around bare foot- GROSS! Oh and dont' forget to look behind the tv stattion.

Reviews.Title: “Nasty Place”
Reviews.Author: John M
Reviews.Content: I thought I was going to stay at a resort. They have got to be kidding to call this 1.5 star hotel a resort. The place was dirty, hallways and balcony nasty and debris all over. They charged $ 15.00 per day for resort fees for parking, internet and waterpark. The internet did not work, the waterpark is for kids, and parking was out in the open. I could have parked at Walmart just as well. What a rip-off. Anyone that says this is a great place must have never stayed at a resort before. 3 storey building with no elevator, All outside rooms, as in 1950 hotels, guest registration was a joke, the music in the waterpark was so loud you not not hear the TV. Never again Clarion Resort Waterpark !!!

Reviews.Title: “Nastiest hotel on earth!”
Reviews.Author: dbrown15
Reviews.Content: So I found a huge stain on my blanket at this hotel and management did nothing about it. I did not once even get an appology for that being put on my bed. Please don't stay at this hotel. I wish I would have read the reviews before I stayed here. Please take this into consideration before staying here!

Reviews.Title: “Thank you for an Exceptional Experience”
Reviews.Author: disbarbabe
Reviews.Content: This is now my 4th time at the Clarion/Waterpark. I work 24/7. I live here. I can only get away about every 3-4 months.Out of the Hundreds of locations I could go to any hotel I wish. The old adage, Location, Location, Location is far exceed by their location ;) I Need a place that has excellent guest relations, clean rooms, and most of all, a place that makes me feel safe and secure. Thank you, from the front desk rep, Julio, to the most considerate guest relations angel, Jessica!!!

Reviews.Title: “Took extra kids but adults had fun too”
Reviews.Author: Teresa B
Reviews.Content: Love Love Love this hotel. This is my new favorite place to go. Can't wait to go again and I will go again. Great rooms, great staff and love the many things to do.

Reviews.Title: “Exceeded Expectations!”
Reviews.Author: Jen A
Reviews.Content: This hotel proves you don't always get what you pay for! We were very happy with the friendliness of the staff, cleanliness of the hotel, and quality of the water park. We spent hours at the pool and slides. Everyone was very accommodating and made it a fun experience for our kids too. I appreciated having a tile floor as it helps keep it clean and with allergies too! Pets are allowed at this hotel and I could not smell odor or see any signs in both of the rooms we had. Thank you for a great experience - we'll be back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible - Not worth the price paid”
Reviews.Author: hecmallo
Reviews.Content: We open the door and we found big cockroach everywhere, unfortunately was too late to change hotels as everything was sold out due to the baseball tournament close by. The room was smelly and Water Park is a joke. You can find out better hotels for the price they charge you. The pictures look great, but the hotel it is not like in the picture, it is old and horrible. I will never stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “OMG Nasty Roach motel!”
Reviews.Author: Biylie
Reviews.Content: We had a problem with booking, no one would help us, they kept giving us phone #'s to call that were no good. We stayed anyway even though we knew it wouldn't be the greatest accommodations b/c of price. But, we were willing to put up with a little b/c hey it had a waterpark. The 1st room we got I wouldn't even let my children take there shoes off. I felt so dirty. It looks like someone had run there hands down the walk 30 times. gross. Behind the door on the wall in the bathroom there was what looked like blood all over. Gross. The AC didn't work. So we called they sent a repair man he said he fixxed it. An hour later the room still hadn't cooled off. So we went downstairs to talk to the desk and saw the AC repair man sprayed the nasty moldy water into the walkway.Gross. The gentleman said we could move b/c of the AC but made no apology about the cleanliness. So, I asked if all the rooms were like that is said just shouldn't be. It was like they get so many complaints they over look it. The new room was better... Had an ok couple of days one of the waterslides were closed the whole time we were there. The last night we came back from eating and my son opened the door with no key. My husband went to the front desk to let them know they said they would send someone down. At midnight we flipped the lever on the door to hold it closed so we could sleep b/c they had not come to fix it. In the morning when I turned the key in and asked why no one had come to fix it, she said no one put anything in the computer. Those are really just the big things.... Game room had broken machines and had a hard time getting money back from them, they never cleaned my coffee pot or left me new coffee........

Reviews.Title: “Not as Expected!”
Reviews.Author: Ed S
Reviews.Content: When we researched this Hotel the pictures looked fabulous but they turned out to be just touched up pictures. If you look close you see they are not actual pictures or they are obviously older ones because the actual room (3107) was not as advertised. The furniture i the room was outright dirty. We could not even sit on them without using bed pillows. There are also "resort" fees. I would not call this place a resort but use the word "Resort" as to last option!

Reviews.Title: “Will never consider coming back”
Reviews.Author: Michelle B
Reviews.Content: "We should have never checked in" was our statement after we turned around and checked out 2 hours later. The "Resort" if it can even be called that is run down and has seen better days. I'm here on business and my boss and I walked into our 2 different rooms and the last thing I wanted to do was set my stuff down and take off my shoes. I had no wash clothes, 2 bath towels, the couch was so stained and disgusting I would have not sat on it if it someone had paid me, and I had ants in the bed. Along with all of that, I did not feel safe or comfortable. There were threatening crowds hanging in the parking lot. Lots of beer being passed around. As a single girl I was NOT AT ALL comfortable with the area. My advice, choose another option in this town.

Reviews.Title: “"Worst Hotel Experience Ever"”
Reviews.Author: bobkillen
Reviews.Content: I am a photographer and traveling with an assistant. Our client makes all the reservations and put us up in the Clarion in Kissimmee Fl. near our assignment. This place is a pig sty. Here is what we found. The outside of the facility is filthy and in disrepair. The parking lot needs paving and stripes. The interior lobby was filthy. They gave us our rooms and which had the following conditions. 1 washcloth and one towel. Couches and chairs so filthy you could not sit on them. A broken desk chair that the maintenance man said he could no fix or replace. He was Russian, spoke broken English ( I don't speak Russian) and informed me that all the chairs in the hotel were broken. Not a good sign. Ants in one bed and unchanged linen in the other room's bed. They give you a security card that you put on your dash and tell you point blank that they have no security and whatever happens to your car and its interior is your problem. As we were unloading our equipment a tail gate party started in the parking lot with three pickups and a gang was on the second floor yelling down to them over the balcony. This was a rough looking and threatening bunch and pretty stoned. A visit to the water resort area left one wondering how this place gets by the local health department. We left, found a Hampton Inn and while 12 miles further away from my shooting assignment, it is well worth the trip and $20.00 a night less. This Clairon is a dog. Bob Killen

Reviews.Title: “Hotel stay”
Reviews.Author: Ettenan73
Reviews.Content: Nice customer service over all. The suite is spacious. Clean. Water park is sufficient if you are looking for fun in the water . It's family friendly water park. Reservation was easy and uncomplicated. The rooms we asked for were available.

Reviews.Title: “Very kid friendly”
Reviews.Author: william S
Reviews.Content: Motel with uncomfortable beds and outdated rooms , but your kids will have a blast with the water park . Note, waterpark is outdoors so be mindfull of weather when planning to stay. Our mattress was horrible so if you have a bad back plan to stay no more than 1 or 2 nights . Location was in the middle of nowhere. The area that it is located in was far from the parks , and there was a lot of homeless people at the local bus stops and stores. The lobby had no air conditioning while checking in. If you choose to stay here do it for the kids. I suggest you try Coco Keys Hotel its closer to parks and waterpark is partially indoors.

Reviews.Title: “"Best trip Ever!"”
Reviews.Author: Queenbyst
Reviews.Content: Clean recently remodled room. Affordable rate. Great Service! 4 kids range from 4- 9yo had a blast! the lazy river is only 2 feet deep so even the youngest could enjoy with few parental worries. we have all agree this will be our annual end of summer trip. only 2hr 45 mins from tampa (at the speed limit of course)!

Reviews.Title: “Kids loved it!”
Reviews.Author: LeslieFlorida
Reviews.Content: When we first arrived, I was a bit nervous. The outside of the hotel looked a little run down. However, we were pleasantly surprised when we entered our suite. It was great. Very clean, accomodated our family of eight with no difficulty. Kids loved the waterpark. Waterpark attendants were careful with checking the heights of children before they allowed them on the slides. The front desk was wonderful. Everyone was very helpful. The children enjoyed signing out games from the activity room to take back to our room. Various activities for the children during the day, hula hoop contests to coloring contests. For the price, you couldn't beat it.

Reviews.Title: “IT KEPT THE TEENS BUSY AND SMILING!”
Reviews.Author: jan w
Reviews.Content: THIS WAS THE FIRST HOTEL THAT I DIDNT HAVE to keep giving the teens money to be happy and occupied. THEY HAD THEIR SPACE AND I had mine for periods during the day. I felt the rooms were A+ and the facility spotless and safe. THE STAFF WERE FRIENDLY AND HELPFUL

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: colmc56
Reviews.Content: best hotel i have ever stayed in. fantastic staff and the waterpark well it was like a disney land Waterpark, will definately come back, fantastic!!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place!”
Reviews.Author: Kaitlyn_host
Reviews.Content: My family loved this place. We came here because I wanted to give my 4 and 6 year old a nice little vacation without paying all the prices of traditional water parks or theme parks. The Clarion was spot on. We got an awesome room with bunk beds that the kids totally loved and with a nice queen bed for my fiancé and myself. The only drawbacks were that the water park didn't open until 10am, however, the hotel pool pacified everyone until then. Also, we found that not all of the light fixtures worked, but that wasn't even a big deal. And the bunk beds were missing some pillows, and didn't come with real beddings, but just a slip-on cover for the mattress. But we had our own pillows and blankets anyway. All in all, the little drawbacks that the hotel did have were not even large enough for us to give a call to the front desk. We loved the place and will definitely visit again.

Reviews.Title: “Me and my family stayed at the clarion resort waterpark service was good, very clean,staff was very nice,i would stay there agai”
Reviews.Author: Yasmeen42
Reviews.Content: My name is yas me and my family stayed at the clarion resort waterpark july 10, 2011 service was nice,hotel was very clean,staff was very helpful and nice.l would stay there again

Reviews.Title: “WORST HOTEL EVER, CHARGED US 2 nights for 1 NIGHT”
Reviews.Author: kikismith
Reviews.Content: Do not stay here. It is a dump. It is in a very scary location, far far far away from Disney. I was in shock when we pulled up. I even made a joke to the check in lady, "does the "Disney shuttle" take a freak hour to get there" because the hotel is in the bad, not even remotely close to Disney part of town. The worst part, is they charged us for 2 nights when we only stayed one because it was such a dump. I'll be contacting my Visa company and disputing that charge immediately. Spend the extra cash and stay else where.

Reviews.Title: “Find another place to STAY!!”
Reviews.Author: BackHomeNHappy
Reviews.Content: This place is so far away from all attractions the cost is not worth it. Pay the extra $ and stay closer to the attractions. There was nothing around here but a bunch of abandoned businesses. Leave this place to the locals! I just got back from here and must say the front desk staff is rude. The best thing is the waterpark but you can go to one of Disneys waterparks and have a better variety.

Reviews.Title: “Good value!!”
Reviews.Author: CCR101
Reviews.Content: Staff was great and very helpful. Water park was fun. Very quiet at night, even by the pool. The room was ok. It was clean, bed comfy, nice flat screen tv, but the bathroom needs to be renovated. No matter what we did, whenever we took a shower the water went every where. Put towels down on the floor and that seemed to help. But other then that, it was fine.

Reviews.Title: “Bring the Bug spray!”
Reviews.Author: FloridaLolabunny
Reviews.Content: We were there with a large group,about 20 families. The water park was ok for the younger kids but the teens were not thrilled. The poolside bar had a nice happy hour. Our room had new matresses but that's the only thing in the room younger than 15 years old. The AC was noisey. The room had a bad case of roaches. I made my Hubbie put the bags back in the car as soon as we were done getting things out. They were climbing around fridge and microwave. The bathroom wall had something running down it. The staff at the front desk was nice. I did hear complaints from other families that their reservations where lost and the motel was full so they stayed elsewhere. Asked a couple employees where the washer & dryer was and they smiled at me and said "Yes" so I guess they didn't understand english to well. I won't stay there again. I had to put up with my son worrying about bugs getting into his ears all night.

Reviews.Title: “What We Expected For The Price”
Reviews.Author: IamAvalanche
Reviews.Content: The main reason we booked this hotel was the price and the water park. Our thought was that we would use the water park on the days we didn't go to Universal or after we got back. The water park is smaller than we expected but still provided hours of diversion for our two kids. The first room we where in was a double with two queen beds. The beds where fine, and the room seemed clean. However, these rooms had tile floor which picked up dirt from your shoes and would get very dirty easily. Midway through the week we decided to upgrade ($50 more a night) to a suite. The suite was great! Full sized fridge, two queen beds in one room with bunk beds and a pull out in the other. Nice carpeting too. The staff was great too. If you don't expect a five star experience, you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Choose a different Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: jglove
Reviews.Content: Our summer vacation to Orlando/Disney. Found this hotel online and figured it would be a blast for our nine year old. Good V/s Bad...This hotel is about 35 minutes from Disney. Lots of toll roads around the area. Convienient to grocery stores and restuarants if your willing to travel 10 to 15 minutes. Our room was one with two queen beds. Beds were firm but clean. Good tv and ok wifi. There were ants all along the "kitchen" sink area. The bathroom was really small and needed cleaning and major renovations. Floors were nasty...very dirty. Chair in room was filthy. Pool closed early, slides were not that great either, very disappointed in the "waterpark". My son actually got stuck on the purple slide. Pool was small and over crowded. Lawn chairs were so dry rotted I was almost afraid of falling out of them. Our biggest complaint was the hidden fees and housekeeping. We stayed for a week and had to daily ask for wash cloths and towels. Housekeeping only took out garbage, made up our beds, wiped out sink and tub and gathered our soiled towels. No clean sheets, towels or wash clothes were left for us to use the following mornings. Bathroom door handle was broken and stays in the locked position. This hotel has potential but without some major renovations, I'm afraid will soon be too run down for people to even want to stay in. If we would have seen a room here before we purchased there's no way we would have stayed here a week.

Reviews.Title: “Not worth it for the waterpark”
Reviews.Author: jib_99336
Reviews.Content: Waterpark is completely overstated in the pictures. My boyfriend and I both cut our backs on the slides. We loved how soft the bed was, but due to the waterpark not living up to expectations and having to constantly take toll roads to get anywhere we will not stay at this hotel again. Also, don't expect to be able to take a nap during the middle of the day at the hotel, the staff at the hotel blares music over the "waterpark" area and it makes it very uncomfortable to try to rest during the day. To top it off the supposedly free "highspeed" internet is anything, but highspeed. We finally took our laptop down to the front desk in order to be able to access the internet.

Reviews.Title: “Bed Bugs Room 5152”
Reviews.Author: jagr1pooh
Reviews.Content: we told the front office about the bed bugs, they were everywhere walls, beds, floor. they moved us but did not complete a report. The hotel its self was in need of repair and the place was a mess in the court area the following moring no one cleaned up after kids and parents from softball and baseball teams went crazy the night before....not much to the water park...water park water was cloudy and crowded.....NEVER Again.

Reviews.Title: “Run Forest Run!”
Reviews.Author: Bigluvr
Reviews.Content: This place was the worst! Advertisement clearly was enhanced. We were going to stay for 3 nights but left after the 1st night. Run down and disgusting. Water pressure on water slides were so low, my 6 year old got stuck. Really really sad.

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT SERVICE AND ROOMS!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: julissa2652
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend tried to surprise me with a trip to Orlando for my 21st birthday, but when we got there the hotel we were booked in (Quality Inn) had cancelled our reservation. As much as we asked for them to help us, they just left us with nothing and we needed a hotel fast as we had other plans for the rest of the night. We then called this hotel and even though it was a little bit pricier than what we wanted, we decided that it will be the best place. Upon arrival we spoke to Aida and told her what had happened to us. We were expecting for her to just shrug it off and continue the check in, but she was very sweet and brought over her supervisor to see what he can do for us. When the supervisor, Rodrigo, came by, he heard our story and saw our frustratration and went ahead and gave us a discounted rate on our stay. Everyone here is super friendly. The room we had was very clean and spacious with a balcony. We truly had a great time. The Clarion made my 21st birthday great!!!!! We will definitely return :)

Reviews.Title: “Awesome with a capital A”
Reviews.Author: johndeepwood
Reviews.Content: The waterpark is amazing and the staff of the waterpark is very friendly. I could honestly never say anything bad about the waterpark and hotel but one bad thing is the housekeeping staff very unfriendly. I think most of them don't deserve there job.but everything else is awesome I would recommend anyone looking to stay here to check in and visit the water park

Reviews.Title: “Hotel Gone Down Hill”
Reviews.Author: rto4444
Reviews.Content: May 5, 2011 Mr. Patrick Hickey, General Manager Clarion Water-park 2261 E. Irlo Bronson Highway Kissimmee, Florida 34744-4905 Dear Mr. Patrick: I am very disappointed in my last visit to your facility, April 29, 2011 – May 2, 2011. We have stayed there numerous time over the last six years and have watched the water-park develop. Your facility has continued to go down hill at a rapid rate. This last weekend we had three rooms that we covered the bills for; a king suite 3308, a twin room 3005, and a king 2106. All three were not just dirty but filthy. Secondly, the 3305 room had two dirty towels in the shower area when they took possession, the suite had sticky tables, and trash in one of the cans. On Saturday morning, as we headed to a family funeral, we called the operator from the suite to asked the cleaning folks to refold the couch in the living area after remaking it because we were not going to need it Saturday. They did not refold it. This was important as we had a family roundtable scheduled in the suite ofter the funeral. We were really set back after calling for room service after using it during our last visit to your hotel. I called to order a couple of pizzas Saturday evening. I was told by in house operator the phone did not work in the restaurant. She instructed me to walk down and place the order. I stated that was not a good plan. She then said she would place the order. I stated fine but she could not tell me what types of pizza they had. Very poor service as well as her very rude approach. We then received a call from the gentleman who made the pizzas but said we would have to come to pick them up. Very poor room service. Finally, none of the bills for the rooms were placed outside the rooms as in the past. I had to stop at the front desk for all three to be printed out. I then had my car boxed in. It was very frustrating. Also, you managed to bill both my son Robert Shelbrick and me for his room 2106. Please credit his card and send me a copy of the credit. Overall the service, cleanliness, and quality of your hotel has gone rapidly down hill. I would appreciate your comments and thoughts before I write “Trip Advisor” as I have done in the past. Please see the attached. I am not sure how many other ways you could have messed up but it was a very disappointing trip all around. We have, as stated before, have stayed at your facility numerous times in the past and have recommended to others. This will not happen again without major adjustments. Best to you. Sincerely, BOB Robert T. O'Keefe cc: Robert Shelbrick

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Spend The Weekend With The Grandkids”
Reviews.Author: vi_bound00802
Reviews.Content: Yes, the place isn't the newest on the block but there are many positive aspects to this facility. Our room was very clean with the exception of the carpet which was stained (water from little wet feet) and the desk chair (stained from wet bathing suits) but what would you expect when there is a water park in the middle of the hotel. Although the rug and chair were stained they were clean with no odors which you would get from something that was wet and left unattended. The staff was great (your wish is their command). They were "Johnny on the spot" with any requests and answers to our questions. The hotel was packed for the weekend and all of the employees took it in stride and were prompt with care of the rooms and facility. Overall a fun and relaxing weekend floating around the "lazy river" and napping in the Florida sunshine.

Reviews.Title: “Family friendly !! Lovebugs !!”
Reviews.Author: Bilfrito
Reviews.Content: This place is great for famiest looking for a deal and visiting the Orlando parks. Not so good for folks that are looking to pay little for a lot. Kids rule this place. 5-10 year olds will have a great time. Hotel can use a makeover. Most of 192 needs a facelift. The economy really shows in Orlando. Hotel only had 1 ice machine working and none of the vending machines were functional. Waterpark closed at 6pm the days we visited. We used the waterpark during the day and hit Disney/Uni during the evenings when it was cooler and most folks leaving. Hotel seemed to be filled with happy families looking for water and fun. Don't let the OCD reviews Scare you. Fun folks will find this place to be an economical alternative to cocokeys.

Reviews.Title: “STAY AWAY”
Reviews.Author: minimeinfl
Reviews.Content: Checked in for 1 night . Waterpark was closed at 7:pm until 10am {with checkout at 11}.. walked into room ..large roach in bathroom .. dead bugs in bathtub ..hair (not mine) on bathroom floor and sheets dingy...Stayed out of room as late as I could and checked out fast in AM. DIDN'T USE THE SHOWER..THATS HOW BAD IT WAS Final bill at room is 91.00 got charged 105.00 on card ..15.00 resort fee for what ..parking lot all chewed up ..

Reviews.Title: “Room filthy!!”
Reviews.Author: springhillsammy
Reviews.Content: When I went online I was hesitant to reserve a room. The comments were 50% bad. Then I remembered my sister had stayed a your water park. So I called her and asked her. She is very ,very picky and said the rooms were clean and comfortable. I went ahead and booked the room on her word. What a mistake. The room was filthy! Mold in the toilet and tub, buggers on the bathroom wall, something smeared all over the bathroom cabinet, bug wings on the bathroom floor in plain sight. The room we stayed in was on the ground floor right next to a speaker for the pool that was so loud it was disturbing. I could her the person in the adjoining room taking on the phone at 2:30 in the morning. (obviously there is insulation between rooms). Should have taken pictures to post. Just didn't think it would matter. Your website is very misleading . No gift shop, Just a room with 2 soda coolers and a few travel size toiletries for sale. The game room stole my sons money. The kids Play area was gross. When we pulled up there local drunks stumbling out of you bar lounge. The only thing good was the pool areas. Although you need to do some maintenance and repair work. We liked that very much. I can also bring my dog. Who stayed at home this time, which we usually bring( free at La Quinta ) $25 dollars extra at your resort. I really wanted to like the place. I would pay to play in the park and stay at our regular hotel LaQuinta on international. Would like to try it again , but I don't think so. Unsatisfied customer Samantha

Reviews.Title: “Best Sleep Ever”
Reviews.Author: poutababy
Reviews.Content: I've done more than my fair share of travel and I have to say-- just about the best sleep ever here at this location. Next to this location for sleeping was the Hilton at the Chicago O' Hare airport so, need I say more on that?! Our room was clean and the staff was extremely friendly. We traveled with an 8 year old and needed extra pillows, towels and blankets for our room and they came right away for us.... even being that it was 11:30 PM when we got in! The water park was nice and the 8 year old fully had a great time. My only recommendation is not to go during love bug season like we did this first week of May-- they were everywhere and extremely annoying but, no fault of the hotel. I will definitely stay here again sometime.

Reviews.Title: “50/50”
Reviews.Author: pokermike
Reviews.Content: not what we expected ! upon check in we waited in line for awhile. and i noticed people checking out early & a few complaints. i quickly searched the web from my phone for a hotel near by. but decided to give it a shot .upon entering the room we do our bed bug check it was clear but noticed the pilows covers where filthy dirty called right away.they came quickly to give us new pillows & cases.waterpark ok the water started looking brown after a few hours.waterslides ok pressure pretty poor had to push myself down. i would rent a cabana only a few there. 29 for a standard and 39 for a deluxe it comes with a fan,tv,& a table & chairs.first night we heard loud noises from the another room sounded like giant popcorn machine.was so tired fell asleep. second nite even louder & on top of that kids where running around till 1 am being as loud as kind be plus the popcorn machines noises did not sleep at all ! so i got up that morning walked around to the other side of the hotel and found the where the noise was coming from. it was a bolier/water heater room connected to my room ! when to the front desk complained a little about the noise from that room & the kids ! they took 1 night off my bill ! needs tlc maybe i would give it one more try !

Reviews.Title: “Awesome waterpark, disgusting hotel!”
Reviews.Author: gleaminx
Reviews.Content: Upon arrival, our room was not cleaned from the previous guests. We were given an "upgraded room". The "upgraded room" consisted of an old 27 inch TV but at least it faced the water park and not the parking lot. The entire hotel needs a professional cleaning, especially power washing the walkways on the 2nd and 3rd floors and stairwells, they are so disgusting, we wouldn't let our children walk on them barefoot. One of the pillows smelled like someone had menthol dip in their mouth. I'm still grossed out!!! The picture quality of the TV service and selection of channels was terrible, so bad in fact, I guess I can't hold it against them that our "upgraded room" had an old 27" TV in it. One of the channels was used as a bulletin board for the water park cafe. Too bad you couldn't read it because their anti-virus software was opened up across it alerting a virus. It is probably still there, it was all four days of our visit. The water park on the other hand was fantastic, the kids didn't care about the cleanliness of the hotel or the quality of the TV service. And to be honest, they had more fun at the water park than Hollywood Studios and Animal Kingdom. Even so, next time we head to Orlando, we will spend more money to find another hotel with a water park and one closer to Disney World. The 27 minute drive and 2 toll roads got old quick!

Reviews.Title: “Not good”
Reviews.Author: Avikpar
Reviews.Content: Rooms were not clean, smelly and bad room service.

Reviews.Title: “needs a bunch of TLC”
Reviews.Author: sarasotaflfamily
Reviews.Content: We are from Florida and take a handful of “mini-vacation” to Orlando each year. We have season packages to a couple of the theme parks and use every long weekend to get away. Our last trip, we chose the clarion resort and waterparks as our hotel. We had 4 kids ages 1.5-12 and 4 adults. We found the room to be clean but somewhat worn and the exterior of the hotel to be in need of some major TLC. Overall, the hotel was adequate and is a decent deal for the money, but when you factor in the location, it’s hard to recommend staying here. The waterpark was a different story, it is in need of a complete overhaul. There is paint and rust issues in a lot of the features of the waterpark , and most concerning even in the toddler section. The lazy river was by far the best feature, but due to overcrowding and a lack of lifeguard control over some unruly kids, it was a little beyond relaxing. In comparison, we stayed at CoCo Key hotel at the end of last year, and were blown away. They had a huge staff of lifeguards and it had much more of an waterpark feel vs the hotel with slides feeling at clarion. There was also very little if any condition issues at CoCo Key, it felt safe and was well maintained. In addition, the arcade completely blows clarion’s out of the water. Overall, the weekend wasn’t a total bust, the bigger kids were amused, but do to the location and the condition, it will be hard for us to give it a high rating, or even a positive review. A huge facelift is needed.

Reviews.Title: “the customers are animals”
Reviews.Author: gajdoszjrt
Reviews.Content: was there for the week of easter 2011 the front end staff were very nice went out of there way ... the cleaning staff was terrible in the beg... of stay but got bettter once you tipped um.. alot of love bugs by the waterslide area... was very annoying somethin needs to be done about that... 1 out of 6 ice machines worked and none of vending machines worked... room was overall clean need to get carpets converted to tile ... the main problem was thecustomers they were like animals ... they let locales in and they ruin the hotels waterpark....just no respect at all need more security.. need to come up with a plan for the tubes in the pool... certain people think they owned um it was ridiculous... nice place though overall for the price... i think if they kept the waterpark to guests only it would be a whole lot better

Reviews.Title: “Not again”
Reviews.Author: CanandaiguaVaca_time
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very dirty. Has a cool waterpark that closed at 6pm, not how you explain that to kids. Beds were comfortable and clean. Public areas and walls could use a good clean and paint touch up. Walls very thin and could hear other rooms/ car doors all through brief stay.

Reviews.Title: “Look elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: yankeesrbest
Reviews.Content: We had decided to extend our annual Florida trip by one day. Searching through various travel sites, we came across what loked like an exceptional opportunity. Instead all we discovered was disappointment. First, the location. Possibly the absolute worst location imaginable. Most businesses in the area have long been out of business, as such, there is nothing but abandoned storefront after abandoned storefront in the area. We actually passed the hotel more than once trying to find it, as it is set back from the lonely road, accesible only through a field of overgrown grass, dotted by old, paint-peeling statues guarding a pothole-strewn driveway. The waterpark may be entertaining, but really only for those under the age of 7. There isn't enough water flow on the slides, as such most over 50 lbs will have to "scooch" down. The lazy river is very shallow and has no real current. In stark contrast, the swimming pool is 4 ft - 8 ft, and as such is really only for those who truly have good swimming skills. The rooms are average Clarion/ Comfort Inn style rooms. As such, they were relatively clean, with no bugs. Though, the furniture, outside of the bedding did show signs of age and stains. There was no carpet in our room, likely because of the expectations of it getting wet from "waterpark"/pool use. The BIGGEST downside to this property is that there is no security for the parking lot. Eventually, we ended up talking with some of the pool patrons who lived nearby and were using the pool facilities as their own. Apparently, this pool is considered the community pool. The property truly underwhelms, in spite of the overpromising found online. It lies smack-dab in the middle of what can only be called a ghost town. The rooms are average , while the waterpark is suitable only for little ones. Older children will quickly grow bored of the facility. Much of the hotel grounds is in dire need of maintenance.

Reviews.Title: “AbSolutely, positively a geat Family getaway.”
Reviews.Author: tomahawkagator
Reviews.Content: Very hospitable, clean, comfortable, fun family getaway. The Tiki hut was a little pricey on the Food and drinks, but overall. It was a great memorable mini vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Clean & Fantastic Service!!”
Reviews.Author: RSpald1
Reviews.Content: My girlfriends and I planned a trip to Orlando and stumbled upon this hidden gem of a hotel! The rooms were clean, the staff friendly in a convenient location. My girlfriends and I were treated with friendly service and respect. I noticed they have a great children's area which will be great when I bring the family back to go to Disney World. I recommend this hotel for anyone on a budget who wants to stay in a clean and friendly facility.
