Reviews.Title: “Not suitable for adults!”
Reviews.Author: Marie154964
Reviews.Content: We picked this hotel for the last night of our trip as it had a water park and a lazy river and we thought that would be a nice way to end off - relaxing. Boy we were wrong! We got there about 1:00 pm on a Saturday afternoon and there were hundreds of screaming kids both at the waterpark and in the pool! It seems locals can purchase a day pass for $18.95 and I guess that's who most of the users were. There were no tubes left for the lazy river so finally we decided to wade around it anyway to cool off. We weren't in there two minutes when they shut it down for "maintenance". My brother had spotted a turd of you-know-what floating down the lazy river! Everyone cleared out and I guess they just added chemicals to the water because it was never drained or cleaned. We headed to the pool but the kids were going mad there - jumping in and splashing everywhere! It was as warm as a bathtub and I can just imagine the bacteria in there - I headed right for the shower! The hotels rooms were clean enough but the noise level was terrible - my sister in law, who's a former teacher, felt like she was on recess duty. This is a great place for kids but not for adults. And the fact that they sell day passes certainly added to the congestion. I would never stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “friendly service, great value”
Reviews.Author: escapefrommn
Reviews.Content: We would definitely stay here again. The employees were helpful and great with the kids, the rooms were clean and the price was right!

Reviews.Title: “This place is Great”
Reviews.Author: Yogalian_ca
Reviews.Content: The waterpark and lazy river are wonderful. The children had a great time and the staff was courteous and helpful. Had a great stay and would recommend it to anyone. Definitely will be coming here again.

Reviews.Title: “THANK YOU FOR A WONDERFUL STAY”
Reviews.Author: travelwithm
Reviews.Content: i'm a senior citizen and the staff was very helpful. The room was very nice and clean. the location was great.

Reviews.Title: “Don't waste your time or money!!!!”
Reviews.Author: flmama3
Reviews.Content: Found this place on the internet since the place we usually stay at was booked. Pictures looked nice and when I call a call center the woman I spoke to was very friendly, told me that the water park stayed open til 8pm and that it had a wonderful kids area... First of all, the pictures must of been from when they first opened... when we pulled in we kinda grossed out by hotels outward apperance, but we thought we just drove over an hour with 4 kids lets give it a try. Rooms were nice but a bit over priced. Staff was VERY unfriendly and NOT helpful at all!!! Waterpak looked as if it has never been maintained... rust on bottom of slides. Claims to be 100% non smoking area, but that was not enforced people were smoking everywhere... Not many lifeguards. No lifejackets to offer... They do not keep it clean.. My husband spotted a man opening hotel doors telling him you don't even need a key to get in!!!! NICE!! And we had stuff stolen of our table when we got up for 5 minutes to get the kids.. Before it was even dark they made annoucement waterpark was closing at 6!!! When we asked about why we were misinformed woman at front desk was very rude in telling us we were never told that!!! got call center on phone with manager and proved we were told that , got our money back and got out of that crap hole!!! Just seems like a sceevy place that you would get robbed at!!! DON"T GO!!! They should close this place down!!! IF you want to go somewhere nice then go to Orlando's COCO KEY---WAY NICER!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “WARNING - Dump Ahead”
Reviews.Author: jimw4881
Reviews.Content: 1. Tried to charge extra for waterpark, which we were not using. Failed 1 of 3 wakeup calls, breakfast at seven was not available, had to get a cover for the "sofa" since it was so stained we would not sit on it. One rude, and ignorant, staff member - the rest were nice. This place is a $29.95 per night quaility. There really are no good hotels in the area, but there are good condo and home rentals. This place says they are improved - NOT.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for our needs”
Reviews.Author: Nightowl50
Reviews.Content: First of all, if you're looking for the 4-star grand resort, this ain't your cup of tea. I was looking for a nice waterpark-style hotel to take my three boys for a quick weekend getaway without spending a fortune (see: Nick Jr. hotel). I found this hotel online, read the reviews, and got a great rate for the family suite, so we took the plunge. Getting to the hotel was no bargain. We took the exit off of I-4 and thought we were maybe 10 minutes away. Low and behold, we had to take the "road from hell" all the way down to the turnpike, and it was bumper to bumper and red-lights every 500 feet. Of course, after I asked on arrival about a different route, i was told that there was a much easier way to get there (which worked great when we left, by the way). I was nervous upon arrival because the description of my room on my confirmation differed from what I was told on the phone when I booked, but to my pleasant surprise, the room was everything we needed and more. I am a loud snorer, so it's imperative for me and my kids to sleep in separate rooms, and the description on my confirmation said "partition", not separate BR. However, the living area was indeed separated from the back bedroom, which was a huge relief. There was a 42" flat screen in the living area, along with a sofabed, a set of bunk beds, and a small kitchen (no stove). The bedroom was two queen beds, a 32" flat screen, and a balcony over the pool, which was outstanding. The only negatives were that there were no pots, pans, plates, cups, or anything in the cabinets to support the kitchen, and there was no stove for cooking. But, we made do with the microwave and eating out, and bought some plastic plates and cutlery at the dollar store. Immediately upon arrival, the kids headed for the waterpark, and we were greeted by a very friendly young lady, who checked our name off of the list and let us in the gate. The kids were occupied, so I hit the outdoor Tiki bar for a cocktail, and was taken care of very nicely by the bartender (Jessica I believe). She turned on the NCAA games for me on the TV, and I was very relaxed and enjoying myself while the kids played (my kids are 10, 11, and 14, so more than capable of playing without constant supervision; they checked in every 30 minutes with me). My only complaints about the bar were: 1)Between taking care of drink orders, serving food, and having to deal with kids wanting "virgin" frozen drinks, the bartender was a bit overwhelmed at times, and could've used a barback or another bartender, especially during the busiest time of day; and 2) The food selection was very limited, and not what I would call "bar food", save for a couple of selections (hot dogs, wings). Would've loved to have seen a more "bar-friendly" menu. And $13.95 for a cheese pizza? I know it's a resort, but come on...! Overall, we had a great stay. The bed slept very well, the A/C cooled perfectly (this is a big issue in many hotels), and the staff was very friendly. We did have a few housekeeping miscues: 1) There were no sheets between the spread and bottom sheet on the bunkbeds, so we had to call for those; 2) the spreads were "fitted", in that the corners were elastic as to fit around the mattress. This was awkward for sleeping purposes; and 3) our room was serviced on our 2nd day, but no towels were left, and we did not discover this until we were getting ready to go out for dinner, at which time I had to call twice to request towels, and finally received them about 45 minutes later, which put us behind on our dinner plans. And, on the 2nd day of housekeeping service, the young lady made up the bunk beds, but took the middle sheets that we had just requested the day before, so we had to request them again, this time at night as the kids were getting ready for bed, another delay. I finally took the sheets off of the 2nd bed in my room and used them so that the boys could go to bed. Highs and lows? The pool area was definitely great, the staff was super-friendly, and the room layout was absolutely perfect for our needs. As for lows, besides what was listed above, the wireless connection was very weak. There appeared to be three different wireless connections, but all three read "poor" when I checked their status. As a result, the computer was running very slow during the majority of our stay. Also, only one elevator (that we knew of) made it difficult to get up to the 3rd floor at times. And the arcade was a disappointment to my kids, because it was mainly games of chance as opposed to arcade-style games. We will definitely make a return visit in the future. I do want to check on one other similar-style property, but for value, comfort, and location, this hotel will be hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: “What is a resort fee?”
Reviews.Author: DonkeyHoove69
Reviews.Content: Located right off the tollway, shares a driveway with a used RV lot/mechanic, right around the corner from a jail - just in case you misbehave in the waterpark. On arrival I was charged an extra "resort fee", after doing some research I have found that travelers have paid anywhere from $8-$15/night and according to corporate (called them to complain) the resort fee is viewed as a "tax". Not exactly sure what the resort fee is applied to? The not hot-hot tub is located within the maximum security locked gate of the water park and closes at 5 PM. There is no hot tub right next to the pool, which is open later. I had no problem with my bed but the other traveler in my group woke up with small red bites all over his legs and back, glad I chose the bed I did. Had an issue with the door/roomkeys, came back from a long day and tried to get in the room and neither key cards worked. I went to the desk and was given a new card and was told not to put it by my cellphone/ in either pocket...where exactly would you like me to keep it? In my fanny pack? This new card still didn't work. I was given another new card, still didn't work. Finally the front desk called maintenance who could not fix our door locks for another half hour. Also, when we requested a rollaway bed for an extra guest we were only given a blanket. I basically walked down the waterslide/scooted down, very low water pressure. The lazy river is more like a stagnant pond. There is no current and you have to pull yourself along or walk. After viewing the stairs to the waterslide from underneath I was cautious walking up them after seeing how thin and rusty the metal is. Only good thing I can say about the waterpark is that the girl that worked in the booth was hot. There is a room on the second floor that is locked with a padlock that had a new trail of Cheetos from the stairs to the door every night. Makes me wonder if they are hiding Chester the Cheetah from the Cheetos commercials in there and he is leaving us all a sign for help. Overall the hotel is a great place to 1) harbor fugitives. 2) hide illegal immigrants. 3) rent by the hour. 4) die in a horrific waterpark accident involving a drugged up cheetah

Reviews.Title: “It Could be better”
Reviews.Author: yourtravelreviewer
Reviews.Content: I form part of travel & leisure intenational secret reviewer. we were actually making a review on this and other resort hotels in the orlando area that offers a water park. I am surprice on how the web sites show good pictures but they are far from reality. In our hotel review I have to say Clarion Resort & Water park needs to really work hard in every aspect. Service was slow and not good. cleaness was not one of there priorities. (stain on carpets, chairs and a penetrating smell of wet rug) The bathrooms were not guess friendly in cleaness. The water park needs a little updating but in all fairness the water test we performed in the pool revealed levels to be in good standing. over all rating on this resort we added and subtracted and came with a 2 star hotel in jeopardy of becoming a 1 star. This review was made with 4 different rooms in a period of two months. We will do periodically checks to give you better references in thisand other hotels. Its our mission making shure we experince first hand discomfort so you guys wont have to.

Reviews.Title: “scams”
Reviews.Author: jonathan080908
Reviews.Content: this place is a scam. they advertise one thing and deliver another. we booked a king pool view which came to 920 a week, yet when we booked online it was supposed to e 802 for the week. then there was a 10 per day resort fee which was not stated. they advertise a heated pool and waterpark which was not heated and the water was ice cold. our fist king pool view was a view of the top of a waterslide and a garage dumpster. they moved us to another king room which has a better view. the hot tub was filthy, no iron in the room, the refriderator was broken which posed a problem since we had a 4 month old baby and needed to keep her milk cold. the king bed, was simply a mattress which was placed upon 2 single size box springs so it left a 1 foot gap in the center. the end of the bed sloped so bad that our 3 year old slid off of it. we also were supposed to have room service but the staffed skipped over our room. when we asked why they said the checked out rooms get first cleanings. we booked it primarily for the pool and lazy river, which wasnt really a lazy river just a basic pool that went around the slides like a little circle but no currents. they say the waterpark is owned by a different company, so everything there costs extra. we decided to check out since the water was so cold and our 3 year old wouldnt go in it. it just wasnt worth 109 night. very dissappointed. plus the washer and dryer which you have to purchse tokens to use are located outside...very weird.

Reviews.Title: “Warning! Credit Card Fraud”
Reviews.Author: beedude1
Reviews.Content: This is to warn everyone of the problems we have had within 24 hours of returning home! THIS HOTEL CAN NOT SAY IT WAS SOMEONE ELSE! This card was only used at the front desk of this resort for so called resort fees in the last 6 full months, possibly longer, I only checked back that far. The resort fees were not the problem the stolen credit card information with a TON of on line purchases starting less than 12 hours after we checked out IS THE PROBLEM!!! We honestly would have stayed at this motel again before the phone call from our credit card company!

Reviews.Title: “Devil is in the details”
Reviews.Author: gbds193
Reviews.Content: As we walked in to the room it looked very nice. I then went to the restroom and the light would not turn on. An inconvenience but understandable. We called to get a new bulb from the front desk. It took them over an hour to bring it and in that time we found that the sink did not work correctly and the remote did not have enough battery left. We called once more and the lady at the front desk was giving me attitude about fixing these discrepancies. The waterside does not make up for these shortcomings.

Reviews.Title: “Decent price and comfortable until...”
Reviews.Author: momzluv2travel
Reviews.Content: I was'nt too pleased with the outside appearance. Upon checking in I recieved great customer service from Victor at the front desk. However, I will admit to being surprised at the inside of the room. It was roomy, a comfortable bed in addition to having a microwave, nice size TV and small refrigerator. My room didnt have any towels in the room. Therefore, I called the front desk and was told someone would be right up. Well, after almost 2 hours I never recieved the towels. Shortly after unpacking my belongings I quickly repacked them due to the fact I saw a roach! I was totally disgusted!! I've never written a review as I travel quite a bit. However, in this instance I felt compelled to add to the other reviews. I did read some of the reviews about this hotel. I though that just maybe some of these individuals were adlibbing just a tad bit. NOT!! Nevertheless, I left and stayed at a nicer hotel in Orlando. Lastly, I was able to sleep pleasantly with both eyes closed. LOL

Reviews.Title: “Never again...”
Reviews.Author: MCespedes
Reviews.Content: I got this hotel throughanother websight (Name your price)... and I got a good deal. Or so I thought. When I found out I got the rate I asked for and what hotel, I went to the hotel websight, where I was really impressed with the pictures of the rooms, clean, ceramic tile floors.. looked very nice. Wellllllllllllllll................ All I can say is the bed was very nice and comfortable. And, well thats it. The first thing we noticed when we entered the room, The carpet, it was horribly stained, not just one spot, but the entire floor. Then the couch, yep the entire thing was stained. The chair, stained.. There was also a crayon drawing on the wall. The bathroom sink wouldnt open, so we looked and found the stopper was disconnected. The shower was OK. My fiance and I live in Tampa and go to Orlando a few times a year for shows, and get a hotel to stay the night so we dont have to drive back late. That "Name your own price" sight..love them, but they may want to reconsider what Hotels they offer. I know the old saying is true, You get what you paid for.. I didnt expect the Hilton, but I did expect clean...

Reviews.Title: “Notice of resort fees!”
Reviews.Author: buffy333Florida
Reviews.Content: When we checked in, we were charged $16.95 for resort fees for use of swimming pool, even though we didn't use it. We were told that all 3rd party ( priceline, expedia, ect.) reservations were charged this fee! On their web site, it said 3 restaurants. None was open the time we were there. The room was big, but carpet has large stains. The bed looked like it was made by a child. It was confortable!

Reviews.Title: “good for families but far from the parks”
Reviews.Author: 7familytraveler
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel by mistake, thinking it was the same one as several years ago. I was disappointed by the location, which is a significant driving distance from the theme parks, but it has a nice small waterpark onsite (which we couldn't use since Florida experienced a cold snap). The bedding in the bedrooms was very nice, the sofa sleeper was tolerable, but the bunk beds are made for kids' weight, not that of an adult, and are poor quality for adult sleeping. Our adult children slept in them and complained. One son even moved the top bunk mattress down on top of the bottom bunk mattress to give it some comfort. We did like the setup of the suites which is like a small apartment. The front desk staff was extremely friendly and accomodating. However, housekeeping left much to be desired. We always seemed to have a large amount of toiletries left for us but very few bath towels, no hand towels and an occasional face cloth. Our kleenex ran out on the second day and was never replaced. Our coffee and tea supplies ran out and were never replaced, even when we left housekeeping a note. And one night we came home to find that housekeeping had left our door unlocked and just stacked a bunch of bath towels on the open sofa sleeper. So I would say to housekeeping "Wake up and smell the coffee! " We would have left a tip for better service. Also check online for discount coupons for this hotel. I doubt we would come back, our kids are too old for the water park, and we like being closer.

Reviews.Title: “First and last time”
Reviews.Author: ChrisH1970
Reviews.Content: I was staying on business, and I can handle a lot to save some money....But, one thing that I can't stand is a tub that doesn't drain. After taking my first shower in ankle deep water, I told the front desk to either fix the drain or move me to another room. Upon return, I noticed that something had been done, but the shower still wouldn't drain. There were punch holes on both sides of the bathroom door, no alarm clock and the tile floor looked so dirty that I wouldn't walk around in bare feet. After looking at my socks, I'm glad I didn't. My family was to arrive the next day for a few days at the parks, but I couldn't have them stay here. I cancelled my reservations for the rest of the stay and went elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Loads of fun and the staff was the BEST!”
Reviews.Author: enchantmentmktng
Reviews.Content: Fabulous water park and the slide were a screem!!!!! Much funner than they looked a first. Absolutely will be returning again. Staff was extremely kind and devoted their attention to our every need. Went overboard on getting us what we needed when we neede it.

Reviews.Title: “Lots of fun, and a great Resort”
Reviews.Author: Cjim
Reviews.Content: My wife and I were just there for a private party. We had a ball. The hotel staff was wonderful,and the food was good. I hope we use this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Motel instead of Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ewhite2010
Reviews.Content: This was the worst hotel i have every stayed in. It was nasty it has a bad smell the restroom by the pool was just "NASTY" there was bugs everywhere. The pictures from site tells a BOLD FACE LIE and it is not worth what you pay for it by . I stayed in motel 8 one night that was a 100 times better then this hotel and everything is aleast 20mins a way i would not recommend this hotel to a Dog

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!”
Reviews.Author: Goldie1960
Reviews.Content: We had a Family Reunion in Orlando this past weekend and we made reservations for 5 rooms, 3 of the 5 rooms had PROBLEMS! Two toliets didn't work, bathroom flooded in one of the rooms family member were moved to another room 6 hours later, the other room they repaired the toliet the next morning! The third room had ROACHES everywhere, family members moved to another hotel 2:00 a.m. in the morning, refusing to be placed in another room.. We purchased 5 tickets for a theme park from the hotel, got to the park and one of tickets had expired, luckly the park attendant was nice and accpeted the ticket because it was a group of us! We should have followed the lead of other family members who refused to make reservations at Resort, they stayed at other hotels. When we saw the location and the entrance to the hotel that should have been a clue! We felt like we were staying at a Motel 6.... We would never stay there AGAIN!

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing fun with the family!!!”
Reviews.Author: LMS7710
Reviews.Content: This was a nice little place. My boys had a great time at the water park and we enjoyed the cabanna with fan and tv. The service was great and the rooms were newly redone and very clean. Great place for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Dissapointed! pictures make this hotel appear NOT what it is!”
Reviews.Author: peanut33470
Reviews.Content: The pictures of this hotel/water park are presented with a much nicer touch than the real deal! The rooms could have been cleaner and the couch is an eyesore! FILTHY.. with stains all over it..! Also, asked for additional towels NEVER received them! As far as the water park is concerned. The lazy river had no current.. and the slides needed more water so you could actually slide down it without pushing yourself.. Even our 5 year old had to push her way down! Note- there is an additional charge to use the water park per day even if you are staying @ the hotel! Not worth it!

Reviews.Title: “Had to ask for towels”
Reviews.Author: Gymwidow
Reviews.Content: We checked in & no towels in room. Called each day in order to get towels replaced. Rooms average. Ok location.

Reviews.Title: “Fun, Affordable & Reasonable in Price”
Reviews.Author: ChrissyReen13
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay! We did a kidless weekend and was worried that other kids there would bother us, but it wasnt too bad! Our room was a king jacuzzi suite on the first floor facing the water park. It was not too loud, and were able to relax in room easily. Enjoyed the pool, wish we hit up the lazy river, but guests were treating it like a swimming pool... walking, jumping in and wading in it rather then getting a tube, sitting in it and just being lazy. We are planning another weekend here with our kids!!!

Reviews.Title: “We won't be making the same mistake again!”
Reviews.Author: gradeadna
Reviews.Content: Based on some previous travelers reviews, I was going to cancel our reservation but decided to go ahead and try it ourselves plus it was 5 minutes after 4 (which was cancel by time) so we didn't want to get hit with a fee...should have taken the fee! When we showed up at the hotel, we were charged more money than our email conf. on a hotel we already were paying too much for by the looks of the property. Our room was pretty nice with tile floors, a kitchen, a spa tub and plenty of room for our 2 toddlers and our teenage son. I was very paranoid about bugs after reading previous reviews and I did find ants by the coffee pot and by the sink in the bedroom but since it's Florida and I live here, ants are a minor issue (didn't see roaches). The tile floors were filthy and the green couches had stains. There were not ever any towels at the pool cabana yet there were plenty left on tables after pool had closed. The gameroom change mach was broken so you couldn't play and the fitness center was closed too. All of the rest. and bars closed at 10PM that were on the premises. There are no hairdryers or irons in the room and I requested a hairdryer twice and never received. To top it all off, they have the most expensive buffet breakfast which most people had turned and walked away after hearing the price. I believe it's $7.95/per adult and the tables were dirty and the floor had food all over. I will never make the mistake of not going with my gut instinct and listening to the review others have left. This hotel was a bit overpriced for just having waterslides and a jacuzzi tub. They really need to keep renovating the property and clean it up a little bit to make it worth what we paid.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jhpg73
Reviews.Content: I really enjoyed staying at your location in Kissimmee! The rooms were so clean, beautifully decorated, and the beds were so comfortable. I loved the decor of the room, I especially liked the wall locker that had internal lighting and the mirror in the wall locker, very practical for getting dressed daily. I also loved the miniature sink/kitchenette area with a refridgerator and microwave. We stayed at the Double Tree Castle Hotel in Orlando, and regretted not staying at the Clarion Resort because they did not have a microwave and refridgerator in the room. Not to mention, your hotel has a really nice waterpark and the Double tree just had a pool. We are definitely staying at the Clarion Resort for the whole time on our next family trip. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my family and friends.

Reviews.Title: “This is a great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: Suecsa
Reviews.Content: We were traveling through on our way to the Keys. Great Hotel to occupy kids!

Reviews.Title: “Great family hotel- okay location; good value”
Reviews.Author: FamilyofFiveTampa
Reviews.Content: We took a mini family vacation before our oldest started kindergarten. A friend recommended the hotel b/c of the water park. The hotel's website is a bit misleading and the front entrance by the road makes you wonder what lies in store. But we were pleased with everything else - the water park is alot of fun and has enough variety of activities to keep young kids entertained. The room is actually one of the nicest we've been in with a full size fridge. My only complaint for the room is the mattresses on the bunk beds - they were terrible. But there were two queens and the pull out sofa so we all slept well in the end. We drove to Celebration for dinner b/c there isn't much around the hotel, but it was still worth it. We went to Gatorland one day which is real close and rented a pontoon boat on Lake Toho another which is about 10 mins away. So really the locale was fine for us. We used the water park as our own theme park and not only saved money, but it was plenty for our young kids. I would definitely recommend the hotel to anyone, even if you were going to the parks. By the way, the pizza is really good!

Reviews.Title: “Great for a family getaway!”
Reviews.Author: chaos247
Reviews.Content: We wanted to have our last hurrah before school started and thought let's head to Orlando. We had a wonderful time at the pool going down the slides and around the lazy river. It was nice having two seperate water areas for the children to play at, one for the smaller kids and one for the bigger kids. My Children loved the hula hoop contest and coloring contest. The game room was also a big hit! We had our own private cabana that was equiped with a flat screen t.v. and a fan which made it very comfortable. We stayed in a suite which was very spacious, the kids loved the bunk beds. It was great having the refrigerator, microwave and countertop space. The restaraunt had a very affordable breakfast and a good selection of food. Overall the staff was very friendly and accommodating.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a family getaway!”
Reviews.Author: vfeagin
Reviews.Content: We spent 3 nights and had such a great time. This was the perfect place to take our boys for a quick vacation before school began. Our budget is very tight and we were looking for a place to stay that could entertain us the entire day. They LOVED the slides and lazy river, they played non-stop all day! I was very impressed with the cleanliness of the entire hotel and it's grounds, there were plenty of staff and they were all very friendly and helpful. We had fresh towels and a clean room every day, and the waterpark is very well cared for. We spent the evenings at downtown disney, which was aprox. a 20 minute drive depending on traffic. For the price you can't beat it, we can't wait to go back!!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is not what it advertises to be, very disappointing!”
Reviews.Author: dmhardesty
Reviews.Content: The room was not prepared. When we went to put the kids to bed at 10pm, the bunk beds and the sofa bed did not have sheets or pillows. We have to wait for over 30mins for someone to bring us those things and then had to make the beds ourselves. There was no ice machine, and ALL of the vending machines were empty. The next day we went to the "waterpark". What a joke. The lazy river wasn't even to my kids waist, and didn't push you along. If you wanted to move, you had to swim, there wasn't a flow. Then on ALL the slides there wasn't enough water pressure to even push the kids down. They all got stuck, even inside the tube slide, which was scary for my 8 year old. All in all the hotel and waterpark were a SEVERE disappointment. By the way, we travel all the time, all over the US, and this is the first negative review I have ever given. But it wasn't just disappointing to me, but also to my kids!!

Reviews.Title: “IF YOU ENJOY SLEEPING WITH BUGS AND STENCH THIS IS THE PLACE TO STAY.”
Reviews.Author: Paul12366
Reviews.Content: We Checked out faster than we checked in. We were greeted by cock roaches when we opened the door. Carpets and Furniture were all stained and the smell was horibble. If you are planning a vacation Stay Away From This Place. The pictures that were shown were not even close to what we walked into.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Family Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jennifer B
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect hotel for families we had a two room suite with bunk beds for the kids, flat screen TVs, microwave, refrigerator. The room had new carpet, bedding, and furniture and tons of space. They have a great breakfast buffet in the morning that is reasonably priced along with snack bar, and tiki bar. The pool, waterslides, lazy river, arcade, and craft room is wonderful for entertaining the kids. The stay is very friendly and accommodating, they helped us with directions, gave me milk for my daughter late at night even thought the restaurant was closed, and gave us a late check out. Our family loves this hotel we this is our second summer staying, I recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: billymoe
Reviews.Content: Accidentally reserved room for the wrong night on-line, called immediately to change date only to be told there would be a $25 cancellation fee! Rooms appointed nicely but carpets stained so badly I think a crime may have been committed in my room. They were out of towels for the pool out of ice for drinks. The clientele I believe was shipped in from local trailer parks. The water park was not too bad but don't be fooled by pictures on the website, the pictures must be 15 yrs old. Just a disappointing stay from beginning to end.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to go and leave your worries behind”
Reviews.Author: lyssa1080
Reviews.Content: The Clarion Resort was very relaxing and fun for the kids!!! As a parent it was nice to see that the resort had amenities for kids. All staff personnel were kid friendly and the food was great too. I loved the room and how comfortable it was. I have already recommended this resort to a few friends. My family is already asking to go back for our next vacation. Thank you

Reviews.Title: “Worst place even”
Reviews.Author: jamestk2000
Reviews.Content: Can't say enough bad things about this hotel (motel). Read all the reviews, and despite the many bad reviews, thought we would give it a try. Was booked for 3 nights, but only stayed one. broken safe in room, broken shower rod in bathroom. no breakfast. Worse of all was the waterpark. Staff could care less, and would rather talk with each other, than work on the slides to keep them open. Lazy river had virtually no tubes and is really small, and slides are in bad shape. Both my son's and myself, got cuts on these slides.

Reviews.Title: “Criket infested and slow front desk”
Reviews.Author: kongaca
Reviews.Content: Pros: Nice big comfy and well decorated rooms. Water park area clean and fun for the kids. Breakfast had a nice selection and well priced. Cons: Very very slow check-in and check-out since only 2 were working the desk. HUGE "cricket" problem. Don't know how they come in, but our room was infested by them. Had to move rooms when we returned, extremely exhausted, from Hollywood studios.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel with water park”
Reviews.Author: gailwinin
Reviews.Content: Check in or anything to do w/ the front desk was very, very slow. Other than that, no complaints for hotel. Bring your own floats or tubes to the lazy river. Would go there again.

Reviews.Title: “This is the place to be if you like water and great staff.”
Reviews.Author: paulie49
Reviews.Content: My family and i came for a weekend mini vacation,and the ages of the children ranged from 2 years to 17 and the adults had just as much fun as the children ,i would recommed the water park for any family thats on a budget, or just going to have big fun.Front staff was very nice and so was the housekeepers, when ever we needed anything ,Mr.Mcrimon was sure that we got it.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty and rusty Water Park, no save for anyone.”
Reviews.Author: AnneMejias
Reviews.Content: Sadly I say, did not like the Hotel, specially the Water Park, terrible, dirty water, rusty rides, room with stained carpet, room very small not even close to what you see on the web site... sorry, but no good comments for this Hotel, have good potential but I guess not good administration...

Reviews.Title: “Great for kids!”
Reviews.Author: mochaa25
Reviews.Content: We stayed in a family suite room and we absolutely loved it. The kids had so much fun at the waterpark.The location was pretty far from Disney,but we were glad that we chose to stay at the Clarion Waterpark. I already recommend this Hotel to all my friends and family.

Reviews.Title: “Clarion Hotel and Resorts in Kissimmee have everything upscale you'd look for in a Hotel”
Reviews.Author: vreal
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this Resort on numerous occasions,and each time it just got better and better,their staff was very friendly and attentive they did all that they could to make sure that our stay there was a very pleasant one,This is very Important to me and their for I will be telling all of my Friends and Business Friends of this Resort.This Resort offered everything I needed to stay Connected,productive and most of all happy.

Reviews.Title: “Great, clean and fun place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: gracemom_1
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this hotel to pretty much anyone. It is centrally located so that it is easy to access theme parks, great shopping and the convention center. Cleanliness is a big deal to me and this hotel delivers as well as having nice decor and comfortable beds. The water park is very fun and easy to keep an eye on your children. The lifeguards and staff are very attentive and friendly. I hope you enjoy your stay as much as we did. We will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again!”
Reviews.Author: Laura39_10
Reviews.Content: The photos on line are terribly misleading! I knew as soon as we pulled into the parking lot and passed homeless people standing around a barrel behind an abandoned gas station that this was not what we bargained for. We have stayed at Clarion hotels in the past and have been very satisfied. This one.....ha. The very idea that they classify this hotel as a "resort" is unbelievable. The rooms look filthy. The carpet is stained. You can barely turn around in the bathroom. The ac took about 6 hours to cool the room down. The waterpark is little more than a fancy pool area. Yes there are 3 flumes, but the lazy river around them is narrow and feels like bath water. It is also open to the public. Nice huh? I didn't realize that. It also costs $15 a day to use it. On top of that, they claim to be a smoke free resort. Well, that is a lie because there are "smokers poles" every 10 feet or so, many of them located right outside the doors to the rooms. One was on fire and nobody seemed to care. My husband went over and poured water on it so we wouldn't have to sit out there and smell it. Oh yeah, the best part was the breakfast buffet. I have never stayed at a Clarion where I have had to pay for breakfast! It has always been provided free. Well, we go down to the buffet and end up spending $26 for 4 people. The coffee was cold as was everything else on the hot bar. Then when I looked at the receipt, I saw I was charged 18% gratuity (almost $5) for a freakin buffet!! The waitress did absolutely nothing but bring me another cup of cold coffee when I complained about the first. Hindsight is 20/20. I wish we had never unpacked the car. I can tell you this. I will NEVER make this mistake again and I hope you don't either. Pay more money and go somewhere else.

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT BE FOOLED THIS IS NOT A RESORT HOTEL AT ALL !!!!”
Reviews.Author: lasorciere08
Reviews.Content: we are currently staying here because i booked over 2 months ago online true our AAA agent ,so am stuck here 7 nights , never will do that again , i am not a high maintenance high class person but this is not a resort it is not even a hotel quality it is a cheap motel....you are at the further part of kissimee in an abonded like street part of the blv right at the turnpike exit (paying turnpike also each time you go out to disney or universal) the room is very bad oh yes it is clean but the carpets are awfully stained looking very dirty and the furniture as well the front sink marble facade is almost coming down their is a uge crack on the wall of the bed , dont leave a towel on the floor on the bathroom tiny ants will get to it ....i have not seen any bugs like cockroaches yet .....thanks god i am off at disney all day and not stuck in here , at least the air conditionner in the room works not in the lobby and check in or info at lobby takes forever .....be careful they will also charge you a 15$ resort fee even if you dont use the waterpark , by the way this is not to me a waterpark but kids friendly slides not adult friendly .....to tell you how my disapointement was arriving here i cried when i saw the room after driving from quebec canada for more then 2 hole days non stop.......so remember folks this is a cheap class motel .....i took pictures and will try to upload them .....if we would have looked into booking a disney resort it wouldnt have been that much more expensive then here but much better , here no shuttles to the disney parks or elswhing on sight around the hotel your are far far from everything.

Reviews.Title: “No Do not Do it”
Reviews.Author: cmjabreu
Reviews.Content: The Hotel it self is not up to snuff with the Clarion Chain, it is dirty and falling apart ,my room was recently redone it was comfortable sleep except for the A/C cutting off in the middle of the night .We called For maintenance they never showed.every time we opened the door to leave the room it was like a kick in the face " We over paid this hotel to stay here" .,If they could get the hotel to look like my room they would at least be on track . The filth in the hall ways and the cameras made me feel I was in a risky part of the hood.The added Charge for the Water Park is a rip off I would not get caught swimming there you may or may not have amenities but the shear look of the place does not make you feel comfortable enough as to stay there and chill , Oh and by the way keep a careful tally of your items if not the may grow feet and walk right out of your room .

Reviews.Title: “Really disgusting and low standard hotel”
Reviews.Author: moofthree
Reviews.Content: I live in Florida and wanted to take my son and two other small children to do something special for his 5th bday. We live about 2 hrs away and the pictures looked great. I liked the idea that the water park was part of the hotel, because we have one child with diabetes and its nice to have refrigeration and snacks close at hand. I new right away, but it was to late to do anything about it and my kids were to excited. The elevator to our room smelled like urine and the room doors are all on the outside of the building, very route 66. The water park was small, clearly a very good fish eye photo on the website to make it appear more than it is... The lazy river is only two feet deep and very narrow and filled with double rafts that can't fit past each other. I don't know what the capacity is for this place, but let's just say I didn't enjoy the forced close proximity I had with the guests. Did I mention you did not have to be a guest of the hotel to use the facilities? They also have a general admission price for locals. Scary. After a long day of lounging in the soupy water with my new friends, at least I wouldn't have to go far for a good night rest right? Wrong! Our air conditioner didn't work properly and the room was about 80 and set to 70. There was a crack in our ceiling and in the middle of the night it started to leak water on my daughter and we had to move the bed over to the wall. None of us got a good night sleep.And that refrigeration I was so excited about? Well that shut off for a few hours too. The only reason I did not bash the staff was because when I complained about all of this to the lady at the front desk, who frankly I feel sorry for she has to work at such a hole... she sent us a free pizza for lunch. It was a charming touch that they mark you with an "X" with a permanent marker when you enter the park, instead of a wristband like most places. Classy joint. Nuff said?

Reviews.Title: “Roaches!!! Don't stay here!”
Reviews.Author: Travler500600
Reviews.Content: First night we there, we turned the lights out about 8pm to let the kids watch a movie, once we turned on the lights after the movie ROACHES were running everywhere, floors, walls, bathroom etc. !! We packed up and left at once, we had no place to stay at 11pm at night with two young children

Reviews.Title: “Nice for a One Night Stay”
Reviews.Author: jtkirkfan2002
Reviews.Content: We stopped over here on our way to Key West. It was a reasonble price for an above average amount of ammenities. There is a large pool and a mini-waterpark with 3 slides, a lazy river and a splash fun house. The room was pretty average for a Clarion, however. Another drawback was that the hotel sold day passes and season passes for the waterpark so it was more crowded than the number of hotel guests would suggest. They only had a handful of tubes for the lazy river and those lucky enough to get one hoarded it. The loud, rowdy atmosphere would have gotten old had this been a long stay, but it was fine for one night.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable for a younger family”
Reviews.Author: RealFloridaVacations
Reviews.Content: This a great hotel for for family with younger childeren. The waterpark is small but well kept and an easy place to keep an eye on the kids while relaxing by the pool. My wife and a couple of our children and six of our grandchildren (ages 8 through 13) spent three days here and had a really nice time. We had a double queen room and a suite. The rooms were clean and the suite is very spacious, great house keeping, nice amenities, the hotel is older but the awesome makes up for it. Great time at a great price!

Reviews.Title: “WARNING! This place is a dump!”
Reviews.Author: sammi824
Reviews.Content: My mother found this place online and after seeing all the wonderful pictures of the waterpark and rooms, decided it might be a good place to stay. Fifteen minutes after checking in she came to our room almost in tears and said "We don't have to stay here if you don't want to. This place is a dump." We decided that since we had already unloaded the stuff for three families in three rooms, that we would stay. We had a nice view of the toll on the highway right outside our room. My sister had the room with the view of the waterpark (after seeing her view, I am glad my room was the one overlooking the toll). She had no remote for her tv, and we all found roaches in our rooms. There is a nice swamp on one side as you drive into the parking lot and most of the businesses around are closed and have graffitti drawn all over them. This hotel is not in a good area and I would not be caught by myself in the parking lot or far from my room after dark. The water in the water park reminded me of the commercial on tv, where the guys jump into the pool filled with caramel, it is warm and feels very thick not to mention the hair and used bandaids. And the resort charges $15.00/room for the use of the water park, whether you use it or not. The pool towels are very small (more like dish towels) and they are stained and look filthy. We thought that Clarion was a good name and had a pretty good reputation. This hotel did not met our expectations of a Clarion resort, for that matter it didn't met our expectations of a Super 8. If you read all of the negative reviews about this place and still decide to stay there, well I would just have to say that I would not trust you to roll up a garden hose. I would never recommend this hotel to anyone and I will never stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare,,.. stay!! never stay again!....”
Reviews.Author: willco332k
Reviews.Content: First of all, they never ex[plain about the extra 15 bucks plus the room charges, internet pictures look really good, but what a surprise, ugly as hell, they miss a day of room clean, I tough that all ready paid for four nights! no they only charge me for three good, by friday they open my door ok what are you doing here?> lol! request a chair, for a family you need to bring your own, because they will not give you one! eat one at the time,...(only one chair) for a two queen bed room! grrrrr....noisy, small, no remote control for a TV so bring your universal remote control...!!! usually I read the reviews for the hotels but i got involved on this one because we look over the internet and my kids were really exited coming here please don't make the same mistake, hope this will help you!! TX.............

Reviews.Title: “Nice water park, hotel a disaster for Clarion”
Reviews.Author: mouse7678
Reviews.Content: I realized for the price that the motel was probably older. Well, it was! We were on the top floor and the air-conditioning did not even keep the room cool. If you moved, you sweated. It was not very clean. I had to call down for pillowcases, wash clothes and the air. The water park was nice, but extremely crowded. We will not go back.

Reviews.Title: “Flithy and Noisy-Don't waist your money!”
Reviews.Author: wdillreese
Reviews.Content: Their advertisement should specify that the water park is for children under 12 because the slides and lazy river are not for teenagers or adults the depth is only 2ft. The innertubes are the size for small children and half were busted or simi-inflated. I chose the hotel because we often go to Khalahari or Castaway Bay and thought that staying @ a waterpark hotel would give us more to do besides Disney or Universal. We were very disappointed. it is substandard @ best! There was always trash in the halls and the grounds are unkept. The floors were flithy. There were always teenagers hanging out in front of our room facing the waterpark. We had to call security every night to run them away. Some of the guests look real scary and classless and it is far from everything! If your looking good accomodations look further! This place is not cheap and trust me it is not worth what they charge! We paid over $300 for three nights (with all of the resort fees tagged on). We could've stayed @ Universal or Disney for that or a little more!

Reviews.Title: “Loud annoying music, bad waterpark slide...”
Reviews.Author: smiles2709
Reviews.Content: Arrived to hotel guest service rep was very rude. We where supposed to stay Four Nights it was awful experience. My 12 year old thought it was pretty lame. They even hurt themselves going down the slides. Parents seemed to let kids wander around by themselves causing trouble with other children. Room seemed really small overall. The outside had three full dumpsters full of trash even all over parking lot as well.I pictured a beautiful rooms inside Hotel thought it seemed more like a Days Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Great value and lots of fun, friendly staff too.”
Reviews.Author: Oceansideresident
Reviews.Content: We had a great 2 day visit with family and friends. The hotel appears a little older on the outside but the rooms had all been remodeled and were clean and nice. We rented a cabana poolside for our son's birthday and had a wonderful time. The prices were very reasonable and the staff treated us like we were VIP's. Everyone we interacted with from the hotel were very professional, helpful, and friendly. We plan on going back again!

Reviews.Title: “Horrible!”
Reviews.Author: myroomgirl617
Reviews.Content: So we show up to this "resort" yeah right! this wasn't even close to a resort! It was a craphole! You can see the highway toll booth from the parking lot! There was no air conditioning in the lobby! And, the waterpark could fit in my backyard! They make it seem like a great place on the website and all the pictures look so nice! Well, the pictures are decieving! We couldn't (wouldn't) stay there! We went in, looked around, saw it was a total dump and left! We didn't even check in! Instead we went to the "Hyatt Regency Grand Cypress" and to go from a dump to an amazing 5 star hotel there wasn't a large price difference! I would most defintley suggest the Hyatt if you are looking for a great time for all ages!

Reviews.Title: “NIGHTMARE”
Reviews.Author: disappointed2010004
Reviews.Content: The hotel is not as it appears on the website. It presents itself as a "resort", but it is more along the lines of a roadside motel. The beds for my children were not made and I had to request sheets 3 times, then make the bed myself. I requested a blanket for my children, and after 45 minutes had to call for another. The trash was not emptied unless I put it at the door. I had to carry the dirty towels to the maid, and the cleans ones to the bathrooms. The other guests were increasing loud, and the pool area was not family friendly as some adults drank beer to excess.

Reviews.Title: “READ 1 Star Reviews...ACCURATE!”
Reviews.Author: dswww
Reviews.Content: I find having gone back and reading all the one star reviews that it pretty much summarizes my experience with this place! I should have read these before I booked!!! This is my first review ever of a hotel, and I am doing it because I feel this is such a sad thing to book this hotel based on their website and you get there and it is a BITTER disappointment! Forget the fact their (2 slide) "waterpark" closes at 7pm and they could not check us in until close to that time because our prepaid room was conveniently not available. There is a very small pool with NO lifeguard and unsupervised with staff. I had to constantly get my 9 year old daughter to move away from the boisterous teenagers, which at one point were fighting and pulling each others hair. The room design and decor is good, I'll give them credit. The upkeep on the outside is poor and the driveway to get to the "resort" is like a driveway for a house so don't miss it like we did. The staff is apparently used to getting complaints, because you could just tell and when the front desk person rolled their eyes when we walked in I knew we were in for it. Some of the statue characters at the hotel were tipped over too. We finally get to our room which we were told qualifies for a waterpark view which I paid extra for and I wish I took a picture! It was a view of the end of the waterpark fence and another building to the immediate right was an unmowed area that looked scary. Not well lit at night, unemptied dumpsters, and our door would not close unless you lifted up first. No remote for tv and half the stations were more static than picture...air conditioned broken....JULY IN FL not cool!!! I could see you would get no where with the staff to complain and it is NOT worth it to pursue because these things never go anywhere. The best thing I can tell you is the website looks tempting, but resist temptation you will be sadly disappointed and frustrated!

Reviews.Title: “Don't be fooled by the pictures & price/location...this hotel so called "resort" is the pits!”
Reviews.Author: floridafamily9701
Reviews.Content: Well, we live in FL about an hour from Disney and wanted a hotel not priced over the top but with a waterpark. Saw this one and from the pictures it looked awesome, as well as the rooms. Pictures can be decieving. We arrived to a dump. The landscaping scared me and I got a bad vibe. In to check in the lady was a bit upidy but pleasent if that makes any sense. Get to our room and there was chicken bones and food under the bed etc. and black stains on the pillow cases (never in my life saw anything this gross! While my kids age 9 and 12 layed on the bed a roach crawled over my daughters stomach. That was when we called the office. They changed our room at 11pm at night (we were going to the Magic Kingdom in the morning and it was too late to deal with all this filth. The second room was just ok. The safe didn't work, the phone jack was cut and didn't work either. We didn't sleep well from thinking there was bugs crawling all over us from the 1st room. This place has pest control problems. They need to get on it. Spider webs everywhere on the balconies which you can see better at night. Just gross! The security cameras are there but it is open access to all Kissimmi prostitutes and bums. Good parts- well there are few. The music/Dj was good. The pool and slides not impressed, but ok. The kiddie area was nice. Lobby was clean. Ice machine worked good, and they comp'd our first night for us. We will not stay here again and hope people who plan their vacation read my comment and don't make the same decision to stay here, there are plenty more up the road that are much better for the same money or less.

Reviews.Title: “Ups and Downs”
Reviews.Author: a3d1218
Reviews.Content: We have planned this trip since before mothers day since it was my mothers day present to my sister and my mother for us to take the boys and have a little vacation together something we have not been able to do since we were kids and I thought this place would be great and it was in the beginning we were able to get checked in at 10:30am and we had reserved a two room suite which I made sure before I got the room it was an actual 2 room suite since we have a 20 month old it makes it easier for him to go to sleep when you can separate him from the older boys. So after we unpacked we all went down to the waterpark and had a great time then around 1pm I took the Baby up to get his nap when I got up there I noticed it was a little warm and cranked both a.c. down and put the baby down for his nap. My mom came up later and let me go back down to be with the other boys and when the baby woke up my mom went into the room to get him and he was soaking wet from sweet the room was so hot. When we called down to the front desk they said they would send someone up right away after 45 minutes and staying in a hot room with 3 kids and 3 adults we went back down to speak to the manager and she said she was sorry and would get someone up there ok so now we are waiting again this is only a 2 day vacation for us which does not leave a lot of time to do things. Now the handyman has come up and is going to fix are ac but wait a minute he has a phone call now we must wait for his phone call to be done before he continues and tells us the last person to clean the ac must have left the vents open for the hot air from outside to come in and that is should start working right away. Ok now we shall leave for a little while and then check on it when we come back the room is just as hot and we call the manager she says she can not change are room to the available suite she was holding for us just in case because there is a plumbing issue in that room and that she would send a fan up (SERIOUSLY). At this point I am almost in tears it is getting late and I am ready to pack up and leave when my mother and sister went down to talk to the manager personally we finally got her to switch us now into 2 separate rooms and that she would send someone with a cart to help us move that never happened it was ridiculous. Oh and the two roaches that we saw in are room to but ya know it is florida but rooms should be sprayed once a month at least if you are having those kind of problems and call yourself a resort. When my sister stepped outside for a moment she went downstairs and the manager happened to be walking by with a smile on her face my sister was beside herself and told her "don't smile at me", the girl I am sure did not know what to do but at this point is 9:30 at nite and we still do not have the baby to sleep because of everything are family has now been separated and she has the gull to smile about it. With a but chewing from my sister they dropped the price of the room to 73.00 and we did not have to check out until 6pm rather then 11am, free breakfast that really was not great and I am shocked that they actually charge 10.99 for this. They comped some drinks which I ordered a long Island Ice tea after everything we went through and of coarse they did not have sour mix to put in it. The waterpark is wonderful but could probably use a little more help but we did have a great time with the kids and it is the perfect size when you have a 6 year old, five year old and a baby they wore themselves out with the park and I would love to go back to that but shall never use there rooms again. So if you have a short vacation and dont want a lot of wasted time then dont stay here even the maintenace man said the place sucked!!!

Reviews.Title: “how has this hotel not been closed down by the health dept?”
Reviews.Author: waterslidecrew
Reviews.Content: the trickle of water did not propel anyone down the waterslide. kids were getting stuck and having to "scooch" down the slide. not enough employees to run the park and they would close slides because of this. the kids wanted to leave before we even checked in. stuck it out and stayed one night. woke up with bug bites. pool was untouched on a monday morning. gobs of human hair, used bandaids, cups, straws, toothpicks, puke substance by the slide and pool, bugs in the slides, used tampons and towels on the pool bathroom floor. people walking in all of it. nothing done by management(gm) and water park opened "as is". didn't try the onsite restaurant with its $12 hamburger. everything around hotel is closed up and vacant. have to drive quite a ways to find food. not a single good thing to say about this place. god help those who choose to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Roach infested Rooms!!!”
Reviews.Author: ABCD50226
Reviews.Content: This place shows nice pictures of the rooms and facilities on the Internet then when you get there its NOT nice. The water park was ok but not great. The rooms were nothing to brag about but when I spent ONE night and got up the next morning to see 3 ROACHES..well...the did it for me. I demanded our money back for the 3 nights we had already paid for. That's DISCUSTING!!!!!!!!!!! I would NEVER EVER stay here. You talk to the local people around there and they'll tell you the same thing. We left and got a room at Disney - Pop Resort. It was GREAT! No question where I'd stay if I go to Disney again.

Reviews.Title: “I would never recomend this place to...”
Reviews.Author: Jdcibaena
Reviews.Content: I would never recomend this place to anybody. The pool water was yellow, the slides dirty. I requested to check out the same day and told a staff member about the dirty water and they advised me not to let my kids or my self in the pool???!! How nasty is the place when the staff is telling you this??. I think the reason this place is the way it is is because they charge $10 for a day pass to the water park and anybody is able to get in, especially the men that are fully clothes sitting by the pool to just check on young girls and smoke. Never again. If you have a family or even alone I won't recomend this place. You get for what you pay. Lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome”
Reviews.Author: Lopez15
Reviews.Content: Best resort in Kissimmee. Went to spend the weekend with my daughter and take her to the water park. Great family and party atmosphere. My granddaughter had a ball in the children's pool. She enjoyed seeing Mindy O walking around and took pictures with her. The restaurant was excellent and the staff professional and friendly. I'm thinking about returning without my granddaughter so I can take advantage of the adult pool and slides, the music and maybe start an electric slide dance :-) Want to avoid the traffic in Orlando, go to Kissimmee, there is fun definitely happening at this resort!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Ok for famies only- cheaper hotels in the area. Small old water park. Service people are very nice.”
Reviews.Author: MichelleAB
Reviews.Content: Not great. Service people nice. Smell of rooms is like an old Lysol spray. We had two rooms while there- first was not ready at checking. Same smell. Bug spray? Saw no bugs though. Sort of a dump. Cheap place if you pay including the resort fee about 80$. Cheap alcoh. Kids everywhere, lower income and with little upbringing. Rooms are ok if you get one with tile. Good only for parents who want to relax and their kids play in water all day. Nothing is in the area. Good a/c which is important in the summer. Saturdays at the water area is packed-get a chair early. Not recommended but ok for people with little money and water is the goal of the day. Otherwise many other cheaper lower end hotels I. This same area.

Reviews.Title: “It was well Worth the Drive”
Reviews.Author: Sales305
Reviews.Content: I expected a run down hotel because of all the negative reviews I read but I decided to give it a chance so the kids could enjoy a nice weekend. In the past I have stayed in horrible hotels to 5 stars elite hotels so I was opened minded. When we checked in, the gentleman was nice enough to give us a florida resident discount, the rooms were nice and cleaned and the water park area entertained my 3, 10, and 15 year olds. It could use a little landscape help for the outside of the hotel, on the upside the turnpike and all major roads are right next door to get to disney or other destinations in minutes. For the price this place was great! Enjoyed every bit of it with the family and kids!

Reviews.Title: “DONT LET THE PICTURES FOOL YOU.”
Reviews.Author: bamerson11
Reviews.Content: lets put it this way, the only thing nice was there tv's. EVERYTHING else sucked water park was small and the lazy river is like 1 ft deep. be careful we stayed for one night and they charged my debit card for 3 nights, now there saying they dont want to refund us for the 2 nights we did not stay. MANAGMENT SUCKS THERE. The gift shop guy is creepy and hits on every girl that walks in there. It's about 30 minutes away from everything and its located right next to the jail. also the waterpark closes at 5:30 and the night life there is boring nothing to do what so ever.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was awesome, staff responsibility and services were poor.”
Reviews.Author: jlbfla75
Reviews.Content: This visit wasn't great like our previous few. Finding staff to bring us towels or even a blanket for our kids' beds was impossible. Shouldn't have to wait 2 days and send somebody down to find it ourselves. Under staffed. Also front desk should probably stop chomping on gum like a cow chewing its cud when a customer is asking for assistance. We went with friends for my 7 year old's birthday and the first night he slept under beach towels because we couldn't get blankets. There were NONE on he bunk or fold out couch. We finally got them the second night at 9:38 p.m. after calling SEVERAL times. Also, housekeeping didn't get to our room until 4:00 the next day. Apparently we weren't the only ones with the problem as my husband found some poor guy in housekeeping with pages of requests from hotel guests. I understand it's a busy Memorial Day weekend, but please staff accordingly. Also, the game room is certainly a rip off as we all know. But don't expect any of the hotel staff to take responsibility if a game eats your tokens, takes your tickets, or won't let you have a 300 ticket item, only a dozen 25 ticket items. The gameroom should also be staffed. We will probably give it another whirl, but there are other water park hotels in the area we will probably go to next time. It's all about the kids and convenience. But as far as all of the kids, they had a blast! That's what really matters.

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel and great water park”
Reviews.Author: mthubert
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a place to stay before going to my wifes aunt house and decided to give this place a try because of the water park. We had a blast with our 2 year old (almost 3) at the water park. The people were very nice and the lady at the front desk let me check out late with no fees. The room is just average but clean and for the price it was fine. The breakfest is not very good but it was priced right.

Reviews.Title: “I'll never stay here AGAIN!”
Reviews.Author: tricknoff
Reviews.Content: I'll state the facts: When we turned into the in need of repair, pot-holed driveway, my heart dropped. I could not believe I had payed my hard-earned money to stay in a dump. I tried to remain positive. There is a large clearing in front of the property that needs to be landscaped or sat on fire. For some reason, they only cut around the perimeter of this opening and leave the grass within the area to grow up and look awful. The property is lined with the hotel's mascot, Mindy-O the green octopus. There are several of these around the property. The money spent on these statues and the other statues would have been better spent on clean/soft towels and bath cloths, bug spray, and new bed linens to say the least. When we checked in, Shirley at the Front Desk was very nice. At this point, it was too late to try to find better accommodations and I knew from the looks of the place a refund was out of the question. My toddler and I stayed in the car and sent my hubby to scout the room. I was sickened just waiting in the parking lot. I had been told by front desk that she placed me by the water park as if that was a plus. I guess it was but we had to park in the rear of the building, walk through a dark corridor, and around the corner to get to our room. Not to mention we had to park near the commercial dumpsters about 8 of them that looked like they had not been dumped since New Year's. My husband and I tried to figure out if maybe they just had not paid the trash bill or if the city of Kissimmee was just slacking on their sanitation duties. The dumpsters were overflowing and the spaces in front, behind, and beside were littered with large bags of trash. My husband came back to say the room looked decent and to come inside. We did not want to make several trips so we grabbed all we could and went to the room. We did not want to risk being out and about as the neighborhood this "resort" is in is not the best. When I stepped in the room, I have to say that I was surprised to see it looked as nice as it did. We got a room with 2 standard beds, fridge, and microwave. We soon found out that our room did not have a remote for the tv or wash cloths. I did not mind the wash cloths at first because I had packed some of my own. I called the front desk and asked for both anyway. They sent the wash cloths but it took a while for them to bring the remote. When they did it was raggedy and falling apart. I was thankful that I heard the manager mutter the code because for the 4 days I stayed there my husband and I had to repeatedly reprogram the code in the remote for it to work. Which was a waste of time because, the volume of the tv came and went at will. We could turn it all the way up and it would still be silent for about 15-20 minutes before it re-gained sound only to go right back out with in a minute or so. The hotel never replenished shampoo, conditioner, or soap (again I brought my own soap so I saved myself a headache there). They brought towels everyday but no wash cloths and after that I did not even bother to ask them for any. This place has a serious roach problem. I only saw baby roaches but I still did not appreciate it and worried that I may bring them home with me. Also, the sheets felt gritty and had holes in them, I am guessing they are either from wear and tear or cigarette burns. The towels were dingy, hard, and still had spots, stains, and other foreign matter in the fibers. My son loved the water park. I thought it was nice but the kiddie area of it had poor (and on some equipment no) water flow so my son had to play in the adult section which was packed at times. The doorknob to the bathroom was barely connected and the toilet tissue roll and mount fell out the wall whenever we attempted to get toilet tissue. After this kept happening, my husband just took the roll off and placed it on the tub wall. I guess the housekeeper tired of it too because he/she just left additional rolls on the tub wall as well. Housekeeping did not "refresh" the room properly. The staff seemed to be stingy with toiletries and linens. I kept feeling things in the bed but at times was too afraid to look. The chairs in the rooms had stains and need to be replaced. It seems as if this place is in the process of re-vamping. It may be in their best interest to close until they can operate in a clean and orderly manner. The Wi-Fi is a joke. It took me about an hour to get a connection. I was kicked off several times. I finally gave up. Please don't depend on it. Please do not be fooled by the pictures this place has posted on the website. They are an utter LIE. The locks on the rooms do not work. On our last day there, we never had to use the key card. We could simply just walk in. The key card went from not working at all to the lock not working at all. If you don't mind roaches and other bugs, dirty linens (bed and bath), stained furniture, etc. this is the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Dirty run-down excuse for a hotel”
Reviews.Author: lhp76
Reviews.Content: I booked to stay at this hotel as it had it's own water-park and it looked fabulous. On arrival I was disappointed at the exterior of the hotel - rough road and a tired looking building. I had been allocated a room overlooking the "toll" road. I was told I would have a room overlooking the "waterpark". Luckily they were able to change my room. At no point during making the booking or in the confirmation of the booking was I informed I would be charged a daily rate for using their "waterpark" which is what happened when I checkd in. I refused to pay and this charged was waivered. This is not a hotel where British holiday makers stay. It's where Americans or Peurto Ricans stay. I did not hear or speak to another English person during our 11 night stay. It is not located in Kissimmee as advertised. (It's further afield towards St. Cloud) There is no where to take a stroll unless you want to walk to a petrol station or over the toll road. There is a "kitchen" area in the rooms with a microwave and fridge. However plates, bowls, knives, forks or even a spoon are not provided!! I had to ask for towels every day. Room service would remove the used ones and not replace them. The bed sheets were not changed until I asked (after 1 week) The bin was never emptied so I did it. The Rooms are a decent size and the beds are comfortable. I cannot comment on the food available in the hotel as I was not willing to try it. The gift shop was only open once during my stay. If you do decide to stay in this hotel I would recommend you hire a car as I did. It is a 45-55 minute drive to International Drive and It's 13 miles from Downtown Kissimmee. During my stay I drove a total of 647 miles.

Reviews.Title: “Not great, but not horrible eith er”
Reviews.Author: jessiep08
Reviews.Content: We are not really picky people. We have stayed at 4 & 5 star resorts in Orlanso on various ocassions for cheap. But we decided to try and save our money for attractions and shows so we did a timeshare presentation package....We checked in Wed night for a 6day5night stay. figured for the price of $179 total was worth it.....wrong! Let me tell you the good things first. The water park, it's really not as bad as I thoght it would be. Our son loved it and it was actully a great addition to what the rest of the hotel lacks. The water was clean. the exception is the hot tub the water was not hot at all. The game room is actually good too. It's been keeping our son entertained while it's been raining. The rooms have a fridge and a microwave. Now the bad, the room is less than a 2 star quality. The carpet is filthy with stains, the shower curtain is towrn, our shower flooded and finally after on the 2nd day it was fixed. I asked it to be fixed or moved. The buildings themselves are dirty and have a lot of spider webs. Not a resort at all. The bartender was more interested in setting up times to meet other guests at a local club than attending to those waiting to order food or drinks. Stay away from the lemonade in the snack shack...it's like dirty warter with lemon floavor, when I asked for something else they said that's all they had to drink but wouldnt refund my money. They cleaned the room ok but they failed to leave enough towels for us so I had to call to get extra towels and a floor mat. It's a little far down towards the end of 192. Over would we stay here again.... probably not. For the price of $19 a night with no resort fee of $8 per night, no timeshare presentation, and a room in a different location maybe. But we will mostlikely stay away from this one in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value if You're Main Focus is the Disney Parks, We had fun.”
Reviews.Author: VacationsRUs2010
Reviews.Content: Upon reading the reviews, I was really nervous as to how our stay would be. To be quite honest, it really wasn't that bad. We typically stay in 4-5 star hotels, but stayed at the waterpark for 6 days/5 nights via a timeshare program. We received free Disney park tickets for viewing an off-site resort (Vacation Village at the Parkway, which was very nice). Prior to checking in, request building 1 (where we stayed) or building 2 (most up-to-date). Also, know that they charge a daily resort fee of $15/day. The room included a microwave & refridgerator (nice option when you have children) This is an average hotel, looks like they're attempting to re-build and re-brand the hotel. We checked in on Thursday, May 20th and decided to hang-out at the pool. We have a 7 year old son that had a blast! They have 3 water slides (fun & life guards on duty), a lazy river that goes around the slides (relaxing), a hot tub, a separate pool and a kiddie area. The waterslides close fairly early (10a-6p), however, the big pool remains open later. The also had an arcade with separate staffed kiddie rooms for arts/crafts (thought that was neat). Also, we hung out at the pool the morning of our check-out. The lobby and the grounds were well maintained. They have an on-site restaurant with excellent priced options, however, we never ate there. Coffee was great and they offer buy 1, get 1 free margaritas during happy hour with a live DJ (that was fun)! Housekeeping was somewhat annoying. Although they "refreshed" the rooms everyday, we had to remind them every night to bring us new towels. The location of the hotel was yucky! LOL! It was very close to the toll road (which could be a plus based on where you're going). But there was alot of abandoned buildings and looked like they were attempting to revitalize the area. However, if you drive to 1 street over (parallel), the view is much more up-dated and nice. Overall, if you have children, want to save $$, and you're focus mainly going to the Theme Parks, I'd recommend this hotel. The staff were friendly towards us. After hanging out at the parks, we really just wanted to return for a shower and crash anyway, then get up and do it all over again (smile). If you call the hotel directly, they'll give you a rate of roughly $84/night (includes resort fee and taxes).

Reviews.Title: “Not a Reaort at all!”
Reviews.Author: HotelDetectiveGuy
Reviews.Content: I know this isn't suppose to be a five star resort but this falls short on everything promised. Upon a quick check in and a resort fee for internet that only worked a few hours at best we get to a room and noticed bugs of several kinds and dirty sheets. you will need to keep asking for clean towels due to the fact that not once were new towels placed in my room. This is a great place to stop on the way to another locations however I would never stay there again for a vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Lunagirl007
Reviews.Content: I work in the travel industry and have stayed in a variety of hotels in my line of work, from the Fairmont to the Hiltons . And in reading some of the reviews, I have to admit I was a little apprehensive about staying at the Clarion. But the rate was great and pools looked great for the kids, so we gave it ago.
