Checking in we had fast and friendly service, our kids which are 12, 10 and 1 enjoyed the water park, it definitely had something for every age from the arcade to the waterslides to the toddler spray park and for mom and dad the lazy river. Although I did go down the water slides and scraped my elbows up pretty good. A couple things I would like to see them do is maybe invest on redoing the bottom of the pools both of my girls had the the toes and a knee scraped. There was one day house keeping didn't come. And the lady that was taking care of us at the breakfast buffett was not very nice. But the next day there was someone else there and she was awesome! So for what I paid which was about 50 a night at which they threw in buffet brkfst for all, it was well worth it! And I would most defiintely stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Less than what I expected”
Reviews.Author: GlobetrekGirl
Reviews.Content: I usually see other people's negative comments and think that they're too harsh once I get to a hotel. In this case, I think most people were not harsh enough. It was a disappointing place. The room was not clean. The pool area was closed most of the time that we were there.The ice machines were broken. I was very disappointed that this place did not live up to my typical expectations for a Clarion Resort and the photos did not portray the truth. I was also surprised to find that I had to pay a resort fee when I checked in. We had specifically called and asked about this before we booked. All they could do is apologize and tell us that the person that we spoke to would be reminded about the policy, but they wouldn't reverse the fee. The internet was sporadic, with the staff admitting that it doesn't always work that well. I would not recommend this to anyone that is looking for anything but a budget motel. It is definitely not equivalent to the 3 star hotels that I'm used to.

Reviews.Title: “Will not EVER come back here!”
Reviews.Author: monalibk
Reviews.Content: Long story short, my family and I stayed here because of the water park and it was reasonably priced. We had a short stay of 3 days, on the day we were leaving we realized that ours sons nintendo DS was missing. After turning the room inside out we called the front desk who sent security to our room to check all the room entries. The hotel was unaware that my inlaws were in another room in the hotel, they had told us that someone came to the room at 9pm at night to drop off towels (without a request for any)-mind you that the same so called courtesy was not given to our inlaws. The hotel staff even admitted that the person who came in our room at night while we were in the parks was a shady character and still management could care less. We spent our last day in Florida waiting for an internal investigation that ultimately went no where. They do have a disclaimer that they are not responsible for personal belonings as with all hotels so they basically could care less. To top it off WE HAD BEDBUGS in our luggage when we arrived home AND they charged me for facility usage on the day we wasted our time with their fake investigation. THE MANAGEMENT SUCKS!!!

Reviews.Title: “They hired a great photographer...”
Reviews.Author: 2chickens
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel online on the recommendation of a family friend, who admittedly afterwards said they hadn't stayed here before. The pictures online looked great - we were traveling with several small kids and thought the water park would be a wonderful place for us to relax and the kids to play while we weren't at the theme parks. However, upon arrival, after driving for what seemed like forever, we got to the "resort" and were underwhelmed to say the least. The hotel is in a declining neighborhood, is not visually appealing, and is way overpriced for what you get. We were not told in advance about the $15/day "resort" fee, which applies even if you don't use the water park. The complimentary shuttle service runs twice a day - once at 9am and once at 9:45pm. Wow! That's super. The shower curtain was too short, and the bathroom flooded every time you took a shower. It is a hike to the parks - with the gas you spend, and the resort fee, you could stay closer for probably not much more or even the same amount. Part of our travel party stayed at the water park one day and had to evacuate due to a poop incident. We give them credit for hiring a good photographer for their online shots! We paid almost $200 to stay for two nights and know we could find a better hotel for the same price.

Reviews.Title: “NIGHTMARE”
Reviews.Author: katcarving
Reviews.Content: after driving all night . we got checked in seemed freindly and great. but surprise the grandkids wanted t o swimm pools were closed they set all day in motel, motel help said pool was closed then day after day everything seemed to be in repair the staff was not friendly and the room cleaning was a joke motel stunk bad and their breakfsst setting was a joke even after leting staff know not much was done found out motel was hot spot for female solictating

Reviews.Title: “Don't waste your money!”
Reviews.Author: cbsquare
Reviews.Content: This had to be one of the worst hotel I have ever stayed at. One of the members of the group I was with found BLOOD on the beding. When our room was cleaned they took all the towels and did not replace. The pool / waterpark , yes it could be nice but letting people pay to come in and use the facilities. It is a resort not a theme park... for public use. The resort fee please, for what the pool? that is all the hotel has to offer.

Reviews.Title: “Hidden Gem!”
Reviews.Author: MaryandSilver
Reviews.Content: clean, friendly, amazing service! kids had so much fun in the waterpark, had free face painting! girls love the hairwrap and braids, Great quality and Great Deal. fun, family place to stay! Will surely be back!

Reviews.Title: “trip of a life time!!!”
Reviews.Author: gators1289
Reviews.Content: these was one of the best vacations ever. the kids played them self to sleep ever day at the water park. if i had too do over ? in a new york minute, the rooms were very spaces. the people that work there were very friendly. help us with directions to every place we went in kissimmee parks, restaurants ect.

Reviews.Title: “very cozy and lots of fun”
Reviews.Author: shaila92
Reviews.Content: everything was great we had a blast my kids did not want to leave the rooms were very cozy and very roomy

Reviews.Title: “Best vacation in years.....”
Reviews.Author: jimbob543
Reviews.Content: Just stayed at the Clarion Hotel in Kissimmee. They have a waterpark on site and it was awesome. The kids were able to play all day long when we weren't away at Disney. Some folks told me that it was too far from Disney... but it wasn't. The ride was worth it to have the waterpark for the family.. Staff was awesome and we had a great time. We have already made a reservation for next year.

Reviews.Title: “Love this place!”
Reviews.Author: travln2bradntn
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful stay at this hotel this past weekend. Shirley @ the front desk made sure of it. The staff was wonderful, the rooms clean, the amenties where plenty, my kids had more to do than time! We can't wait until we can return this summer!

Reviews.Title: “What a great way to spend a couple of days.”
Reviews.Author: jenn01234568
Reviews.Content: I was happy that I was able to check in a little early. I had my two kids with me ages 10 and 20 months. We went for two days during spring break. I was very happy with the room. It was so nice to go to the water park be able to eat lunch there without having to leave. All of the staff was very pleasent. I usually stay home for spring break and it was so nice to be able to relax by the pool, and my kids had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “Book anywhere else”
Reviews.Author: bryanthomas
Reviews.Content: After flying to Orlando, renting a car and driving down to Kissimme, my family was excited to get checked in and down to the pool. When we pulled in to the place I knew we had made the wrong choice. The property is not well kept. Nothing like the pictures. Weeds and trash littered the grounds. If there weren't any cars or people there you would think it was abandoned, like a lot of other properties in the immediate area. It was not a "resort" scene, that's for sure. The second bad sign was when I walked in the lobby to check in there was someone there complaining to the manager. As I was checking in I could hear about all the things that were wrong with her room.. The girl who checked me in was nice, and we got our keys without a problem. The problem came when we got to our room, opened the door and there was someone's stuff all over the room. It was not vacant. No one was home, but all of their belongings were. So we loaded the car back up, drove back around to the office to get a new room. The kid behind the counter this time looked confused. He handed me another key and said "try this room". Try?? Is it vacant or not. Guess what.. it wasnt! He gave me a key to another persons room that was not vacant. The software they use at this "resort" needs an upgrade. I returned and was told "it's an honest mistake". At this point I did not feel safe checking in to another room. How many times would they issue someone else a key to my room by mistake.?? I wasn't going to let that happen. During my short time there I did notice the place looks beat. Not just the property, but the slides and the pool. And the hours wouldn't allow any time for the slides because we had planned to hit the parks. They close the slides at 5. Lame. Stay away. The place is gross and mis managed. We called an Embassy Suites and for 29 more a night stayed in a really nice place.

Reviews.Title: “Great water park, small room, strict rules”
Reviews.Author: ExcursionFamily
Reviews.Content: Our room required some fixing upon arrival (light bulb, missing TV remote, and microwave tray). The waterpark was a fantastic venue, we rented a cabana. I personally didn't like the fact that we were not allowed to bring in any outside food or drinks. The pool bar did serve drinks, but automatically added in an 18% gratuity. During the evening there was a crafts room with games, crafts, movies and someone there to create activities, this was fantastic. The service at the front desk was slow, and nothing was done by the staff about crazy people in the common area, who were yelling and dancing on the pool bar, they need a little more security, but I am sure that doesn't happen every night.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting,dirty,cheap,bad service”
Reviews.Author: orelvis
Reviews.Content: This is a dirty motel with a water park,the mattress for the bunk beds were stink and really skinny and uncomfortable,even my girls complained.The entrance of the hotel just tell you how bad the rest will be,of they do not show it in their page.Not recommended, not even if its free.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible! Dirty! Bed Bugs!! Stay Away from this Hotel”
Reviews.Author: wmcote73
Reviews.Content: We traveled here with 3 children thinking the water park would be great for the kids, or so we thought.... Hotel is run down. Rooms are dirty, and smell bad. And the worst part is there were bed bugs! we found them the first night of our stay and immediatly checked out! never even spent the night!! stay away fom this place... you will be dissapointed if you stay. there are better places in the area with NO BUGS!!

Reviews.Title: “Very Friendly and helpful employees”
Reviews.Author: kathi10
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean, but the carpet and the sofa needed replaced. They were stained . Hopefully they will expand their menu. The employees were all very friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “GROSS!”
Reviews.Author: Rubyred24
Reviews.Content: This Hotel was Gross the water park is the only good thing! We just stayed there a week ago and OMG ants crawling all over the walls, Floor has stans and gunk all over it sheets were dirty, Tub was horrible and drain was so backed up it was horrible I made my 3 kids stand on towels as I bathed them horrible, gym smelled like Mildew and the breakfast food was HORRIBLE! The Tiki bar was understaffed and the food was not good the only thing I could say is the Tiki bar bartender was as nice as could be but no other co workers would help her out so we waited over and hour to get our food that was horrible and they charge 18% gratity on it! We complained upon check out for the person behind the desk to tell us Well new managment just took over a few weeks ago.......umm that does not excuse the disqusting filth in the rooms our sons socks were black when we took them off him! Dust everywhere and other peoples items in the room left behind the maid never cleaned up before we got there Toilets were stained should have shot photos of it gross The bee's were horrible there were nests everywhere and they had been there for awhile the maintenance people left there golf carts parked outside all night ice machines had mold on them.....Nobody cleans those either gross that means you are making moldy ice cubes for people. They said they are remolding..... I think the place needs to be Completely closed and gutted out just plain nasty.

Reviews.Title: “disappointed”
Reviews.Author: mississippim0m
Reviews.Content: The location is in a declining neighborhood. You must drive several miles to find a restaurant. Our room looked out on the toll booth from the interstate. The grounds need upkeep. The front desk took 15 minutes to get 5.00 cash for change from our paying when we checked in. We reserved 2 rooms and when we checked in one room had not been cleaned . They did come and get it ready within an hour. We picked this place becasue of the the waterpark. It was fine but there were no towels the entire 3 hours we were there. We had a spacious suite that was not noisey , my only complaint would be the bedspeads seemed dingy. I would not recommend staying here if you are going to the parks (Disney/UniversaL) you will spend too much time driving and paying tolls and will not have time to use the waterpark-closes at 5 p.m

Reviews.Title: “Not all that it is cracked up to be”
Reviews.Author: nykellyfamily
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. The room was OK but the little snack shop was not open, they did not run the kids activites that were scheduled and the pools were old and they need to remodel the kids park. My kids are younger 1, 3, and 6 so I thought it would be a good idea to stay there because of the kiddie pools and activities that they had for the kids but was extremely dissapointed with the overall hotel. Not to mention kids eat free with a paying adult for breakfast which is 8.95 for a choice of lil boxed donuts, bacon, oatmeal and potatoes. It was a joke. I told management of my disappointment and they offered to take 5 dollars off the resort fee. OH WOW comeon. Save your money and stay near the attractions.

Reviews.Title: “As advertised”
Reviews.Author: PaulandNadene
Reviews.Content: This hotel is pretty much as advertised, you'll need a car, but close enough to where you want to go in Orlando and around the area.

Reviews.Title: “The hotel and waterpark is not as good as it looks, dont go here.”
Reviews.Author: lke528
Reviews.Content: We went here for our family vacation april 2009. We bought our package through expedia and they said that this wasa 3 star hotel but it was the worst hotel we ever stayed. The road to enter the hotel wasa dirt road. the landscaping was dried out and looks terrible. the room looked so old fashioned and small. It had the old fashioned air contioned unit that took up the whole wall space when you enter the room. The wall is paper thin so you constantly hear your neighbor. The kids did not enjoy the waterpark because the slide was old and didnn't make you slide at all. dont go here even though its a good price because it don't look as good as the pictures they showed online. I think they enhanced the picture. i will never go here again even if its free. oh i forgot to mention they also charge a daily fee to everyone for the waterpark even if you dont use it.

Reviews.Title: “What a great time we had here”
Reviews.Author: peanut32118
Reviews.Content: We stayed here and we all had a great time ,even though I was a little under the weather. I would recommend Carion & Waterpark to anyone who has children.Enjoyed the water park and all the great landscaping.Played the big chess board set and even stopped to have a frozen dacari at the bar,the bartender was great and helpful! They even had some fun at night for all with a comedy show! Thanks Clarion!!!

Reviews.Title: “Waterpark is a great idea”
Reviews.Author: its-me4
Reviews.Content: Was just at the Clarion Resort and Waterpark Jan 28-Feb 1/10. The idea of a waterpark hotel is great. The hotel itself needs a better sign so that you can find it, because you cannot see the waterpark as you approach and the sign just says "Clarion Resort". The address is on Irlo Bronson but the entrance isn't so there was some confusion. We could see it, but we couldn't get to it!! That has nothing to do with the hotel itself though, just a comment. The hotel was very neat and clean inside. We were given the wrong room (we had booked double queen suite but got a single queen suite) but there was no issue with getting it all fixed up. Our room seemed to have been updated with modern furniture and lcd tvs. The bed was very comfortable with nice bedding. The kitchenette was great with the full sized fridge and microwave. The waterpark was very nice too, but the operating hours were out to lunch. It was open from I believe 10:30 am or 11 am to 5 p.m. Those are the hours that most people with families are at the local Theme Parks. So we arrived at 5:05 pm only to find out we couldn't use the facilities. When we hadn't used the waterpark at all and had been there for 2 days, we decided to stay back one day and just use them. It was a bit of a rainy day (we didn't have great weather) but the 8 year old that we were with loved it. So just so you are aware, you pay to use that waterpark everyday, but if you are doing day trips, you won't be able to use it. My personal opinion is that it needs to open by 9 a.m. and stay open until 7 pm so that you can get an hour on either side of a theme park day. It would make for happy kids and happy parents. We ate at the pool snack bar and the food was good. The bartender I think was Jimmy and he was very nice. The main pool was open much later and it was very nice. The hot tub is in the waterpark area so it wasn't available outside of the waterpark hours. that too would have been nice if it was in the main pool area so that it would have extended hours. Overall we liked our room, but we really wanted to use the waterpark and had we not opted to miss a theme park day, we wouldn't have even been able to use it because of the limited operating hours. oh and the free wi-fi isn't very good. It worked well outside on our patio overlooking the pool area, but inside the rooms the signal was very weak (to the point that it just connected and disconnected over and over again).

Reviews.Title: “Would come again”
Reviews.Author: nyrestaurantowner
Reviews.Content: We recently visited the clarion water park hotel and had a very nice time. the water park was perfect for a family with small kids, and very clean. the rooms were nice, a little small but cozy. The walls were thin and we could hear every little thing going on next door, but after a quick call to the front desk there were no more problems. would recommend this hotel to families visiting the area.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel, recommended”
Reviews.Author: donnahc
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for two weeks, Great hotel, friendly and helpful staff. Clean rooms. Hotel is the far end of Kissimmee you definatley need a car to get about. Waterpark looks good never used it ourselves as we got up and went out before it opened but the main pool is open early till late. Nice shop in lobby. Rooms have fridge and microwave with coffee maker. Resort fees are 5 dollars a day which we were advised off. Launderette is open 24hrs. We recommend this hotel great value for money and we would stay there again. Thank you Clarion we had a great time and we look forward to comming back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Not What We Expected”
Reviews.Author: Buckeye_Traveller
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this "renovated" Clarion hotel, and found out that renovations were still occurring, and staff were not too accommodating. The worst was that we had used the water park for only about 1 hour, when the water park area was closed because of a storm coming in. The life guards said it would reopen after it passed. It passed quickly, but they never did reopen the water park area. We were not given a partial refund when checking out. Unfortunately we found more negatives than postives. Here they are... + Decent price for having a water park + Comfortable queen size beds - Long check-in wait - Tiled floors in room (slippery when wet) - Renovations of old hotel made place look a little dumpy - Closed water park too early and did not reopen - Water park not very big - Mindy O's - One person working at dinner time. Ordered pizza and took over an hour to bring to our table. Server was not friendly and no refills on drinks offered. Was glad to get out of there. - Breakfast buffet expensive - Location of hotel is on far end of Kissimmee, kind of out in no where

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Vacation!”
Reviews.Author: MomKat2
Reviews.Content: Out of the way location but well worth it. Clean, friendly staff and great waterpark to enjoy on down time. We had last minute reservations and they accommodated us beautifully. Being off the beaten path the price was terrific and we would definitely stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “What a great place to stay for the price!!”
Reviews.Author: bocabob1946
Reviews.Content: Have stayed here several times and everytime it has been a pleasure. Rooms are clean and neat. The staff is great! The water park is fun for the kids and heated as well!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: lwb1354
Reviews.Content: The Front desk was especially helpful with directions and places to visit. The rom was exceptional, clean, and great deal for the price. I would recommend it to anyone staying in the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “good for one night with small children.”
Reviews.Author: RonVH
Reviews.Content: for us it was a budget hotel, not nice enough for a holiday stay.

Reviews.Title: “NOT a 3 star”
Reviews.Author: bmxnana
Reviews.Content: I have to agree this definitely is NOT a 3 star resort. I didn't cry but nearly slipped and fell upon entering our room and the odor of clorox just about knocked us over. The entire tile floor was very slippery; I called the front desk and maintenance came immediately and said nothing was on the floor but neither myself or my husband could walk on the floor without slipping; we found a spray can of furniture polish on a chair and we think that is what was on the entire floor. We moved to another room upstairs and the floor was disgusting stained carpet. The elevator wreaked of oil, the walkways were very dirty.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff, food and facilities”
Reviews.Author: HackettApplewhite
Reviews.Content: Cheerful and helpful staff, great waterpark, and food that is very good for hotel food. My only complaint was the wireless internet service--extremely spotty and unreliable. Don't stay here if you are dependent on internet access. Otherwise, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: “I Cried!!!! Not A Three Star!!! Old”
Reviews.Author: FreemanR
Reviews.Content: Upon arriving at the Clarion RESORT I found it - it is directly infront of the toll collection booths and runs along the Florida Turnipike.... If you are coming from Disney World there is a Huge Billboard on the Front on mowed / unlandscaped lawn for CHEAP not surgical Vasectomies ( three star class at its best) In anycase we used Hotwire & depended on the star rating to help us find a hotel in a city be had never traveled to. This hotel is not a resort it is an old motel off the turnpike in a bankrupt area of route 192 but for your families convenience just around the corner from the COUNTY JAIL but Upon arriving there were 14 car in the entire hotel parking lot be prepared to pay a additional $15.00 Resort FEE which you will only be told about at check in... i I was given the room directly across from the toll booth, there was a dead cockroach I stepped on just aside my door, upon opening my door I found a heavily stained rug & stained couch I immediately called the front desk and Hotwire about the condition of this motel... I was in tears as the front desk girl said she would give me a new room but really didn't care - the new room was next to the childrens pool which was not working... the new room was just as stained, I could hardly open / close the door as the dented steel d oor was catching on an old rugr, the carpeting was stained from the door to the bathroom, spills throughout the room (there was a terrible odor, there were no towells, shampoos or soaps (all a requirement of a 3 star) I had to go find a maid who spoke no english to try to get towells... When we went down to the pool they had a list of 9 names we were not on it so we had to wait around for a wrist band, the pool closed 25 mintues later a little after four... BUT DON'T WORRY at 9:00 am music was blasting and the pool was open early.... This is when we left and checked into the ROSEN SHINGLE RESORT a true 4 star. I travel every week for work - stay at many Clarions and this is not a three star resort and Clarion should be ashamed for trying to pass it off for anything more then what it is - great for a family on a very small budget ...who can overlook surrounding, locations and do not understand what a star rating is based on.

Reviews.Title: “Mindy-O is great for the kids!”
Reviews.Author: south_florida_nicole
Reviews.Content: After Mindy-O's non-stop tv commercials, we caved in and went. The waterpark is not as large as it looks like on the commercials but it was still nice sized. It would probably be best for kids 10 and under. The rooms were clean and the hotel was located right off the turnpike. We stayed here and then hit Disney in the morning and then stayed at a hotel closer to Disney the next night.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to relax, yet able to have fun at a clean water park in the hotel”
Reviews.Author: monirenier
Reviews.Content: At arrival, service was fast, quick and easy, our room had an awesome decor and happy colors and comfortable beds. Location was great, easy access to the turnpike yet quite and near to all attractions. We truly enjoyed the clean water park inside the hotel, we did not know it was going to be so much fun, we recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Loads of fun for my whole family.”
Reviews.Author: FloridaDaddy
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean and well stocked. The staff was quick to atend to our needs. We enjoied the waterpark all weekend. My family and I will return soon.

Reviews.Title: “Customer Service; Above & Beyond”
Reviews.Author: NoDebt
Reviews.Content: I just returned from a business trip meeting held at the Clarion Resort in Kissimmee, FL. The hotel accommodations were perfect, from the clean, newly renovated rooms to the spacious meeting rooms & the waterpark attractions were very relaxing. Great for kids of all ages. I have to give a special "Thank You" to the President of the hotel, Marcos who went out of his way to help us out when our scheduled, confirmed & paid for transportation back to the airport left us stranded & running out of time to make our flight home. He came right over to us & offerred to personally drive us to the airport in his own car.Thanks to his generosity & concern, we made our flight home. I would definitely recommend his hotel any time! Robert H. New York

Reviews.Title: “Great place to take children”
Reviews.Author: darkcloud729
Reviews.Content: lots of fun. BUT. They could not find my reservation that I made online and they ended up billing me twice putting my account in the negative so than I got charged an overdraft fee from my bank because of it. NOT HAPPY AT ALL WITH THAT.. Other than that huge mistake the place was a lot of fun and have already told my friends about it.

Reviews.Title: “Do not believe the bad reviews!!!”
Reviews.Author: jazzmyn_luv
Reviews.Content: I almost didn't stay at the Clarion because of some of the bad reviews I read on Trip Advisor. I am so glad I didn't listen to them!! Three things: #---1 if you are going to Disney and want to be close to the parks, pick someplace closer, #2---if you are expecting the Ritz, go to the Ritz, and #3---if you are expecting a full-fledged waterpark, go to Blizzard Beach. That said, the Clarion is a great place to go with small children if you are looking for a fun getaway. The hotel is older but the rooms are clean and comfortable. I had a jacuzzi room and loved it. Great value for the price!!! I went with my 2 1/2 year old and he had a blast, as did I. The service is also very friendly. My only complaint was that the room service food was terrible. However, there are plenty of dining options in the immediate area. I highly recommend this hotel and I do plan on going back again.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous place for anyone to stay”
Reviews.Author: FloridaTripletsMom
Reviews.Content: This was one of the best values for our money in 21 years of marriage. The rooms were huge and so clean and a balcony to boot. The water park was great, we were there for hours. I would recomend this place to everyone I know. We went to Universal and Disney only took us 15 minutes to get there

Reviews.Title: “Even better than we had hoped...”
Reviews.Author: Salty3
Reviews.Content: We had a blast at the Clarion Waterpark Resort. There are some reviews on here that say that it wasn't nice, but I'm telling you that those people's standards are too high. From the time we checked in til the time we checked out, everyone was courteous and helpful. We arrived and there was a minor maintanence issue. I called the front desk and it was fixed before we got back from swimming. The waterpark was great. No, it's not a full on waterpark, but you shouldn't go expecting that. Is is more fun than just a pool? Absolutely. The lazy river was comfortable and relaxing, the slides were fun. The regular pool was just the right size and refreshing. The rooms looked exactly like the pictures. We loved every minute of it. My constructive comments aren't even that bad. The only things that we thought were odd were that the hot tub was located in the waterpark and the waterpark closed at 7pm. So it's not accessible. Not many people are going to use a hot tube in the middle of 90 degree weather during the day. Also, the game room said that it was open from 7am to 1pm. Now in a theme park town, kids aren't even going to be at the motel during those hours. And we wanted to play games when we got back. Oh well...I had never stayed on that end of 192 before, so I did get turned around a few times, because it was a little out of the way. But honestly, if you were to go through all the stoplights of Kissimmee to get to Orlando instead of just getting back on the turnpike beside the motel, it would take you longer. So, once we figured that out, everything was great. Those are minor things. It in no way would keep us from staying there again. We commend everyone that works for the motel. You are doing a great job. God Bless and we hope to stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Weekend............”
Reviews.Author: NinaMiami_9
Reviews.Content: We took our grandkids for their last weekend before the beginning of school, the Waterpark is great for the kids, the Lazy River was also nice. The wether was bad during the afternoons and since the Waterpark opens at 10:00 AM, the kids were not able to enjoy the park as much as they would have if the park had opened earlier. It might be a great thing if the Resort would open the Waterpark earlier and play around the weather.

Reviews.Title: “A very decent waterpark and Hotel, good value and a nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Jsmith01
Reviews.Content: Not sure about some of the reviewers here, we were a bit cautious because of negative reviews but found the hotel nice, clean, well priced and a good time for the kids. The three waterslides were all great for our 6 year old, able to ride all at 44 inches+. The lazy river was a lot of fun, a touch crowded at times but safe, very well policed with plenty of staff and clean except for the wristbands which curiously all fall off within minutes, especially if you use the hot tub. Plenty of free seating by the pool, you may want to rent a tube for $5 or try to get one of the free ones. Lots of fun for kids from 1-12, a bit tame for our teen. After the waterpark closes the nice main pool was still open late and not too knee jerk closing the pools at the first sign of rain like some although they did watch out for lightning. Free internet worked fine in our room, saw 4 well spaced access points. It is a bit far from Disney and very close to the Turnpike entrance, this area of town a bit rundown but all no problem, still right on 192 and the only turnpike issue was twice when emergency vehicles accessed the highway with sirens. The property is well set back and felt safe at all times including late at night. The rooms aren't huge but remodeled and nice and clean, nice beds, good linens and pillows, nice flat screen TV with plenty of channels, bathroom fine and clean, micro, fridge, safe and tiny sink, all modern, clean and nice. Not the Hyatt but better than we expected for $71 base rate, $98 after resort fee and all taxes. Considering you can use the waterpark both days the value was good, would come back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place and Easy to get to”
Reviews.Author: FLFamily04
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my husband and 2 sons, (7 & 11). We came from the Kennedy Space Center on our way to Disney and this was a great place in between. My kids loved the water park and I loved the lazy river! We didn't eat at the hotel because of the kids but found several familiar places just down the road. I highly recommend Hula's Donuts about 1/2 mile from the hotel, homemade and fresh! It was a quick 20 min expressway to downtown disney and avoided the traffic because we were going the opposite way of everyone else.

Reviews.Title: “This was a great hotel...”
Reviews.Author: hollyp02
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to take your kids, the only problen i had was that the internet didnt work in the rooms, I had togo y the lobby or pool deck.. But all in alll it was a great stay.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay!”
Reviews.Author: msv2200
Reviews.Content: Very nice stay, room was good and the waterpark was awesome! My kid had a lot fun. I would definitely stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Would Not Recommed”
Reviews.Author: SpaceCoast1
Reviews.Content: We live a short distance away and we were told that the pool stays open until 11:00pm. However, when my kids went to the pool at 8:30pm, a staff member came out with a bull horn informing all the guests that there were to many kids in the pool and some needed to get out. Needless to say, no one got out, and my children did not get to swim. Shortly afterwards, my kids came back to the pool only to be told that the pool was closing because the handle that is on the steps needed to be fixed. SO, my children did not get to swim as we were told they would be able too. The buffet was less than desired. It consisted of Fried Chicken that was in the warmer and looked soggy, their carrots and peas looked soggy, there was no soup, the one salad that they had was not desirable. The pizza looked as though it had been sitting out for a while and did not look appetizing. The buffet cost $9.95 and I'm glad we looked to see their buffet before purchasing as we ended up leaving there and going elsewhere. The toilet was very noisy. Every time the toilet was flushed it made a terrible sound, the air conditioner that ran woke my entire family up during the night due to the noise of it turning on. The waterpark was less than desired. There were not enough rafts for the lazy river which posed a problem as there were several children that did not get to use the rafts. Overall, I would not recommend this place and was very upset with my experience there. I could have / should have taken my family to Tampa and probably would have had more fun at Adventure Island. I would not recommend this hotel to any family. You may feel you're saving money due to the price (which we ended up paying $150.00 JUST FOR 1 NIGHT) but any family would be better off taking their family and money and going elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Will Stay again”
Reviews.Author: pjinokee
Reviews.Content: Rooms were nice, Staff helpful and friendly, water park was relaxing. It would be nice if they extended the hours of the water park for their onsite guests the jacuzzi would have been nice to use after long days at the theme parks

Reviews.Title: “Not in my favorites list”
Reviews.Author: seashorebreez
Reviews.Content: The service was good, but the room was not what we were lead to expect online. It was smaller & didn't have the pull-out sleeper we were counting on. It was very noisy. It was hard to get to coming from Kissimmee - the hotel sits far back off the road & it was hard to see where to turn. I didn't know I had to U-turn, so I got on the the Turnpike entrance. I had to drive to the next exit - it cost 2 tolls. Then the little access road is hard to see. I passed it in the dark.

Reviews.Title: “Poor Service is Understatement”
Reviews.Author: acerothstein2004
Reviews.Content: I arrived with a large group, and immediately upon arrival I found that the hotel "group" rates that I was quoted were HIGHER than the advertised rate for individual rooms. I was shocked, and I have still the written quote to prove this. Kathy (the marketing manager) either lied to me or just did not know her own rates. After much discussion, our rates were adjusted. The restaurant food was decent (similar to fried bar food) but the service was, to put it nicely, horrendous. The servers in the AM were not on time (we had to eat at Denny's once morning b/c we had to get to our destination by 730am - servers were late so restaurant couldnt open), not well trained and showed very little interest in being of assistance. Other than being overcharged for my rooms, the poor service is my largest complaint. I worked at a Holiday Inn in college so Ive seen firsthand (and been guilty of) mistakes in the industry. This was different - No one is perfect, but there is no excuse for not caring. Not Caring is the distinct impression that these folks gave. The WaterPark was nice (a little dirty but not too bad) but it was very cold that week so it wasnt not open for 2 of the 4 days. The rooms were generally ok (we had 20 guests and a few in my group had to switch rooms due to mildew stench, and the heating units were also very loud but at least the heat worked). The hotel is about 30 minutes from Disney, which is further than I was informed by Kathy. It's about 15 miles but this is on streets with lights so it takes a while to get around. All in all, I would not stay here again b/c there are dozens of similarly equipped hotels in this price range, and many are closer to the Disney attractions.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT "hotel" Great staff, not food friendly, AND VERYYYY FAR!”
Reviews.Author: haileysmom22
Reviews.Content: O.K I must say that I didnt go with anyreviews I read, and here's what this place is REALLY like, cause ever one here is wrong lol ( well somewhat) YES it is REALLY far from disney or anything you must shuttle to disney 9 a.m and only ONE shuttle back at 9.40pm Nothign during the day and its a 45$ cab ride back to the hotel. So if you have small kids bring a stroller so that they can at least sleep, oh and for disney bring ltos of food and water snack , everything cuase its so friggen expensive 2.00$ for a bag of chips.. lol back to the hotel tho. This is not a resort, however i had a great clean beutiful room, and waterpark was fantastic, BIG and beutiful lots to do, swim NO FOOD here tho, they have small restaurant that has a 5 itme menu, thats it, apparently walmart is 5 mins up the road, but mcdonalds across stree, i wouldnt walk anywehre tho cuase BAD neighbourhood, county jail up road, bums and watchfull people, hotel service is great and breakfast buffet is GREAT! small choice but great food kids eat free. coffee expensive lol ltos entertainment for kids. but not a SECURE HOTEL! at all, i wouldnt suggest going out after dark, unless with someone else. loud at nighttime ion the back parking ltos as its open to public. convenience store is only open certain hours so make sure you have what you need. 60$ cab ride to outlet mall. so rent a car, I spen maybe 500$ in 5 days for cabs. all in all it wasnt to bad but very very very very far from stuff,. nothing around, DONT stay unless you have a rental! trust me lol i made the mistake. IF, now i say IF, i had a rental i probably would stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Way better than reviews stated....”
Reviews.Author: jilljoe94
Reviews.Content: We had a great time, the kids loved it (ages 2 and 7), the staff was plesant and it was an overall great experience for the price. We did not do the parks and used this hotel as a mini get away... They did try to charge us an extra resort fee which we brought to the front desk and they immediately removed it so I cant complain about that but you may want to be sure and check your bill before checking out!

Reviews.Title: “Relax and play without going anywhere else”
Reviews.Author: TinaBSouthFlorida
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel for the convenience of a water park on-site as well as for the price. Dollar-for-dollar, this was an excellent choice! We had fun, relaxed, ate, slept, without having to go anywhere else. The lazy river surrounding the slides gave me comfort in being able to see the kids no matter where I was--and I could just relax!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: travelers03
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time. Kids really enjoyed the waterpark and it wasnt to crowded. The area around the hotel could use some sprucing up but many stores and restaurants are nearby. Theme parks are about 25 minutes away.

Reviews.Title: “well worth the money, clean, friendly staff, great location & waterpark is perfect for small children!”
Reviews.Author: Missy9499
Reviews.Content: Would come back again, my son loved it, very relaxing!!!

Reviews.Title: “The kids were having a blast, especially the younger ones!”
Reviews.Author: Jimmhel
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff were excellent! I arrived early to use the waterpark and they got me checked in several hours early! I stayed in a queen suite with my wife, adult son, teenage daughter and three of her teenage friends. We were there to celebrate her 15th birthday. The room was clean and had everything I needed. Plus it had a nice private balcony overlooking the waterpark area. The bed was comfortable! The location is convenient just off the turnpike. I thought the cost was very reasonable (suite deal birthday package). As for the waterpark: I had quite a time getting anyone to answer the phone when I was trying to book everything. One young lady rushed me off a call because she was "trying to get out of there". The waterpark staff were friendly and courteous, I would attribute their lack of professionalism to youth. I don't think any of them were over 21. The young lady who coordinated the birthday events seemed seriously overworked. The "waterpark" is basically three pretty large waterslides, a shallow pool shaped like a giant "O" that you can float around on tubes, and several smaller versions of these things for very young kids. There is also a regular pool separate from the waterpark area. The waterpark area also includes a bar/cafe where my service was excellent. Part of my deal included the use of a "cabana", which was about a 10'x10' aluminum frame covered with canvas. You could close it completely or open it completely or adjust it anywhere in between. It came with a ceiling fan, table, chairs, a lounge, and a special float for the "O" (lazy river) pool. The cabana was very welcome relief from the burning sun and sweltering heat and they are arranged around the periphery of the waterpark area providing nice views. The waterpark was packed to capacity the day I was there, and all the kids were having a blast, especially the younger ones! There were several lifeguards on duty (teenage boys) at all times. My daughter and her friends enjoyed themselves very much and I would definitely consider going back again. None of us cared much for the arcade.

Reviews.Title: “We would definitely go back!”
Reviews.Author: momof2kiddosinAR
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time staying at the Clarion. Upon our arrival though the desk clerk told my husband that it is not possible to make reservations online on the hotel website (which is what we did). My husband had to come back out to the van, dig out his laptop and bring up the confirmation. It was all a big hassle, but they did apologize. Our kids absolutely LOVED the waterpark! I especially loved the fact that they had a section for smaller children. Keep up the good job!

Reviews.Title: “Fun,Fun,Fun!!!”
Reviews.Author: pocoimaking
Reviews.Content: We stayed her on our trip to Orlando and Disney World. The price was great for the location, and Disney was about a 15 minute drive. The hotel was clean and newly updated. The waterpark was great, but we were not there during it's opperating hours except for one day. We reserved the family suite, and stayed in an upstairs unit with pool view. Our room was cleaned daily, and the staff was friendly and helpful. I would reccommend you stay here if you have small children.

Reviews.Title: “When had an awesome time.”
Reviews.Author: acaseofpride
Reviews.Content: It was our families first time to disney world in florida and had found the clarion resort online. Reserved our 6 nights stay the day before we were leaving. The kids were so excited since they have a waterpark. Was so pleasently suprised. Lovely room which was well kept, clean and comfortable. Check in was quick. Waterpark was amazing. It was january so it was kinda cool and the heated water was great. The kids loved the arcade and the laudry came in handy. Parking right in front of the rooms. Which is great with small kids. The price was unbeatable. When we go back again in JAN. 2010, we will be staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “It took us 2 hours to get checked in.”
Reviews.Author: ChristinaFlorida
Reviews.Content: Clean but they nickel & dimed you for things like floats and activities. Service at check-in was terrible. They ran out of towels constantly at the waterpark. Very crowded and disorganized.

Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms with all accomodations plus waterpark at a super price. Good mngmt.”
Reviews.Author: appelden
Reviews.Content: Enjoyable, clean, good accomodations, quiet. Minor problem addressed to more than my satisfaction. First non-animal room had minor carpet soil. Replacement room was fine. Features versus price- exceptional bargain.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely going back!”
Reviews.Author: tweetnessdlh
Reviews.Content: We just got back from staying the weekend at this hotel and we were pleasantly surprised. I was able to get a $48/night rate through AAA and thought for sure we were going to get the broom closet. We wanted to check out the room before we unpacked the car just to be sure. Imagine our surprise when the put us in the room with the king-sized bed and jacuzzi. The room was beautiful. It look like it had just been remodeled. I promise you...the room looked EXACTLY like the picture on the website. The mattress and pillows were very comfortable. The only issues we had with the room was the tv remote was broken, and the shower curtain did not meet with the bottom of the shower stall. The shower had one of the new curved bars, so the water went right down the curtain and onto the floor. Just a minor inconvenience. The waterpark was amazing. Our trip was for our daughter's 5th birthday. She wasnt tall enough to ride the big slides, but she would've been too scared to ride them anyway. My husband used them though and loved them. The lazy river was fun, although it gets kind of crowded at times. The kids' play area was fun. We stayed in the swimming pool most of the time though because it was less crowded than the water park. There are a few cabanas there, and I recommend calling in advance to reserve one. I called a week ahead of time and reserved the last one for that day. The cabana came with a table, 4 chairs, a lounge chair, ceiling fan, and flat screened tv. It also came with a 2-person float for the lazy river. They cost $5 to rent them for the day otherwise. The tv was a wonderful surprise. When our 6-month old was ready to nap, we took turns watching her and the tv. If you are going to the Disney parks, I probably would not stay here. It is really far from everything. I would estimate it as at least 10 miles or more from I-4. There really isnt much around the hotel either. You have to drive back into Kissimmee a ways to get to decent restaurants. But, if the waterpark is your destination, I definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “very clean”
Reviews.Author: ladybugOrlando_fl
Reviews.Content: I recently booked a room on memorial day weekend and I was amazed with the cleanliness of the hotel room. I had asked for fresh towels and they came really quick and still warm. My kids enjoyed the water park a lot. It was a good value for the money and I was really impress with the cleanliness of the room.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for the price but does have room to improve”
Reviews.Author: meli33012
Reviews.Content: The hotel was great all and all but they are very under staffed especially in the restaurant. There was only one waitress for breakfast and she was moving as fast as she could but imagine it is not easy being alone with a group of people. They ran out of food at the breakfast buffet and took a long time to bring out more food. Some of the staff were a little rude by the pool area. Also my kids found a few roaches inside the pool and in one of the slides so that was a little gross. The hotel has room for improvement but my kids had a blast and I didn't have to leave the hotel to go to a park since it was a waterpark as well there to entertain the kids. The hotel is worth it's value. I would definately go back.

Reviews.Title: “Fist time stay at Clarion waterpark, It was wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: damy58
Reviews.Content: The hotel was great, the staff was nice and helpful. My kids and myself enjoyed the waterpark immensly. It's a great deal to visit the orlando area and stay at a hotel that already has a watrepark in there. we visted Disney which was only 20 minutes away and spent the aftrenoons in the waterpark, then my kids played at their arcade room...they were tired out. the hotel is very family oriented, it was nice to have other kids my kids ages at the hotel.would definately recommend this hotel to anyone else. I will be visiting again in the month of June

Reviews.Title: “Hotel did not live up to website”
Reviews.Author: BW821
Reviews.Content: Whoever developed the website for this hotel did a great job. The hotel itself was nothing like what was published online. Our first room overlooked the parking lot and felt like a Red Roof Inn. One of our rooms did not have a remote for the TV and there was no alarm clock. The guest chairs were so dirty and stained we were afraid to sit in them. At 2:00 a.m. I had to ask the people talking outside to please quiet down so we could sleep. Our room was never made up the next day and we fiinally asked to be moved to a better location within the hotel and that room was better. The advertised Sunday brunch never materialized; the advertised bars never opened and the advertised waterpark was much smaller than expected. Location was further than expected and you would not want to go outside the hotel at night as it did not appear to be too safe. I would not recommend this hotel to anyone. I think they have a lot of nerve calling this hotel a resort and charging a resort fee.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Hotel!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: bjv12461
Reviews.Content: Bypass this hotel!!!!!! It is a dump!!!!!! Whoever did their website did a wonderful job because the actual hotel looks nothing like it!!! There is no grass around the waterpark. It is all concrete. There is also a locked fence around the waterpark and the pool ( which is not shown in the pictures ) giving the impression that undesireables get into the pool & waterpark area. Upon our arrival we were given our keys and we proceeded to the rooms. None of the keys worked so one of our party had to trek back to the desk to get new keys. When they returned, the new keys didn't work either. They sent maitenance down and discovered that the batteries in the locks needed replacement. Once inside the room we discovered tile floors and not carpet. Tile floors tend to lend themselves to someone slipping and falling, whether that be from getting out of the shower or returning from the pool. We also discovered that we had no remote for the TV or an alarm clock . Called the desk and they scrounged 1 up for us. The clock they gave us didn't work. The next day we left for the Disney parks around 8 am & returned around 8:30 pm and discovered that our room was not cleaned AT ALL!!!! Called the desk and although they apologized and sent up clean towels it still didn't make up for all the hassle so far. The next day we insisted on some sort of compensation for all the hassle. They moved us too 2 other rooms and these were more acceptable. The next morning when we rose to shower we found the rooms had no hot water. Ran the shower for 2o minutes and no hot water. Checked the sink and tub and once we did that somehow the hot water began working. The hotel is not located in a very good neighbohood ( which probably explains the locked fences around the pool ) or near anything and most of the amenities close early. The staff is very friendly and do their best but with all the problems we had, I would not stay here again. Please, if you come near this hotel, RUN AWAY!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “beautiful hotel”
Reviews.Author: nenitaMiami
Reviews.Content: excelent only please advise the guest the transpotation to the parks has a charge and expensive , we pay $45.00 for two adults one boy and a baby.but every things is wonderful i would like to mention jorje at the bar , he es incredible man , very nice , thanks so mucho for the vacations in your hotel. aymara

Reviews.Title: “best value for the price”
Reviews.Author: siehunt
Reviews.Content: My family and I had a very good mini vacation. The rooms were clean with ample space. The pool and water park were both very clean. My grandchildren had a ball. The only thing I would like to see done differently would be not closing every thing down at 7. The pool stayed open but there was not enough to entertain the kids after 7. The music stopped, the bar closed and the only thing for the kids to do was either a movie or play basketball with a flat ball. You have all that space in the center for some entertainment. It was a great stay and I would recommend this hotel and plan on coming back

Reviews.Title: “very pleasently surprised...after reading review...AAAAAA111”
Reviews.Author: shaz4921
Reviews.Content: I have to say having just checked into this hotel 'which is a 3***' i was very surpised and very pleased, the rooms are clean and comfortable catering for all your needs. I am not using the waterpark so have no comment and will not be taking breakfast, reception was accommodating, helpful and polite. I really dont know what some people expect, i have stayed in 4* properties not as nice as this, ok its not exactly local, however, there is a complementary bus and everything in Florida is so far away no matter were you stay. I was very happy to pay $40 per night including resort fee and consider i have had a real bargin, i will definitly stay again. Thankyou Clarian. Sharon Coward

Reviews.Title: “Great place for families”
Reviews.Author: dolfan33
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel several times because my kids love it and yours will as well. The entertainment poolside and the improv are a great addition. Keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: “Great value! Would definitely stay again!”
Reviews.Author: disneygirl22Miami
Reviews.Content: We brought our 6 year old daughter to the the Magic Kingdom, and chose this hotel for the waterpark. The two queen bed room was spacious and clean, the staff was helpful and courteous, and we all enjoyed the waterpark!! Coffee in the room, good buffet breakfast available for a small cost. For less than the cost of a single one day admission to the park, and half the price to stay in a 'value resort' on Disney property, we got a comfortable room and a day's worth of entertainment! I would definitely recommend this hotel for a family with kids.

Reviews.Title: “Is suppossed to be kids friendly, but they don't provied sun protection at all...no umbrellas in water park.”
Reviews.Author: aneliram
Reviews.Content: If you care for the skin of your children, this is not a hotel for that. A part of what you pay for the stay you need to pay for a cabana that most of them have the sun during the morning other during the afternoon.Also if want a float device have to be rented apart. Nothing for "free"(for what you pay for stay in).The couch was so dirty in the room that we can even touch it. Its a lot of bug in the area. Need to pay more attention to the clealiness of the room, the ice bucket broken and without a bag, they didnt put new towels or toletiers the 1st day. The bathroom around the pool area were very dirty. The space in the room is good. A/C noisy. Elevator was hot and semll bad. In general the hotel isnt so bad to have a little relaxation with a low budget, but deffinetly need to improved in the cleaning. We have fun in the waterpark only during the morning and afternoon when the sun wasnt so bad as I have to children under 3. Also waterpark needs to open early and closed late, at 7pm the sun looks like 4pm and the kids want to have more fun, and a part of the water park is not much to do in that area for the children.

Reviews.Title: “A great please to take it easy and have fun”
Reviews.Author: kirbyone
Reviews.Content: We came down for the weekend to rest and relax and not to do all the theme parking thid time. The resort is was nice, the kids loved the water park. There were Activities during the day and the pools were heated which is very nice. the beds were confirtable and the rooms are roomy enough for a family with kids and not to feel cramped. They have a comedy club inside the resort that is faimly friendly. the intire faimly enjoyed both shows and were even pulled up in to part of the comedy show. the kids loved the Free animal cookies. Parking was nice and close to our room Over all the resort was what we were hopping for. A place that was fun for the faimly and relaxing for mom and dad. We will be back again for our next faimly break. i only wish they had a Fitness Center but everything eles was great.

Reviews.Title: “In a very bad area and derelict”
Reviews.Author: rhcIreland
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in a very bad area of kissimmee as a frequent visitor to orlando i would definatly not!!! reccommend this hotel it is very very much out of the way and in a very bad area there are no propertys surrounding the hotel and it is adjcent to deralict sites , just a few homeless and drunks i had to lock the car all the time when i got into it, i did not feel safe here. i had a few minor issues with cleanleness but when i reported them to the front desk they were not sorted, so i changed hotels

Reviews.Title: “Wow! We loved this place; and we're coming back!”
Reviews.Author: WesIndiana
Reviews.Content: This place is a treasure off the beaten path. Yes, it's on the other side of Kissimmee from Disneyworld, but it's an easy drive (due south) from the MCO. The place is completely renovated and better than it's original scheme. The rooms are bright, large, and clean. The exterior is likewise fresh and inviting. And the waterpark is perfect for a family with kids. We arrived about 11am, were welcomed into our room and into the waterpark. (We learned that even if the room hadn't been available, we could still enjoy the waterpark and check in later.) The park is well-staffed, and includes three waterslides, a lazy river, and a children's area (with small water slides and rain-shower area). We loved our stay, and intend to come back again. It was a great way to start a vacation.

Reviews.Title: “It was so much fun for teenagers!”
Reviews.Author: valerie561
Reviews.Content: Being a teen, as my self is to enjoy a vacation with friends. I came here for 3 nights with friends. The hotel beds were so soft that I couldnt even wake up in the morning! I never oversleep, so thats my first time. Anyways, The water park was very fun! 2 days before we came, I looked online and saw waterpark photos. They looked SO boring. But when I actually SAW the waterpark, I was like.. WOW! It was much better than the photos online! So, we've spent all day there. After, we went to this private VIP room. Our uncle gave us VIP passes to this one room thats MOSTLY for teens. Its like a party room with fooseball, hockey. a green jaccuzii, and these disco lights! if you want a VIP pass, just ask one of the staffs. The king jacuzzi room was the BEST! Its the biggest room you ever seen!!! Alot of people think this... " Why would you want a jacuzzi in your hotel room, if you can go in the jacuzzi at the waterpark?". I disagree COMPETELY. Going in the jacuzzi at the waterpark is ALWAYS crowded, especially at night. Teenagers, adults...IF YOU EVER WANT TO GET A VACATION, COME HERE!

Reviews.Title: “way better than I thought”
Reviews.Author: magoobiz
Reviews.Content: We polanned an overnight visit to check out the waterpark. When we first pulled up I though uh-oh but it was clean, the waterpark was fantastic and the rooms were clean and comfortable. best hotel bed I have ever slept in

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Mini Vacation Hotel!!!”
Reviews.Author: happybizmom
Reviews.Content: This property is a very clean, friendly, and very well maintained property. My family and I stayed there for 2 nights. The staff was very accomodating and eager to please their guests. We brought our children along with us since we knew that this property had a water park. Once we completed our professional responsibilities, we took out children to inclosed courtyard waterpark. This hotel is modestly price and accomodates the guests with family themed water activites!! This is great place to hang and relax while the kids play in the water. The family could just go for a weekend or for a week and won't feel that a loan had to be taken out to experience a mini vacation for quality family time!!!This water park has slides for older kids, lazy river for the whole family to enjoy (especially for parents!!), and even watered mushroom waterfalls with water pad and baby pool for the younger children. After the water park closes down for the day, there is even a regular hotel pool to use for family. Did I mention all is heated? Well it not, IT IS!! THIS IS A BIG PLUS FOR ME!! I HATE COLD POOLS SO THIS WAS GREAT!!! There is also staff es life guards for the waterpark section. If you would like to enjoy a cocktail while the children play, you can get one at the out door tiki bar. All these amenities are located in the courtyard. The rooms are clean and beautifully decorated in a Bahama Style with tiled floor( which I perfer expecially with water related activities). and makes you feel like you are in the islands on vacation!!) This property is a full service hotel and for a family of four it was prices great!! There is no need to stay at an expensive facility when you can stay here and receive better service!!! I give this propery a 10 out of 10!!!! Tammy Larsen Florence, Alabama

Reviews.Title: “staff is not friendly.”
Reviews.Author: willis_s_willis
Reviews.Content: This resort is located is a low end part of town, not worth it for the price The rooms are old with noisy air conditioners. I found a large bug in the bathroom, and rooms are not cleaned properly. I tried to use the business center and was unable to get help from the staff. Oh, they did tell me read the instructions, but the instructions did not say the fax machine does not work. Very unhelpful staff.

Reviews.Title: “Great Water Park, but run downed hotel”
Reviews.Author: Zulusand33
Reviews.Content: The hotels water park was great for the kids and that is the only reason we choose this hotel for the water park. Arriving at the hotel my six year old even commented on the exterior look of the hotel was awful. It is in front of the turnpike we had a beautiful view of Sunpass signs. It is located next to two abandoned business and near a correctional facility NICE!!! (Being sarcastic) The room was small kids bunk bed mattress were super thin, my babys crib mattress is thicker then what the hotel room have for the kids bed and we didnt get room service for two days. But like I said the kids loved the water park that is the only good thing about this hotel. Would not reccommend this hotel spend the extra $50-60 a night and stay in downtown disney.

Reviews.Title: “OK”
Reviews.Author: vikster1
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 3 nights. This place recently had a remodel job. It is your typical motel that thankfully has a small water park. That is the best thing this place has going for it. Even though the rooms were renovated I would still say it is sub par. I never saw any bugs but I did expect to see one. It is located way down 192 East. Far from places and the area is sketchy. Sirens all night long. Room rates were cheap considering it was Easter week. Now I know why. Spend the extra dollars and go to the Nick hotel. Well worth it!!

Reviews.Title: “This hotel is a great place to have fun, relax and save money!”
Reviews.Author: mcohen123
Reviews.Content: You never know what to expect when you book a hotel online. There are always good and bad reviews, pictures only show so much, etc. We were very pleased with what we found at the Clarion Resort and Waterpark. This waterpark was just the right size for my children, 5 and 11, to play and have hours of enjoyment without the worry you get from traditional waterparks. Traditional waterparks are big, but over-crowded and dangerous. My daughter loved not having to wait in long lines for the slides. My son enjoyed the children's area, which was like a playscape with water! As for us parents, we enjoyed lounging in the lazy river. The children also enjoyed playing in the arcade. Our room was clean, beds were comfortable, and the staff was helpful. The hotel is also in a good location - close to many activities, but far enough from the traffic and madness. Our stay was well worth the money, which was much less than surrounding hotels, and with many more things to do!

Reviews.Title: “Wouldn't go back!”
Reviews.Author: jestep9605
Reviews.Content: We were so disappointed to see that the hotel rents out the waterpark for birthdays and other occasions. It was so overcrowded my family couldn't find a place to sit down or get a towel. They need to better monitor the small children in the water with the saggy leaky diapers. The water was foul. My children spent little time getting wet and then were thoroughly scrubbed when we returned to our room! The quality of our room was clean and comfortable. We chose this hotel because of the waterpark so I can not give it a great recommendation.

Reviews.Title: “Okay stay - housekeeping needs help!”
Reviews.Author: neulings
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 6 nights. We had several problems with our room. The refrigerator didn't work, had to get another one. Housekeeping was TERRIBLE! Had to beg for clean towels on numerous occasions, had to ask to have room cleaned several times, begged to have the floors mopped (feet turned black), got locked out of room after being gone all day, and tv messed up. Also, hated the fact the walls were not that thick we could hear everything going on in the next room. Escpecially, when they got up most of the time at 5:00 am. The front desk staff was great to work with and was always willing to try to fix the problems in a timely manner. The water park was great for the kids. Complaints about the park are there were not enough tubes in the lazy river for people, the middle slide was broke the whole time we were here and the park closed to early. This hotel was great for the price, but needs improvements in the cleaning department. Wouldn't mind going back if I knew I was going to have a clean room always. Also, make sure you check you sheets when you check in. We did witness a couple checking out in a room next to us after being there for a week and another couple came in and the sheets were never changed on the bed. Housekeeping just remade the beds. We did notify the front desk of this and they said they would check into it.

Reviews.Title: “"Thanks Dad for the Best Spring Break EVER!"”
Reviews.Author: DaddymanTampa_FL
Reviews.Content: The title of this review is a quote from my 6 year-old boy. If he were writing the review, he would say sell your house and move into the hotel. We took a small family vacation over Spring Break. My wife and I enjoyed the jacuzzi in the room and my boy just LOVED the waterpark and the game room. The trip was a lot of fun and the hotel was a great "home" to return to each night, but let me mention both the good and the bad about this place. I will start with the bad. There were four main things that were negative. 1) When we arrived there was a long, long line of people waiting to check in (8 plus the 3 being helped by staff). My first 17 minutes in the hotel were not pleasant as I stood in line. This led me to notice how there were 3 lights burned out in the lobby and a dirty maintenance cart parked right beside the main entrance. Nit picky stuff, I know, but I had already spent the day walking around an amusement park and did not want to stand in yet another long, slow-moving line. 2) When we first got to the room, my boy turned on the TV and it came on to the hotel channel. The channel had no sound on its own and had a radio station as its sound. Within 2 minutes of our arrival, while I was still looking at the different ammenities of the hotel, the TV (or rather the radio station that was the sound) said "Hell yeah! bust a cap in dose mother-effers" I would think that a family waterpark hotel might choose a different radios station as their background music. 3) The ice machine for our building was broken. This made the closest ice machine a full building length and 1 flight of stairs away from our room. 4) The room had no "Do Not Disturb" sign. So the morning after the first night, we were awakened by the maid coming into our room. On the positive side of things was more stuff than can be listed. The waterpark was a lot of fun! The jacuzzi in the room was a blessing after long days spent on our feet. The free internet connection was good. The TV had a nice quality picture for the little bit of TV watching that we did. Room service pizza was excellent. The staff was friendly, polite and helpful. The shuttle service was timely and very good. The arcade was fun. The rooms were well-stocked with appliances (coffee maker, microwave, refrigerator, hair dryer, iron, ironing board) plus you could get a dvd player from the lobby if you wanted one. I could go on and on. This place is one of the best-kept secrets in the Orlando area. I would recommend this hotel to anyone travelling with children. We all enjoyed our stay a great deal and we will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Vacation!”
Reviews.Author: JoyNoel
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great for families. We stayed in one of the family suites. (3 Adults, 5 kids (ranging from 6 years old to 16) and a baby. We had plenty of room. The swimming pools are great and everyoe loved the waterpark! We will definitely be staying here every year. The beach was a little distance a way (45 minutes) but we were in the middle of everything. (the outlet malls, Disney, and the beach). The outside could use remodeling but the inside is beautiful!

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to return!”
Reviews.Author: Morningofthesun
Reviews.Content: We chose this specifically for the waterpark itself. We got a Family Suite that fit eight people in comfortably. The room was clean and it overlooked the waterpark beautifully. We arrived earlier then check in time - but they told us we could still take advantage of the waterpark and to check in for avaliability. The waterpark is intimate, quiet, relaxing and no lines! Yes small, but it's surely a fun getaway to take advantage of. Ages of 37,36,31,27,15,13,9 and 6 enjoyed every minute of it. The staff was very helpful and polite. The only thing we wish was different was the timing of the waterpark - especially being on spring break - we hoped that the waterpark was open later. And a word of advice, bring your OWN towels - the towels they offer are the size of a dishtowel! But overall we were very pleased and will be returning hopefully this summer. Bravo!

Reviews.Title: “My daughter says it was great fun.”
Reviews.Author: Chachita60
Reviews.Content: My daughter saw a commercial of the park on TV. When I arrived it was a fun place to stay. The Hotel was clean, the staff were friendly and nice. Breakfast was Tasty. I enjoyed the park, the hotel, the area. My daughter had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “The Lazy River is fun for all!”
Reviews.Author: KTCHER123
Reviews.Content: We had a weekend get away with kids. We chose this hotel because of the water park and it's central location for any attraction we decided to visit. Our only complaints were: we booked and paid for a room facing the water park and received a room overlooking the parking lot and there was no ice to be found in the entire hotel for our stay. The room was nice as we loved the refrigerator and microwave in the room. The water park is a great place for the entire family. You can't help but relax and enjoy yourself at this hotel. Overall, we had a nice time and would come back again as long as we get the room we pay for the next time.

Reviews.Title: “ok”
Reviews.Author: mycat_2
Reviews.Content: we saw this waterpark resort online and for the price it was fine, the kids had a blast at the pool and on the waterslides/lazy river, the hours for these were ridiculous closing at 6 p.m. the entire length of our stay, the pool the first night of our stay was already closed by 7 p.m. even though the posted closing was 10 p.m. the second night was much better not closing til 10 p.m. the bathroom was a little too small, but the room was clean, the only problem was the maid, she was get in get out too quickly and on 2 different back to back days forgot our towels, we had to chase her down the second day, the first day the staff was nice and brought our towels. although a word of caution, the pool person doesn't know how to handle the pool chemicals, 2 days in a row we went to the pool and poolslides and the pool chemical just stuck to your skin and left us all extremely itchy and red only hot water and dial soap got the film off plus you could smell how strong the chemicals were just like a whole bottle of bleach. oh and the parking was backwards, you had to circle around the entire hotel to park properly in a spot ,the parking lanes were one-way not two-was as they should have been and the restaurant was closed after breakfast, no lunch or dinner served.

Reviews.Title: “Bad Experience”
Reviews.Author: ginaConnecticut
Reviews.Content: My experiences was not great at all. My children had to hang out cause the water park closed at 5:30 and the game room was not apealing to teenagers. Everything thing from the bar( tiki bar) to the resturant to the gift store was independent and the hours did not work well with the hotel. The independent shuttle service was too expensive and not available enough for guest who don't drive. And there where no towels, hotel couldnt keep up with the volume of guest.

Reviews.Title: “very nice room but pool not heated, drop slide not work, jacuzzi only in waterpark.”
Reviews.Author: hawaiigirlFlorida
Reviews.Content: Wish jacuzzi would have been available after waterpark hours. This comment was made by many. Pool not usable because was too cold to swim in. Heater was broken. Not informed when made reservations. We did not want to go anywhere else so was disappointed these were not available. Waterpark closed an hour early even tho lots of people were still using it. Next morning was raining. After rain stopped park was still not opening.

Reviews.Title: “We just keep coming back...”
Reviews.Author: FLFunNSun
Reviews.Content: As an Orlando native it's nice to have a nearby getaway like the Clarion Resort & Waterpark. We first chose the Clarion Resort for it's excellent value last summer, and when it came time to decide what to do for our latest vacation it was a unanimous pick for the whole family, even the dog! With the affordable rates we were able to choose the Family Suite for both trips and the kids loved feeling like they had their own room. On both visits our rooms were spotless and the staff could not have been nicer. When we ran out of clean towels the front desk gave us more than enough extra and when my wife locked our keys in the room they were happy to let us back in. A review of the resort would not be complete without mentioning the Mindy O Waterpark. The kids could not get enough of the slides and the lazy river, and my wife even joined in on the fun before we both went to enjoy the pool bar and grill. There's a great arcade and a basketball court for the kids too. All in all the Clarion Resort & Waterpark provides an excellent value for any vacation. We're already planning for our stay in July to celebrate my daughter's birthday with a group of her friends!

Reviews.Title: “Best kept secret in Kissimmee”
Reviews.Author: ELI5Indiana
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed by the size of our family suite (slept 8 comfortably). Nice updated decor and roomy accommodations. The waterslides were fun, and the best part was no lines/ no waiting! The lazy river was everyones favorite. The water in the waterpark area was warm, we wished the pool in the other area was heated, it was too cold for us to swim in. Our 4 boys (3 of them teens) loved the arcade and the outdoor pool table, basketball courts and food and drink bar. When we find ourselves in the area again we will definitely be coming back!

Reviews.Title: “It was okay. The personnel at the front desk were execellent.”
Reviews.Author: sambookie
Reviews.Content: The room was great and the service as well, however; the carpets in the rooms need to be cleaned as they were a bit dirty. But overall the stay was good. Thank you,

Reviews.Title: “Fine place to stay for a few days.”
Reviews.Author: coldnorth55
