I also like the regular pool to swim in. My grandkids loved the large chess board that was in the regular pool area. I was surprise to see a flat screen television in the room I was staying in. I have stayed in many hotels for the past 12 yearsI never got a flat screen tv. The room was large with ref. and microwave. The only thing that I didn't get was a table for our family to sit down to eat at. That was the only draw back otherwise it was a very good stay and I enjoyed my stay at the Clarion resort. The maids were wondeful and very polite. After they clean the room they came and ask us if everything was okay that in itself was a treat. All the hotels that I stayed at don't do that. I forgot to mention that the Clarion resort had activities for my grandkids to do all day everyday that I found to be wonderful. I must say we have a very nice time at the clarion resort and waterpark. I would recommend this resort to all my friends that come visit me.

Reviews.Title: “Old Hotel, needs repair”
Reviews.Author: salpark
Reviews.Content: I stayed there in July of 2008 with my kids and went to the attractions. Had to wait until 530pm to check in even though check in time is 4pm. Very disappointing. On the scond day of my stay, the ceiling was leaking badly. I reported it to the Front Desk around 1030am. No one came to look at the problem until after 4pm. Maintenance could not fix the problem. They ended up giving me a suite which was better. Overall, their staff needs customer service training and should take more pride in their hotel.

Reviews.Title: “great stay for the kids”
Reviews.Author: sunshinetif
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay with kids. The waterpark area was great. The activities were a lot of fun too. If you are thinking about staying at the Nickolodeon hotel, I suggest you save the money and stay at the Clarion. A great stay for the money. You will have fun.

Reviews.Title: “Out of Control.”
Reviews.Author: bssd
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this Hotel with my son from July 1st thru July 8th this year. As we got in on July 1st after 8:00 PM , we really did not use the Waterpark that night. We got up Weds. morning, had breakfast, and proceeded to enjoy a wonderful day at the Water Park. Went to bed that night, got up Thursday morning, and thats when this vacation started to take a big turn for the worse. As this was the 4th of July weekend, it was a big travel weekend and the Hotel was full. As I came to find out there was a family reunion booked at the Hotel for this weekend. I would estimate this family to be 75 to 100 strong including children. This family completely took over the Water Park and the other activity centers. The vast majority of the adults spent the weekend in a falling down drunk state. The kids were left unchecked to run rampant through the water park, throwing water tubes, goggles, and anything else they could get there hands on at anyone and everyone. At the pools there were anywhere from 4 to 5 life guards about college age who did absolutely nothing to put a stop to this. By Saturday morning, my son no longer even wanted to leave the Hotel room. I told him that by the end of Sunday, this would get better as these people would be leaving, but we could move to another Hotel if he would like. He decided he wanted to stick it out. But we lost 3 days of our vacation due to this unruly behavior, that was allowed to go on unchecked. As for the Hotel itself, it is as has been mentioned in other reviews a very noisy place to stay, and you can hear footsteps, banging noise's etc.... all through the night. So I would considor bringing something to create some white noise. I would also avoid the hotel giftshop- store. None of the items have price tags on them, so when you go to purchase something, you get a big suprise! And if you ask them how much it is before buying something, they will give you a inflated price, if you tell them it is to much, they then will dicker with you on the price. Just not what you would expect from a store in this Chains high end Hotel. Also beware that on any purchase you make from the Hotel restaurants bar, there is a automatic 18% gratuity added to the bill. Also beware that the Waterpark is not just for hotel guests only. They sell day passes to the public to also use this, so it could become quite crowded. As for the food the hotel restaurants serve, I found it to be okay, and the staff friendly and competent. But I don't think I would ever stay at this Hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Summer Getaway”
Reviews.Author: topshane
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from a few days at the Clarion Resort & Waterpark in Kissimmee, Florida. The hotel was extremely clean and we were surprised at how nice our room was! The hotel is very close to all the Orlando Area Attractions. In fact we went to the Disney Village and both Universal Parks, Pleasure Island, and the Outlet Malls during our 3 day stay. It was so hot and the parks were so crowded for the 4th of July week, that we couldn't wait to get back from the Theme Parks to go to the cool waterpark at the hotel. The food at the resort was also great. They have an all you can eat breakfast buffet for only $10 that was amazing and the Pizza was some of the best we have ever had! Overall we would say this was an excellent choice. We will be telling all our family and friends of this great find!

Reviews.Title: “Misleading Ads”
Reviews.Author: mtkmom23
Reviews.Content: I was initially very excited about this hotel, as the pictures are all very nice, and I thought the waterpark would be nice. However, when I arrived at the hotel, I was disappointed to see that the hotel was not in the nicest area. I was concerned for the safety of myself and my family. We got to the room and just decided to stay in for the evening instead of checking out the ammenities. In the room, there was about an inch gap from the door jamb to the bottom of the door, which let in light, heat and God only knows what kind of critters. We had to roll up towels and stick the in front of the door to cover the huge gap. The room took forever to cool down after that, due to all the heat entering and cold air escaping. My youngest used the restroom and the toliet backed up. My husband called the front desk and they said they would send maintenance right up however, they didn't show up at all. We were getting impatient, as I wanted to take a shower after walking the theme parks all day and my other child needed to use the restroom. In fact, while we were waiting, we ordered a pizza, got the pizza, ate the pizza and made a pillow fort for our kids. So my husband called the front desk again and asked if someone would just bring him a plunger and he'd do it himself. Finally, about 30 minutes after that the maintenance person showed up and the guy wiggled the handle a little, and said, "Yeah, uh, I can't get the water to go down" and left, wearing his gloves on the way out, touching our surfaces and door handles. So we had a stopped up toliet for our entire stay. Also, when we pulled out the sofa bed, there were wrist-bands, toys and crumbs ON the sheets, as if the sheets had not been changed in between stays. The exterior of the hotel looked run-down, but the inside was very nice. I enjoyed the room itself, aside from unchanged sheets and plumbing issues. They upgraded us to a suite when we got there for some reason, it had bunk beds which was great for the kids, a full-size refrigerator, microwave, and best of all, a private second bedroom with a private balcony. We started to let the kids sleep in the bunk beds, but shortly after we put them to bed I got so worried due to the fact that I didn't feel they were safe that close to the front door and windows, that I went and got them and put them in the bed next to ours in the back bedroom. In the morning we took the kids to the waterpark and they had a blast. They were both too small for the big slides (they are both 3), but they had fun in the children's area. They didn't want to leave to go to Sea World. Overall, I definitely would not stay here again, and I'm disappointed because the hotel has such great potential, if it weren't for the poor management and bad area.

Reviews.Title: “Stay Elsewhere”
Reviews.Author: florida411
Reviews.Content: I'll start by saying that my kids loved the waterpark, but what kid wouldn't??? The rooms are nicely renovated, however they were not cleaned very well at all by housekeeping. We even had dirty towels left on the floor one day. We also could hear EVERYTHING outside of our room in the hallway areas and in the next room. Our room was next to the stairs as well, and ALL night we heard loud booms of people walking (I'm sure normally) up and down the stairs. The walls are obviously hollow which made our nights very uncomfortable! If you insist on staying here, please bring a white noise machine to block out the noise!!! The "free continental breakfast" was an absolute joke! It was one tray of broken, stale pieces of danishes! No drinks (coffee, juice) or anything else!!! The buffet was very expensive and we didn't even bother trying it because it didn't look too good. Drive down the street to Denny's. If you are planning to visit ANY of the area attractions, plan on driving very far. The closest attractions are still miles down the road, at least a 15 minute drive. The price seems okay also, until they add the resort fee when you check out! If you are coming to visit Orlando's attractions, you'd be much better off staying somewhere closer to the attractions in a hotel with a great pool, and visit a real waterpark. (You end up paying extra (the resort fee) for the waterpark anyway.) The exterior corridors also don't make families feel as safe in this area, either. You really can't beat Disney hotels and any hotel in Lake Buena Vista! Even if your trip doesn't include a visit to Disney parks, hotels in these areas are just a quick drive to any area attraction in the Orlando area. Don't bother with this hotel unless you plan on spending your entire vacation at the small waterpark area.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: harm10
Reviews.Content: What an incredible place. The on-site water park is amazing! My kids never wanted to leave hotel even with plans to visit the surrounding attractions. The rooms were modern and clean and plenty spacious for the 4 of us. Would certainly visit again.

Reviews.Title: “ok trip”
Reviews.Author: samanthalane
Reviews.Content: Hotel was ok....rooms were nice, recently renovated. If you can afford to stay on Disney property, I highly suggest it. It is a ways from Disney. They also fool you with the low rate, then charge you 12.00 a day resort fee. So you are easily looking at 100. a night. Shuttle service is really bad. They only offer two times to the parks and back. The slides on the waterparks were hurting my children on their backs and arms. The day we left, they let a daycare in there and there were like 50 kids running around a small area and it made for very long lines at the slides. I wasn't impressed much. Have stayed on Disney property many times and much, much prefer that. You can book a value resort for about 100. a night.

Reviews.Title: “Hairy situation”
Reviews.Author: ChobeeNole
Reviews.Content: Upon check in at the Clarion Resort, I found black hairs all over the bathroom, toilet, shower, and bathroom door. There were also black hairs wrapped up in the towels by the sink. Moved a chair to veiw the T V better, and this revealed a floor that had not been cleaned in several weeks. Returned to room on second night of our stay at 4:45 pm only to find that our room had not been cleaned. Would not recommend this hotel to my worst enemy.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: MDTraveler_8
Reviews.Content: Great place - I highly recommend this! Great value! Very kid friendly - children ages 6 & 10 had a blast. Clean, pleasant, courteous,and helpful staff,great waterpark/ amenities,comfy beds/pillows/linens, good location, safe, good security. Food, especially buffet breakfast (included in price) and pizza were very good. Appeared to be short-handed in some areas, such as the front desk. Otherwise I would have rated them excellent!

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: JLAFORTEON
Reviews.Content: We arrived and everything looked good until the night time when the roaches came out. My wife and kids were so worried about the bugs it ruined our vacation. My wife complained to the front desk and they did advise they would move us to a different room. However, I saw roaches in the hallway of the hotel and also observed the guests next to my room swatting a roaches out of their room. The water park was pretty good until a camp of small children over 100 kids arrived. The pool occupancy stated no more than 93. All the paying guests at the hotel were just amazed how crowded the waterpark was and many other guests were also complaining to management. However, they allowed it and there was such a long wait for the waterslides and the lazy river was so crowded my kids were getting trampled. My wife complained and the told her there was nothing they could do because the coordinator schedulede this and it was out of there hands. Overall, I would definetely never stay at this Hotel again!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Affordable....and a great water park!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: cwhite8181
Reviews.Content: Came down to area for a fishing trip on Lake Toho with friends. Was planning to stay at another hotel when I passed this one. Stopped in and got as great price. Had dinner (try the onion soup and hot wings!!) at the pub. Queen beds were spacious and comfortable. Room was modern and clean. Water park is worth the stay for any family.

Reviews.Title: “Loved Everything Fun For Children! The Waterparka And Activities Are Awesome!”
Reviews.Author: Ayakkaa
Reviews.Content: When we got there we were amazed about how the hotel actually looked. We had waterpark view and the view was really nice. It was fun for the kids and fun for the adults awesome. Walls are actually made out of concrete that makes you feel more comfortable knowing other people wont hear your bussiness. Also during storms its a safe place to be. I WILL DEFINETLY STAY HERE AGAIN!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great water park with a room”
Reviews.Author: suzygolf123
Reviews.Content: My girl friend told me about this place near Disney and Universal being that this year we made simpler plans for our family vacation. We flew in from Texas and rented a car. The hotel was about 20 minutes from the airport right off the turnpike. We check in to the hotel around 3 in the afternoon I can see the front desk was very busy. It took about 10 minutes to check in. When we got to our room it was very nice, clean and up scaled. I like that they had a refrigerator to store water bottles and snacks. The boys just wanted to go to the big slides so we went down to the water park to let them play. You have to wear a wrist bands to get in there, I guess it’s good because it is secure and not just anyone can get in. My husband and I sat around the out door bar & grill under an umbrella table while they played all day. The next mourning we ate the breakfast buffet in the restaurant and went to Disney’s Magic kingdom. After about 3 pm the kids were tired and very hot so we went back to the hotel. When we got there the kid ran and got in to their swim suit and went right back to the water slides. All in all this is a great place to stay if you’re on a budget because it’s not just a pool it is a water park with lots of things to do for the kids. The hotel has lots of activities, a game room and play area. I would suggest you get a room with a pool view and bring lots of suntan lotion as it was hot out there. Hope to be back soon!

Reviews.Title: “Many choices”
Reviews.Author: oceans1426
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had a great time at the Clarion Resort And Water Park hotel in Kissimmee Florida. You're never too old to enjoy a water park, basketball, pool playing, when you're on vacation. The rooms were complete with everything you would need when away from home. Refrigerator, coffee maker, iron, and more. The greatest advantage we had was leaving the hotel and only driving 3 minutes to get on the interstate to Disney world. This took away all the hassels with driving in downtown Orlando. We highly recommend the hotel and we will stay again. Terry and Karen Hollywood, Florida

Reviews.Title: “Housekeeping...needs work”
Reviews.Author: teaching1st
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed the onsite water park. All the children had a great time and I loved the fact that you had a special area for the toddlers. The activities through out the day were nice and your gameroom kept my kids busy all night long. The only issue that we had was that our room wasn't ready till almost 5 p.m. Check in was at 3:00 p.m. I received one of my rooms early at 1:30 which I was grateful for because I had a dog and a very tired baby that needed a nap. Unfortunately, I had no where else to put the 4 teenagers who didnt need to be in the sun anymore. Housekeeping spent 2 hours next door cleaning the room. I am not sure what went on or why it took so long because all i was told about 4 different times is that it would only be 15 more minutes. That begin at around 3 p.m. Once we were settled and in the rooms, we had a great time.

Reviews.Title: “need some improvements”
Reviews.Author: nyorker3331
Reviews.Content: just got back from the resort... beutiful rooms clean and comftable completly updated. first night got a room next to the laundry room facing florida tpke horrible.. could not sleep at all... very noisy washing machines and dryier ... do not stay there... Erik by the front desk was very helpfull and change my room to other side of the hotel which was great and also compesate us with free breakfast. other problem in the pool area can get very very hot... sun very strong. they will not provide umbrellas to their guests .. expecting you to rent a cabana for 50$ for the day.... their response is that they have some shaded areas in the pool which is correct up to 12pm but after that just impossible to enjoy the pool. most of the stuff in the front desk and the pool area are not very friendly... very long wait upon check out while some of the stuff hanging in the office not very caring to come to the front desk to relief the long line... i wish they will make some changes which will improve all .and specially stuff attidude..

Reviews.Title: “Loved the waterpark”
Reviews.Author: azfamilyadventurers
Reviews.Content: Beds were very comfortable. We had a waterpark view room and really enjoyed it. Our young kids enjoyed the waterpark and the waterpark staff and safety team was great. We stayed here 3 days of our 11. Moved closer to universal the remaining time and wished we had stayed at this hotel the whole time - now we know. We spend almost all day for 2 days just hanging around the waterpark - the kids thought it was the best part of their trip, go figure. Our only complaint was getting dinner in the evening - service was non-existent and we ended up leaving to go to the nearby Denny's, but I would ABSOLUTELY recommend this place to anyone with kids of any age. I suspect teens might get bored with the slides, but us adults and our young kids had a blast. We always felt very safe on the property as well.

Reviews.Title: “Thumbs Up”
Reviews.Author: TebowFan
Reviews.Content: Awesome!! Great for the Kids. Wanted to stay at hotel instead of going to Orlando Theme Park. Will return. God Bless!!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay”
Reviews.Author: tannerfan
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a 1 week stay at the Clarion Waterpark. This place was FANTASTIC. The lazy river was so relaxing. The kids were having a great time on the waterslides. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The staff was friendly. It is conveniently located to the theme parks and major highways. I have read some other negative reviews and I can not believe some of the stories I read. I can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “problems from the start”
Reviews.Author: gingermom
Reviews.Content: In April we went to the clarion waterresort in Kissimmee fl. first off I called to make sure that the rooms would hold 6 people and was told that all rooms had a sleeper sofa and 2 queen size beds, as this is what I asked for. When we got to the resort, whidh by the way is beautiful, we walked into the room and there were only 2 beds. I went to the desk and they said none of the rooms had sleeper sofas. I said I specifically called to check on this as I was going on line to get another room. Finally after about 45 minutes we got a suite that I had to pay extra for. The staff did try to accomodate us but I felt since I called it should have been more. Also they gave us the keys to the wrong room and so for the second time we were moved. Then they took us to another room and in this room the furniture was still in plastic and they wanted to move us to the frist toom we had this would have been the third move. After finally getting all settled in we still had trouble. The hotel staff not once but twice walked into our rooom without knocking. I did inform the front desk about this. Also when it was time for the bill it took about another 45 minutes because they had different prices for us. Also when we went to breakfeast it was supposed to be half price and children free. We were charged full price and also for the 4 year old. Our waitress did not even come back to see if we needed anything else to drink, she was not the best and to top it off they added an 18% tip to our biill. I felt if she was a better waitress i would not mind giving her the tip she deserved, and I expect better service than what I recieved. there were things on the menu that the whole week we were there that they did not have. It should not be on the menu if they do not have it. Over all we were not happy with our stay at this resort. Ginger Quinn

Reviews.Title: “Best Hotel in Kissimmee”
Reviews.Author: TravelerJeanne
Reviews.Content: This was a great hotel. Great for kids. Waterpark was fantastic. I could not get my 9 year old son out of the water. Plenty of lifeguards on duty. Staff was friendly. Rooms were nice and clean with microwaves and refrigerators. Sea World was about 15 minutes away. This hotel is tucked away off of Irlo Bronson Highway and the Florida Turnpike. Great for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Had A Great Time”
Reviews.Author: PaydayE
Reviews.Content: I spent a short weekend getaway at this Clarion Resort. I had a great time. The room was clean and comfortable. The employees were very friendly and helpful. The time on the lazy river was so relaxing. I was with my nieces and they had a blast on the waterslides. The location of the Clarion is very convenient for getting to all the theme parks. I can't wait to go back for a longer stay. I highly recommend the resort for everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great for kids!”
Reviews.Author: amlmckenzie
Reviews.Content: We were a little skeptical about staying here because it is a little farther from the main area in Kissimmee, but it was great! The staff was friendly, and the rooms have all been recently renovated. We stayed in a double queen...everything was nice & new! Beds were comfy. Shower was great! Not the typical showerhead, but one with a massager & such. I know that may sound funny, but its little things like this that count! Our 9 yr old loved the waterpark! Since it was February, it was still a little chilly so we didnt utilize it as much as we wouldve in say june, but it was still great. Regular pool area is separate, which is nice if you dont feel like dealing with shrieking kiddies! The lazy river was nice & relaxing. They did have a free continental breakfast, with items you would normally expect. We did partake 2 mornings, & it wasnt anything spectacular, but its free, so what can one truly expect? As for the location, it actually worked out. Our primary place for visiting was Universal, and the rd we needed to take was right past the hotel entrance! Overall experience was good. Only complaint would be that our room was in the back building.....the pool area had only 1 opening, which was near the front. Trivial complaint, in my opinion!

Reviews.Title: “Will be back soon great for the kids”
Reviews.Author: DaniaGinagirl
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a 3 night stay at the Clarion water park Hotel. I went to the hotel website and I must admit that I was a little concern not staying on Disney property. One of the nice things about the hotel location was that it is right off the main highway in the residential part of Orlando. It only took us about 23 minutes to get to Disney- so what we are on vacation, it was less time from the Clarion than if we would have stayed on Disney property and waited for the Disney bus that goes around to 3 or 4 stops. Upon arrival, our room was very clean and brightly decorated. We had a kid’s suite with a bunk bed on the 3rd floor. The room also had a refrigerator and microwave, which we liked. Real Nice LCD TV with lots of channels. The beds are better than what we have at home lots of pillows. Right outside our room was a pool with a nicely size water park, big slides and lazy river all with in a courtyard. our room was always cleaned each day. YOU DON'T EVER HAVE TO LEAVE THE RESORT- THIS SAVED ALL US FROM GOING TO WET N' WILD. The slides were wild and the kids were having fun in the water park the whole day. We just laid in the lazy river on a tube. If you have kids and want somebody to entertain them all day they have an activity director, which included games, crafts and even bingo. All of the Lifeguards were friendly. The frozen margaritas at the pool bar were only $5.00 and they had a BBQ going by the pool so it was like a big party. The sad part was the ice cream shop was closed it looks like they are remodeling it but they sold ice cream and snacks in the gift shop. My kids are 7 and 9 and both really had a great time we only went one day to Animal Kingdom. Definitely glad we gave this hotel a try. It was a fun stay! Worth every penny! Nothing wrong with this place or location.

Reviews.Title: “I will never go back!”
Reviews.Author: chelmail
Reviews.Content: I will not stay at places I cannot trust. When we were checking out they added $8 per night resort fee that was not disclosed when booking through AAA. Somehow it raised the rate by $27 for a 3 night stay. When I showed them my printed reservation which included tax and what they were trying to charge us was above the quote (and I stated I left a tip in the room), they still refused to honor the price. The lady said they now had a resort fee and it was displayed on their website. I said I did not book through them and again showed her my reservation quoting all prices from AAA. She still refused to honor it. I will never go to this hotel again, and may never stay at a Clarion. It was in a bad part of town. The pool with the waterpark is only open until about 8 pm. So no going to the theme parks then to the pool. They only had one floor of slides open at a time and as was stated previously by another reviewer, they are not very smooth. Did not entertain my children for long (ages 7, 7, and 5).

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Stay”
Reviews.Author: Mich72Florida
Reviews.Content: My husband and I took the kids for Mothers Day weekend and had a blast! The waterpark was so perfect not to big not to small. I never had to worry about the kids which was nice and relaxing for mom. There was kids activites all day long poolside which was nice. My only downside is the neighborhood. Not very inviting...You are next to the jail and on Sat. night the helicoptors were out with the spotlight around 10pm which was a little scary. I would suggest they put in a fence around the property and put in a security gate at the entrance. Other then that I do have to say our stay was great and we will return this summer.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the hotel and waterpark!”
Reviews.Author: ABPFortLauderdale
Reviews.Content: This was a really nice getaway weekend for us! The staff was friendly and helpful and we were treated well the entire weekend. The rooms were very attractive and clean and we loved using the jacuzzi - what a treat! The beds were so comfortable we slept better than we have in a while. We also had a great time at the waterpark - there were alot of activities going on but I especially enjoyed the lazy river and the water slides. The weekend we were there they also had live entertainment in the afternoon and evening poolside which was great. We didn't mind staying a little further away from Orlando because it was quiet and nice and we could relax. I would definitely recommend this resort to anyone. We plan to come back again soon!

Reviews.Title: “Great Waterpark”
Reviews.Author: WestBoca
Reviews.Content: The family absolutely loved the water park. As a parent I felt very comfortable with the kids safety I was able to relax. The staff did a great job keeping the kids busy with pool activities and the parents happy with good food and drinks.

Reviews.Title: “Fun Water park Horrible Hotel Location”
Reviews.Author: tammytlkn
Reviews.Content: Hotel is in a horrible location, but if you can over look that, it is great! The rooms were wonderful, pools were great, lazy river about 2.5 feet deep ideal for my 4 year old, bigger slides for bigger kids, arcade, activities for kids during the day at the pool, great drinks at poolside bar, $5 for frozen drinks, poolside grill and restaurant, nice little shop in hotel lobby for meds, pool stuff and it wasn't overpriced, free shuttle to Disney. Check in staff not friendly but the pool/activity staff were extremely friendly. When driving up we thought what in the hell did we get ourselves into because the location is horrible!!!!!! Overlook that and you've got a nice place. Overall B- due to location. PS Do the Magic Show at Wonderworks, all you can eat pizza/salad/popcorn/cake and all you can drink beer wine sodas. $19 adults $14 for kids. My kids 8 & 4 loved the show!!!! Call ahead sells out!!!

Reviews.Title: “Fun Waterpark”
Reviews.Author: powers21
Reviews.Content: We stayed 3 nights and spent 2 days at Disney. The 3rd day we spent at the onsite waterpark. We had a great time at the waterpark, our 10 year old loved the slides, and we floated along the lazy river. Kids stay entertained so parents can relax. Pros: Pillowtop mattresses and 4 pillows per bed. Newly renovated rooms with nice furniture, tiles floor and tub. Waterpark had something for all ages. Activities staff for entertaining kids. Resort type feel at waterpark with poolside bar. Well appointed video arcade. Cons: Location - some turnpike noise, 30 minute to Disney. Thin walls We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and plan on staying here for all of our Orlando visits.

Reviews.Title: “The lazy river was just the touch”
Reviews.Author: firegirlphilly
Reviews.Content: The Clarion Resort and Waterpark was just what the Dr ordered! A fun relaxing week. The Lazy River was so much fun we couldn't get enough! The staff was very friendly and the waterpark is very well kept. After the day around the pool it was off to the room to relax in the jaccuzzi. The evning was spent in the bar where we laughed and had fun over drinks. The best part was that it was only a short walk to the room. Here's to our next stay!

Reviews.Title: “wouldn't return”
Reviews.Author: Carlie94
Reviews.Content: We were given an adjoining room that we did not asked for.People next to us allowed their kids to bang on the door and yell and scream til 12:00 am. Could hear every noise. Turnpike noise was even worse. When they asked families to play bingo(we declined) but was subjected to hearing every # being yelled out. (we were sitting by the waterslides) Beds were very uncomfortable and no extra pillows in the rooms. Front desk people were very friendly and rooms looked inviting.

HotelInfo.Name: Clarion Resort & Waterpark
HotelInfo.Address: 2261 E Irlo Bronson Memorial Hwy, Kissimmee, FL 34744
